name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Refillable Moisturizer
about: What it is: A refillable moisturizer with hyaluronic acid that is proven to deliver 3X hydration**, visibly reduce lines, seal in moisture & impart a dewy glow...Skin Type: Normal and Dry..Skincare Concerns:u00a0Dryness, Dullness, Fine Lines & Wrinkles..Formulation: Rich Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid, Red Algae, and Hadasei-3: Hydrates, visibly plumps and smooths lines..- Biomimetic Lipid Blend of Squalane: Seals in hydration and keeps skin hydrated longer..- Japanese Purple Rice: Antioxidants protect skin from free radical damage like fine lines and wrinkles...Ingredient Callouts:u00a0This product is cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This moisturizer quickly drenches skin with hydration and smooths the look of fine lines to give a plump, radiant glow. It improves the skinu2019s ability to seal moisture, for hydrated skin all day. Hyaluronic acid is boosted by Hadasei-3, a ferment of Japanese superfoods that visibly plumps skin and protects against oxidative stress...Clinical Results:u00a0In a study with 30 panelists, evaluated via Expert Grading:.-After 1 use 100% showed an improvement in skin softness, plumpness, and radiance.-After 1 week 100% showed improvement in skin barrier..In a study with 30 panelists, evaluated via Bio-Instrumentation (TEWL) 1 hour post-application:.-Locks in 39% more moisture..In a self-assessment with 40 participants:.-100% agreed their skin felt supple, replenished and renewed.-After 4 weeks 85% agreed lines appear diminished...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, SACCHAROMYCES/RICE FERMENT FILTRATE, GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, DIMETHICONE, SQUALANE, DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, MYRISTYL MYRISTATE, DIPENTAERYTHRITYL HEXAHYDROXYSTEARATE, BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2, TRIDECYL TRIMELLITATE, INOSITOL, SORBITAN TRISTEARATE, BEHENETH-20, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, CLADOSIPHON OKAMURANUS EXTRACT, CHONDRUS CRISPUS EXTRACT, BETAPHYCUS GELATINUM EXTRACT, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN EXTRACT, PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT, ORIGANUM MAJORANA LEAF EXTRACT, THYMUS SERPYLLUM EXTRACT, MALVA SYLVESTRIS (MALLOW) FLOWER EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, GOLD, SERICIN, PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE, TOCOPHEROL, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, POLYSORBATE 60, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, SODIUM BENZOATE, GLUCONOLACTONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, ALCOHOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, CITRAL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, MICA, TIN OXIDE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), VIOLET 2 (CI 60725).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Scoop a pearl-sized amount of cream with the gold spoon. .-Massage onto face, neck, and du00e9colletage in upward strokes. .-Use daily, morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been buying this for a long time. I typically buy the largest size, so it lasts a while. I was running out and grabbed the smaller one that was in stock. This was my first time seeing the new refillable packaging. I am so disappointed! Iu2019ve always viewed Tatcha as a more prestigious brand with excellent products and luxurious like packaging. Unfortunately, I canu2019t say the same about this new container. Itu2019s lightweight and looks awful. Thereu2019s plastic ridges all around the rim which accentuates the cheaper material. Thereu2019s even a picture and writing talking about the refill permanently on the container making it look way worse. If I didnu2019t know about this change, I wouldu2019ve been 100% convinced that someone swapped my product out and I received a counterfeit one. If youu2019re new to this product, you have no idea what you missed out on. Thankfully, I can swap the moisturizer out of this container to my older version. I understand the need to help the environment, but this was clearly an opportunity to cheapen their cost while disguising it as a positive change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEWARE!  Apparently, Sephora can charge you for a DIFFERENT product if they want to.  I ordered the mini version of the indigo cream as shown (15 ml / 0.5 oz), and they decided to send me what looked like a tester. It was UNSEALED, and it shows blank in my statement instead of showing the product I ordered. After back-and-forth with several associates and being gaslighted into believing that I ordered a product I never bought that apparently and very conveniently disappeared from the website, they told me to leave a review instead of solving the problem like any other company would.  Unlike them I do have receipts, so beware this can happen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The saleslady recommended this for me so I tried the sample size that came with a gentle face exfoliator, since it's expensive. I tried it for a week to make sure my face didn't break out like some reviewers had mentioned, and it was so incredible that I ordered the largest size and have been using it ever since. I'll definitely keep purchasing, because even my Clarins cream wasn't cutting it anymore. Since I started menopause, my normal type skin has been so dry, especially under my eyes, no matter how much water I drink or how well I take care of my skin. I didn't know this brand, but my colleague who really knows face cream brands told me afterwards that this is one of the best she knows, and she's right. It's a steep price but it's worth it if you need super moisturizing cream that leaves your skin dewy and soft. Normally I wouldn't waste it on the neck and du00e9colletu00e9 region either, but it really makes my 53-year old skin look supple and young. The cream is so soft and creamy that it's like a spa experience in a little pot, I feel spoiled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, the rating is not for the Tatcha product itself! The cream straight from the brand is amazing but this review is not going to be about the efficacy of the product. It's going to be about the fact that I bought the cream from Sephora and had it shipped to me only to find out that the packaging is nothing like the product from Tatcha, which makes me realize that Sephora is a big faker! I don't know where they got this from but it most certainly is NOT Tatcha!! The jar is much smaller and more to the point much lighter, meaning it looks and feels exceedingly FAKE! it doesn't have its normal expiration stamp on the bottom nor does it have the fold out ticket where you can read info on the product either. The jar pretty much feels like a Dewy skin cream from Temu and it is infuriating! The worst part is that I can't even return it nor get a refund because I do not live in a country that has access to Sephora, so you can imagine how hard it was for me to acquire it! I've gotten this cream quite a few times over the years so I know exactly how the product is supposed to be like, I also got another Tatcha cream from Amazon that is very clearly from Tatcha and comparing the two, who are supposed to have the same jars despite being different creams, makes it very clear that something is very wrong! I never knew that Sephora would be producing and selling fake products NOT from the brands themselves! it certainly does not make me want to be a Sephora customer anymore, and I've been one now for almost 5 years!! In the pictures you can clearly see that the jars are very different in sizes and the ticket on the back is not close to being the same, the Dewy one even has some number stamp on it which very obviously proves that it's a fake! I was going to put more pictures, including ones where you could see the fold off ticket on the real jar, that you can't see on the fake Dewy jar but apparently you can only put 2 pictures with your review, for some reason!

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend for extremely dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. I have extremely dry skin and I break out easily. I've been using this for a couple of years now and every time I try something new I breakout, or have other issues and come right back to this. I have sensitive, and extremely dry skin and this feels great. I put it on every morning first thing in the morning, and I have actually been using as a night cream as well. I am looking for a good (actual) night cream but unsure because my skin is so sensitive and this does the job so I have just stuck with it. I also use the Tatcha rice wash, face washes generally leave my skin tight and itchy and the rice wash doesn't. So pairing these together has been a life saver for my skin.

Pros:  -Effective at moisturizing skin and making it feel really soft. This cream is thick - it doesn't feel like a light layer at all and a little bit goes a long way. -Nice scent -Packaging and feel is really nice  Cons:  -I have sensitive skin and was irritated within minutes of putting this on. I also put it on overnight once, and the next morning, I had red blotches. As other comments have mentioned, this may have to do with the fragrance  -Price point. I got this as a sample and was shocked to come online and see the price. There is clearly a premium for the luxury branding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From research based upon the brand and product from a Licensed Esthetician perspective While Tatcha is widely praised for its luxurious skincare products inspired by Japanese beauty rituals, there are a few reasons why some people might find the brand unsuitable for their needs:  Price Point: One of the primary criticisms of Tatcha is its high cost. Many of its products are significantly more expensive than other skincare brands, making it less accessible to the average consumer. Some users feel that the pricing does not always justify the results, especially when comparable products exist at a lower price point.  Fragrance: Tatcha products often contain fragrance, which can be an irritant for sensitive skin. Though the brand uses natural fragrances, even these can sometimes cause reactions, particularly for those with skin conditions like eczema or rosacea.  Minimal Active Ingredients: Some critics argue that Tatcha's products focus more on luxury and sensory experience than on potent, scientifically proven active ingredients like retinol or high percentages of vitamin C. This could make Tatcha products less effective for individuals seeking targeted skincare solutions for concerns like aging, acne, or hyperpigmentation.  Over-Hyped Marketing: Tatcha has a significant celebrity following and substantial marketing that emphasizes luxury and tradition. Some users believe that the brand is overhyped and that the actual efficacy of the products does not always match the lofty claims made by the brand's marketing efforts.  Heavy Emollients: Some Tatcha products contain heavier oils and emollients, which may not be suitable for people with oily or acne-prone skin, as these ingredients can be comedogenic for certain skin types.  While Tatcha may be a great fit for some, itu2019s important to evaluate whether the formulations and price align with your individual skincare needs.

reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer but I'm disappointed in this new eco friendly refillable packaging. If you are a TRUE FAN of Tatcha you aren't even bothering with the 1.7oz jars. I just think that decision was tone deaf on their actual customer base. Any time I'd get a sample size or if there was a super sale on the 1.7 I would literally do the math and if it was a better price I'd buy it THEN TRANSFER it to my 2.5oz jar. I LIKE THE BIG JARS. I think this kinda stuff is a poor attempt at trying to look eco friendly but in reality it's STILL NOT WHAT WE WANT and you're creating MORE plastic by putting in the smaller size. Like I said, nobody who has used this cream for the last 3+ years is buying 1.7 jars anymore. If I did buy a refill pod, I'd be transferring it to my 2.5oz jar anyway so WHY not make the refill pod in a 2.5?!

reviews.review_title: Once a Staple, Now a Nightmare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal user of Tatchau2019s u201cThe Dewy Skin Cream & Hydrating Moisturizeru201d for years. After taking a break to try a different product, I decided to repurchase it in February. Unfortunately, my experience has been nothing short of disastrous.  Almost immediately after using the cream again, my face began to burn. Despite my better judgment, I continued to use it, hoping things would improve. Instead, my skin broke out in little red bumps, and I developed dry, flaky patches on my cheeks and the outer corners of my mouth.  I was in denial at first, thinking it couldnu2019t be this cream that had worked so well for me in the past. However, the evidence became undeniable as my skin condition worsened. Iu2019m now left with dark spots where the dry patches were, and Iu2019m struggling to heal my skin and restore it to its former state.  This experience has severely impacted my self-confidence. It's incredibly disappointing to see such a drastic negative change from a product that used to be a staple in my skincare routine. I am deeply dissatisfied and will not be repurchasing this cream again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mini as my 2023 birthday gift and fell in love and now am a devoted user of the full size. I find that because it's so hydrating, I really only need to use a little bit so it lasts a long time (currently 3 months in and it's more than 3/4 full still). The applicator that comes with it is super helpful when applying to minimize waste, I just scoop a pea sized amount and then dab a little to each quadrant of my face then rub in. I have combination skin and I find that this is lightweight enough that it doesn't make me oily in my T zone, just making my skin feel dewy and soft, while also being strong enough for my dry patches. I also like that the fragrance is quite subtle. I don't regularly break out (just some hormonal spots) and I find that this doesn't give me pimples. 4/5 stars instead of 5/5 because the price point is a bit high.

reviews.review_title: A dewy and hydrating moisturizer - a must have!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much that I'm writing my first ever review! I had gotten the mini size as a free sample from one of my purchases.  Recently I just looked at it and saw it was a moisturizer.  I have very dry skin.  With my current moisturizer, I load it up on my face to ensure it doesn't get dry, and to feel that hydration. However, for this moisturizer I only had to put on very little and I still felt the hydration.  After a couple of days, I started to notice that my skin was feeling softer and I did notice some dewiness to my face.  I hadn't realized it was a dewy skin cream at first.  The mini size lasted me about two weeks since I didn't need much product. A small amount really does work and I feel better hydration that my other moisturizer.  I did buy the value size, and I feel that this will last me a year if not more.  There is no need to add more as I already feel it working and hydrating.  I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Found my The One (at least for winter time)

reviews.review_text: In love! Finally the search is over. I've been looking for a rich hydrating cream to use at night that won't be too heavy, sticky and won't just sit on the skin. It was a tough one, I'll tell you. I love cream-gels, but the ones I've tried recently barely did anything for hydration and mostly irritated my skin. This cream is not geal, like I'm used to, and it's reach and creamy, but not at all heavy. I finally have hydrated skin that doesn't flake in the middle of winter in NYC! And the plumping effect works! I'm 29 and recently started noticing small changes in my skin (aka aging). I developed thick wrinkles on my forehead and started using retinol serum. Combined with this cream my wrinkles are all smoothed out, I'm sure no one except me can see them now. Cheeks also look better, generally skin is less dull. Will continue using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this moisturizer for over 2 years, and I absolutely loved this moisturizer! Iu2019ve never been good at having loyalty to any one product because I love trying new things but tatcha was my exception, it made my skin noticeably better. I was getting compliments on my skin! I purchsed a new container maybe 6 months ago and slowly started to develop dermatitis. I was using TRET at the time so I assumed it was that, never even considering it could be my tatcha moisturizer. I removed all harsh products from my skin care including the tret, even going as far as not using cleanser to wash my face, to no avail, my skin was getting worse not better. Finally this past week I decided to stop using my tatcha and only use cerve on my face a lo and behold after nearly 6 months of red inflamed, flaky and embarrassing skin my skins finally getting better and seems to be healing. I donu2019t think itu2019s a coincidence that my healing came after I stopped using this product. I really really want to believe there was some error in the batch or perhaps a formula change as Iu2019ve seen other reviews with similar stories. I hope that we can get back to the amazing product I first experienced. Until then I have to stay away from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do you have impossible dry skin from Accutane, cold weather, or genetics? All three? Me too. This is the winner. I've been loyal to this product since my old face cream had a formula change, and I'll be singing Tatcha's praises forever. I've purchased 10+ of these jars.  I buy a mix of professional grade skincare and Sephora products, as I feel most off-the-shelf products don't have the power I need. That said- if I could pick one product to put in everyone's Sephora basket, it would be this one. It does have a scent, but I've come to look forward to it. I use it layered with other products, both in the morning and at night. It never pills up or sits on the surface- it moisturizes deeply. I prefer this cream to much more expensive options, and I'm so reassured by Tatcha's continued commitment to clean beauty. This cream immediately evens out my sensitive spots and hyperpigmentation, and keeps my skin dewy all day. If I could afford to bathe in this, I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this lotion. I bought it in October 2022 and I still have HALF of the jar. I have so much of it left because I only use it on an everyday basis in the winter months because my skin gets incredibly dry. I tried so many lotions before The Dewy in hopes of not having to have dry, tight, flaking skin patches constantly in the winter. This is the first lotion that moisturizes my face all day long and into the evening and completely gets rid of any flaking skin & the tight feeling. Oh, and a little goes a LONG way with this one. I love the lotion spoon it comes with because it helps prolong the lotions shelf life by not having to contaminate it with whatever residues & possible bacteria your fingertips put into the lotion, but also it's so awesome for making sure you don't overuse. All you need is a tiny amount for each area of your face. Too oily for day use & under makeup, though. Also it doesn't need to be as expensive as it is.

(Ponds cold cream.) 4 out of 5 because it canu2019t quite destroy the worst dry patches without gold bonds help, but gold bond canu2019t do it alone, either.  Iu2019m very relieved how much better my skin is looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was having a really difficult time with my skin after having postpartum complications and this product combined with a really strict and hydrating skincare cleansing routine, as well as staying physically hydrated was literally the turn around point. I could not be happier with this. I eyed it for years and just could not get over the price point for some reason even though two of my other favorite face creams are a lot more expensive than this so when I finally realized that there was a mini - I just couldn't say no to missing out anymore. To be fair, when people complain about the size of this mini, I just don't get it - it lasted me almost three months and that was using a decent sized dollop in the morning and night. This is a heavier formula (mid-weight range I would say) that means you do not have to add an excessive amount and this is coming from someone with the most intense dry facial skin at times. This has a light fragrance that can be found with all of Tatcha's products so I would recommend trying to smell a sample if you are sensitive to this area of a product. I feel smoothed out after applying without the tacky feeling and it also does not make me feel oily or mess with my other skin prep that I do before putting on a full face of makeup. I have about two days worth left in my container and I will be putting a full size in my cart today to purchase.

I have now switched to the lighter water cream but will be able to use this as a standby if I get another dry spell. I 100% recommend this to the dry to combination skin friends like me as it will really help save your skin! Just be mindful to listen to when your skin tells you itu2019s had enough moisture and needs something lighter than this. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a present and wanted to try it really bad. When I first put it on it gave my skin a glow and felt very moisturizering in the moment. However, after 2 or so days of using this I noticed I was breaking out on my forehead and I ignored it thinking it was something else in my skincare routine. Then after I noticed the break out on my forehead a day later I began to break out on my cheek and got a couple big pimples on my cheeks, chin, forehead, etc.  After trying to find out what was breaking me out I realized it was most likely this product after reading other reviews. I took it out of my skincare routine and my breakouts were gone within the week. This product broke so many other people out. It's definitely not worth your money if you have sensitive skin. My skin is dry and sensitive, so I thought this would help with my dry spots, and yes it did moisterize my face but I can get the same effect with a cheaper and better moisturizer that won't break me out. I also wore this throughout the day and I thought I was sweating. Nope. It was the moisturizer. I would touch my face and see just dewy residue on my hands that I couldnt wipe away. It also made me feel like I was sweating and had a somewhat nasty feel when I was outside for a while. Waste of money.

I woke up Sunday morning with a bad rash, the bumps got very inflamed and my skin texture was so rough! Realized it was likely hives. Took a picture 3 days later and the hives were gone but still pretty red and textured. I have sensitive skin and this just wasnu2019t for me. I also want to advise that its very sticky after application. It didnu2019t feel the most comfortable sleeping with because it felt sticky against my pillow. I also have a cat and the slightest hair was sticking to my face.. not super pleasant. But honestly it does an amazing job at rejuvenating the skin and making it look radiant. reviews.review_title: Holy Grail for Dry, Flaky Patches - Mature Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this Tatcha Dewy Skin Plumping moisturizer due to my skin being sensitive, combination and needing more hydration in some areas (Flaky patching around smile lines & chin area mostly hormonal) without causing breakouts in my normal areas.   This magical skin cream was at the top of my price budget list. I do have to say I did try a sample months ago, from an online order, but after it was gone, I went back to my usual because it was cheaper.  Nearing the end of my regular moisturizer & tired of the flaky patches, I decided to give this a shot, it's worth every penny and last so much longer than my old one which was the same amount QTY wise, but I had to use three times the amount. A little of this cream goes a very long way, it's creamy, without being heavy, absorbs well, yet leaves my skin feeling very hydrated all day long. My foundation applies flawlessly over it, without pilling and without flaky patches showing up once I've applied foundation on my skin & it's settled, which was a huge problem with my other long time moisturizer. There is nothing like feeling great going out the door only to realize, your make-up is flaking off. This no longer happens, because with THIS - my skin is hydrated, ALL DAY! It's the one this I changed from my whole routine.  I'm turning 50 and while I've been very lucky to not have a lot of wrinkles for my age. As I mentioned, I do have combo skin, not a lot of breakouts, normal skin in most areas but those scaly dry skin patches and redness have vanished within days of using this cream.   I love reading everyone's reviews, but I rarely see reviews for woman my own age and up - so I hope you ladies 49 and up, give this product a try if you are having similar issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this cream about a year ago and I loved it at first. Then, shortly into using this product, I started to develop an acne-like rash that would not go away no matter what I did. I had never struggled with acne before and my skin looked terrible so I was concerned. I went to the dermatologist and was diagnosed with perioral dermatitis. The doctor said this can be caused by certain moisturizers. I emailed tatcha and was told it might not work for every skin type but it was dermatologist tested so I thought maybe my skin was just too sensitive for it. I gave the rest of the product to my friend since I could no longer use it, and shortly after he developed periocular dermatitis. It was so strange that the same condition happened to both of us within months and the only connection we can make is this moisturizer. Itu2019s also strange because this condition happens mostly in women and he is a man. We had to get on antibiotics and use a prescription cream and it was such a pain to get rid of. I DO NOT recommend this product. There are so many amazing and clean products out there and this is not one of them. If you want moisturizer thatu2019s good for your skin look into La Rouche Posay or Cera Ve.

It may be better for dry or mature skin; I have normal skin. It does feel great on my dry areas, like elbows and heels. A little goes a very long way, and I'd recommend emulsifying the product before use by warming it in your hand and rubbing it before applying so that it isn't quite so thick and pore clogging. A definite no for normal or oily skin, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 10ml sample for my birthday along with the cleanser. I preferred the cream. It's quite thick but spreads well once warmed by the skin. I am 47 with normal to dry skin exactly in the target range for this product. I use it at night and wake up with soft well hydrated skin. The product doesn't sit on the skin and remain greasy but seems to absorb well. I like that the fragrance is mild and seems mainly natural. You can smell the thyme extract. The ingredients seem quite unique, which I like. I haven't been using this long or consistently enough to say if I'd buy it but I think it's pretty good. I think the pH of the cleanser was a little higher than ideal. I'd be curious to check the pH of the cream.  I typically go for the skin care gift at my birthday and last year was laniege-a brand I wasn't impressed by and wouldn't purchase from. Tacha impressed me more and I think it's great that Sephora has this program as it would be quite difficult to make good choices otherwise. Ingredient lists are also very insightful.

reviews.review_text: I brought this product because a girl I work with recommended it and Iu2019ve been searching for so long for a good moisturizer. When I first started using it, I loved it. It seemed to be hydrating my skin pretty well, it did feel slightly oily going on but I was desperate to give it a shot. After some more time I started to break out so I looked further into the ingredients and found out it has fragrance in it. Pretty disappointing as I already have acne prone skin. I switched over to using beef tallow balm from VanMan Company about a month ago and it has done absolute wonders for my face. If you have acne prone skin, combination, or just dry skin I highly recommend looking into VanMan Company because itu2019s all clean products and my skin looks great. No breakouts, no dry patches, my acne scars are starting to disappear and you definitely get your moneys worth.

Price aside, there are much better moisturizers out there that does the same and better. I have dry skin and have not seen much of a difference after purchasing this 3 months ago and applying it day/night. In my opinion I saw greater results using YTP dream mask and it cost a lot less. If you're on the fence and wanting to splurge, I would suggest something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

If you are reading this, YOU MUST BUY THE DEWY SKIN CREAM!!!

reviews.review_text: I had some sort of reaction to this cream. Every time I would use it my face would itch like crazy for a few days. It was a waste of money for me.

I really wanted to love this cream. I was using the water cream from Tatcha during the summer and fall season and loved it, so I went for this thicker cream for winter. Iu2019ve been using it for about 2-3 months, and I recently noticed that ALL the pores on my nose were SO, so clogged with white-yellowish kind of wax! I have NEVER had this happen to me before. My face feels so gross, and I am so disappointed with this cream, especially for this price, I canu2019t just throw it awayu2026 so I guess Iu2019ll use it as a neck cream, but Iu2019m never going to use it on my face ever again. :(

Alright, I've read a lot of reviews and I wanted to share my thoughts to hopefully help spare some people in the future. I love this product, I've been using it for months and never had a problem with it. But! I have dry old lady skin. I suspect this product is not ideal for young, oily skin. If your over 30 and have suuuuuper dry skin give it a try but if you're young and only need light moisturizing I'd recommend looking elsewhere. Hope this is helpful! Happy beautying everyone!

reviews.review_text: Ok, so this stuff DOES feel incredible on the skin. However, I am sooo angry I didn't listen to all the reviews of people talking about this breaking them out. I hardly ever get zits anymore (like maybe one every few months), and after using this for just a few days I have 6 or 7 big red zits. I don't typically use anything with fragrance which makes me wonder if that is what is contributing to the break outs. I don't have sensitive skin and can usually try any product without worrying about weird reactions, but considering I didn't change anything else in my skincare routine except this and then had all these break outs, I really am thinking they are correlated. As good as this feels on the skin, I cannot recommend it to anyone.

After trying multiple Tatcha products a year ago, I was converted to a faithful believer. I fell in love with the rice powder and the dewy moisturizer in particular. I donu2019t buy this all the time because I canu2019t always stomach the price, but a few months ago I decided to treat myself and buy again. Iu2019ve been SO disappointed to the point I canu2019t stand using this. Previously, this moisturizer felt so wonderful, melting into your skin and feeling like it is absolutely worth the splurge. Now it feels greasy and almost like petroleum jelly in a very uncomfortable way - like I want to wash it off as soon as itu2019s on. I canu2019t imagine anything other than a formula change and tragically I wonu2019t be repurchasing. Iu2019ve found myself consistently reaching for Dr Jart Ceramidine and Neutrogena Water Boost instead.

reviews.review_title: A MUST HAVE for super dry skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as my free birthday gift, and Iu2019m sooo happy with it. I have sensitive, acne prone skin, and use a handful of prescribed acne medications that can be very drying - especially around my mouth. I donu2019t put acne medication around my mouth, but for some reason the area is ALWAYS always dry and scaly. Iu2019ve tried many moisturizers that donu2019t give the area enough moisture, and my skin continues to be dry and peeling throughout the day. I received this product in the mail, and tried it the next day. Instantly happy. The product is a little thick, and leaves a glowy residue. Putting this product on my face is the the first time in years that my mouth is actually moisturized. I used to spend hours picking at the dry skin before going out, and being depressed over the dry skin around my mouth. This product has save me so much time, and has dramatically improved the moisture barrier around my mouth. I can now go out without worrying about my mouth cracking, and showing off embarrassing dry skin. Once the sample runs out, I will be rebuying (:

reviews.review_text: This is my first time ever using and splurging on any Tatcha product, in exception of the Dewy Skin Mist. Yet I am completely in love! The ingredients are beautiful and clean (I am quite the stickler), it is very thick and leaves my skin very dewy and moisturized throughout the night, and the fragrance is very light and I can only compare it to a tea-like scent. If you are looking for a moisturizer that is heavy, hydrating, and you're down to spend the money on one...this is it. I have dry/combo skin so putting this on, and layering with a serum, works wonders on my skin and leaves it soft and is great if you're a skincare guru like me.

I have yet to use that as I still have my sample so I am curious to see if there is a difference in formula between both sizes like people are saying. reviews.review_title: Somehow Worth the Money and More
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I unfortunately loved this product. Reason 1: It's extremely lightweight and a little goes a LONG way. It delivered results, especially given the cold, dry weather where I live. My skin stays soft but not overly oily all day, but it also doesn't give me that tacky, there's-stuff-on-my-face feeling. Reason 2: it is fragranced but it's not strong, I don't find I can smell it after it's applied. If you have sensitive skin keep that in mind. Reason 3: I used it under the IT cosmetics CC cream and also with a smashbox concealer and did not experience any pilling. I find you can also put supergoop unseen sunscreen on top of it and it won't pill at all, so I think this moisturizer just doesn't have much silicone/dimethicone if any. Overall, this is probably the best moisturizer I've tried so far, which is unfortunate because she is expensive expensive (imo). That said, a little does go a long way, so if you do invest in this cream, you shouldn't need to rebuy every month; maybe every six months at most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has been salvation for my skin during the winter months.  A little goes a long way and a heavy hand can lead to your face looking and feeling greasy.  I don't know why someone states that this pills, it most certainly does not.  I use this during the day and then Tatcha Indigo Overnight Repair at night.  I will never be without this.

If u canu2019t achieve glow using skincare ingredients then donu2019t advertise yourself as such, and then slap on a ridiculously high price to push the u201cglowu201d agenda, not to mention straight up alcohol in it as well, I know tons of skincare use different type of alcohol in them, but this ingredient list straight up alcohol in the list, plus the mica, I canu2019t get over that, itu2019s so cheating to put mica in and to advertise it as u201cglow skincareu201d

reviews.review_text: Love the smell, color and consistency of this cream. The only thing I wasnu2019t sure is if it clogged my pores when I was using it as day and night moisturizer. After I switched to night only, it improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't really consider myself as having sensitive skin but I did NOT react well to this product. My skin was basically inflamed after the first time I used it, I tried again a day later to see if maybe I just needed to get used to it and it just got worse, so I ended up throwing it away. It has a very strong herbal-y smell that I found off-putting, not like something I wanted to put on my skin. I generally use unscented products on my skin so maybe I am just accustomed to something gentler, but I was definitely surprised that a moisturizer this expensive would contain so many known irritants like botanical extracts and fragrances. Definitely do not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Five stars for the mini jar, not the full size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received the mini jar on my birthday and was in awe with the formula. A little goes a long way for my dry skin. Got the value (full) size during the sale and was so disappointed with the consistency. I feel like the one from the mini jar feels more balmy and absorbent, it leaves my skin smooth and plump without any shininess. The full size leaves my skin greasy, feels that the product just lingers around on my skin longer before it 'disappears''

reviews.review_title: Thumbs up pour les peaux normales
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore! J'ai une peau normale u00e0 su00e8che et cette cru00e8me hydrate en profondeur. C'est une formule que la peau absorbe bien alors pas de sensations du00e9sagru00e9ables.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: first impression, dense and greasy. I have normal skin and it felt heavy. weird smell, would update more when my skin starts reacting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample for my birthday gift and I loved it. I struggle with texture and started using this in my nightly skincare routine. The spoon makes it feel so luxurious. It almost feels like all the hydration soaks into your skin and makes it feel so soft and plump. In the morning, my skin feels so hydrated and SOFT. Like my texture is almost completely gone after a few uses. The price tag is heavy but in my opinion, worth it.

reviews.review_title: a must have if you have really dry skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got the sample size in october with my birthday gift set and oh my gosh iu2019ve never tried a better moisturizer in my life. i have insanely dry skin all year round, and usually have to moisturize multiple times a day to stop my skin from feeling so tightu2026 but after trying this, i only use it once a day before bed and my skin feels amazing the next day. i also love how you barely need to use any product cause it spreads so easily. (a little goes a long way). i noticed a lot of other reviews said itu2019s too greasy, and yes, it does go on pretty greasy but because i have such dry skin it soaks in completely within 30 minutes. so would probably only recommend if you have really really dry skin. especially for the winter months !!  i already know this is gonna be a forever product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This opinion is a hot take, but I have a really hard time grappling with the texture of this cream. It feels like a makeup primer with its familiar silicone feeling and matte finish, but putting it on my face post oils and serums almost feels wrong! I know it's extremely popular and has a huge following, but I have definitely used other thick face creams that are more moisturizing and significantly more affordable like Weleda Skin Food.  Overall, definitely give it a try if you can afford it, but I would steer away from this item and get something else. These jar-style product packages aren't sanitary either since you have to dip your fingers into the product to use it... Regardless, I guess I just don't get the hype with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the trial size and I really wanted to like it but after 3 days of putting it on, there was nothing to be impressed with.  My skin didn't look like I had put anything special on it and I don't have any complexion problems.  No smoothness, no glow, no improvement at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini size on my birthday, and I've been using this almost every day and night as an eye cream. I know this is supposed to moisturize the face, but since I had very little, I tried to make the most of it.   In the first 7 months, it did all the great things an eye cream was supposed to do: hydrating, lightweight, brightening, plump, and supple. So if you're looking for an eye cream that's not over $50, this could be it.   The expiration date is 6 months, so I stopped using it on my face during the 8th month because it started to feel greasy and thick like the other reviews had said. Now, I just use what's left of it on my hands as a second layer for the winter cold.   I would give it a 4-star rating if it was used as an eye cream because it's cost-effective and it works, but as a moisturizer, probably not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream as a gift and was super excited to try it out. But after 3 days of using this cream, I got 4 big pimples and I'm so upset. The cream is very greasy, felt like oil when I put it on my face felt on the face, and in the morning my face has never been so greasy, as if in oil. probably it is well suited for old ladies 80+ or people with very dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Definitely not worth it for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer makes your face look and feel greasy for as long as you have it on and I have dry skin. I would use this at night but never during the day it does not combine well with primer or foundation over top. It helps with the dryness but doesn't do anything extra or special to justify the price. Ponds cold cream does a better job at least I can wear makeup overtop of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this moisturizer that I received for my birthday!  It is quite heavy, almost like an emmolient, so very little is needed.  A tiny pot lasts a long time.  My face feels so wonderful after using this, it's amazingly soft, smooth and soothed, it doesn't feel oily at all.  I have never broken out from this which happens to me with heavy or oily moisturizers.  It has a light spice scent.  I bought more for me and plan to buy some for my mom and sister-in-law for Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never had a problem with acne or breaking out and after three days of using this product i broke out and have scabs, its painful and will leave scaring very upset and i have sensitive skin and now reading some of the reviews i see people with normal skin are getting the same reaction so anyone with sensitive skin i wouldn't try this product. I got this as a sample and it went straight for the trash after three days. Its leaves your face looking greasy and feels greasy just so shocked at the price if this is what happens to your skin. just wow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Keeps my skin hydrated all day and night. Smells amazing and not very strong. Highly recommended !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Haven't really been a fan of the whole dewy skin trend. To me, it looks oily and greasy, and not radiant and hydrated like I think people are trying to go for. (I realize this is a dewy moisturizer, but I love Tatcha and this was included in the free Beauty Insider birthday gift I chose this year.) This is exactly what happens with this moisturizer: I look greasy and oily, but have more dry than oily skin. I feel like I have to rub it in a few times after I applied, like a bad body lotion. I was afraid it would break me out with how heavy it feels, but it hasn't. Those with oily skin, I would stay away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, and I used to use this moisturizer before my makeup. Best skin prep ever with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product quenches the skin! A must have for dry skin. Its the best in the market. Its light and spreads so easily, my skin loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for the past 4 weeks. Iu2019m 66 and my fine lines have improved, it soaks into my skin so I use it before I put on my foundation.   I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love my some Tatcha. This product is expensive but completely worth the price. Would definitely purchase again. Love the dewy and hydrating effect on my skin. Love it more that its vegan.

Felt amazing going on my skin but I have never had a zit in my 43 years of life and woke up with a broke out face after putting this on before bed..Iu2019m so sad bc I really liked how this felt going on!! I guess Iu2019ll stick w my cheap differin restorative night creamu2026 feels a lot like this one but def doesnu2019t break me out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received sample for this and the accompanying rice wash and used it for about 2 weeks.  Results were great so I bought full sizes. Then after about a few weeks, I started getting itchy tiny bumps on my hairline and jawline. I didn't really think it was the Tatcha products coz I've been using it for a month at this point but after a week with no relief from the dry, itchy and bumpy face I went to see. dermatologist and was given hydrocortisone cream and stopped using Tatcha. Once it has cleared, I would use the Tatcha products on and off to test if it really is what was causing the reaction. Lo and behold! Every time I use it, I would get a skin breakout! I think it's great product (coz it was good when I first tried it) but not for me, sadly.

reviews.review_title: A MUST HAVE! ESPECIALLY FOR MOMS WITH LITTLE TIME!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I AM IN LOVE THIS SKIN CREAM! It makes my skin feel so soft and supple its AMAZING! I can put it on before bed and in the morning my face feels just as soft and glowing as it did before bedtime! I feel like I only have to use this cream once a day which is a huge help for time!   I have used so many different skin care products and lately because of having toddlers and no time for skin care twice a day(only once) I was just purchasing the Sephora brand skin cream and every other face product. I got this cream for my birthday gift in the trial size, I have been using it for about two weeks so far and I am sooo in LOVE! I want to try all the Tatcha products now!!!!!! My husband and I also both love everything with Japanese ingredients in them, and Japanese culture so that's a plus. Even though the products are pricey I really believe they are worth it and I got the go ahead from my husband to purchase every product in the line! It will be a lot of money and I'm worried about the price but this cream has made my face so soft and silky!! I have dry skin lately and its been a lifesaver!!!!! and such a time saver!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: holy grail moisturizer ! i really enjoy this moisturizer. itu2019s perfect in the winter for my combo skin that leans a bit on the dry side (or dehydrated), thereu2019s a bit of a scent which i like but if youu2019re a bit more sensitive to smells iu2019d be careful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It felt really hydrating but was too thick for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product, it's super hydrating, smells amazing and feels really nice on the skin since the product is on the thicker side, you don't need to use much and it lasts a lot longer than other moisturizers  the only downside to the product is that it doesn't absorb completely into the skin

reviews.review_title: Love the Glow But Doesnu2019t Stick Around
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this moisturizer, especially given the price point, but was disappointed. I am swapping all beauty and wellness products to cruelty free alternatives and have been looking for a good substitute for my Cera Ve moisturizer, which is excellent for year-round use. I am in my 30s so I am focused on anti-aging and repair and am seeking a cost-effective cruelty free moisturizer than sinks in well, maintains moisture for long periods of time, and doesnu2019t cause breakouts. I LOVED the glowy finish on this moisturizer but noticed after a couple of days that my skin was getting really dry while using this product. I tried coupling this moisturizer with a heavier serum/face oil, but no luck. After a week of use, I had a couple of flaky, dry spots on my face and had to relinquish this to neck and hand moisturizer. If you have less dry skin, I could see this as being a great option. Cruelty free status is a bonus but the combination of cost, plastic packaging, and no u201csticking poweru201d to this moisturizer means that it wonu2019t join my permanent line up.

reviews.review_title: Harness the Power of Okinawa & Japanese Botanicals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tatcha's Dewy Skin Cream contains healthy nutrients like Japanese Purple Rice, Okinawa Algae Blend, and Hyaluronic Acidu2013 all of which combine to attract water and help replenish the skinu2019s moisture barrier while plumping it. I lived on Okinawa for 10 years. Raised my children there. We all had a wonderful skin, bathing in the East China Sea, eating the food of the earth. We all stopped aging for 10 full years. I returned to United States and my skin began aging... quickly Pollution, water, stress... It wasn't until I discovered Tatcha, particularly the purple line with the purple rice wash, dewy cream, and Dewy serum that I saw a difference. I literally feel and look different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on the skin but very moisturizing. I have sensitive skin and have tried so many others. This is the only one for me!

reviews.review_title: Been using for 4 months, never using anything else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sad to see all the negative reviews of this moisturizer.  This is the best cream I've ever used. It's aided me in getting my glass skin and keeps me from being a dry horrible mess. I have noticed less wrinkles and can feel the plumpness on my skin due to how much it hydrates me. She is a staple for me and I honestly cannot see myself deviating and trying another product.   This product is what my skin has been looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything I would want in a moisturizer - heavenly soft and REALLY plumping, keeps skin feeling perfect for probably 24 hours if I left it long enough, smells divine, has a great list of ingredients for dry skin, AND you barely need a small dot to cover the whole face. The issue: I just hate how expensive it is, but I will definitely give up and buy it as soon as it runs out. I will miss the feeling too much. Curses, in the best way, Tatcha, you absolutely live up to the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product made me breakout and develop texture all over my forehead. Iu2019ve never had this happen with any other product my skin is not even sensitive. I think it has to do with the very strong fragrance  this product contains. Not very hydrating either I would apply it in the night and wake up with super dry skin in the morning I would have to moisturize immediately after waking up. For the price point itu2019s not worth there are better products out there way cheaper as well. The u201cglowu201d this product gives you is just borderline greasy and just emphasized my texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a BIG NO for me. My face has NEVER broken out like this. This was four days of trying it outu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this moisturizer is pretty nice, but honestly not worth the price. I got a sample in an Ipsy bag and liked it enough to buy the value size jar, but after using it up Iu2019ll be looking for a less expensive alternative. If the price point gives you even a momentu2019s pause, skip it; Iu2019ve used $6 moisturizers  that gave me comparable results.

reviews.review_title: lovely glow but too much fragrance for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent was pretty strong, I prefer my skincare to be fragrance free because it's so unnecessary for the face. I liked the texture and it absorbs quickly, definitely made my skin bright and glowy. A little out of my budget to buy though (I got the birthday gift lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin (dry cheeks/under eyes and oily T-zone. Itu2019s easy to put too much of this cream on. As soon as I put it on my skin felt irritated. I put some water on my face and blotted with a towel to remove some of the product and it felt a little better. The next morning  my skin felt moisturized, & plump but had a few small bumps so I donu2019t think it will be good for my face but I used it on my neck & feel like it hydrated a lot. That area feels like the skin is thinning and sagging with age and I think this product will be great for moisturizing and plumping that area. I got a sample size with the face wash & primer for free as a bday reward, I really like the face wash so far, havenu2019t tried the primer. I will use the moisturizer on my neck but likely wonu2019t buy a full size once itu2019s gone bc the price is too high. Unless I find it works miracles and makes my neck look 10x younger after this trial size lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very tempting pretty because of lavender smells and shiny jar but the product is just as cheap as the packaging. (Plastic gold spoon on top and called it anti bacteriau2026 eye roll)  This makes my skin (which is not even sensitive) brea out. Itu2019s very oily feeling and clogs pours. Just not for me. I didnu2019t even use most of it. It was a waist and I am sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re sensitive to scented face creams, this product definitely is not recommended! Iu2019ve got the sample to try on and the first thing that bothered me after application was the strong smell!  Also I like to layer my moisturizer two three times to feel extra hydration but definitely not recommended for this product as it kinda peels of after reapplication.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Switched from the Water cream and I'm not looking back. I have very oily acne pitted skin, and the Water cream made my skin texture look rougher. I realized I needed more mousture so switched to this. Been using for a week and no breakouts or whiteheads, and it feels more hydrating than the Water Cream. It's rich, but doesn't feel like it's sitting on uour skin or suffocating your pores. My new staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the September birthday set and really wanted to love it, but it unfortunately broke my skin out so badly. I donu2019t have sensitive skin, but after just a few uses my skin broke out in cystic pimples and whiteheads. It does give the skin a beautiful dewy look while on the face, but itu2019s not worth the horrible breakout it caused me.

reviews.review_title: Expensive but worth it for dry sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this for my birthday gift and let me tell you this worked wonders for my dry sensitive skin. After just a few days my skin was started to feel better, was less sensitive, wasnu2019t flaky like it usually was and my skin also felt smoother. I would warn my oily skin queens that this version of the cream isnu2019t for you. And if you donu2019t like feeling a slight residue on your face after applying creams then you also probably wouldnu2019t like this either. For my oil skin girls I would recommend the water cream but if youu2019re a dry skin girl like me I apologize to your wallet and I say run donu2019t walk.wasmoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician who works with luxury skincare. I have tried many creams some that cost upwards of $300. NOTHING compares to Tatcha Dewy cream. I am a 32 year old woman with dry and dehydrated skin and nothing makes my skin feel like this cream does. Let's start by talking about the packaging it's sturdy and luxurious. Love that it comes with a scoop to keep bacteria out. The smell is perfect. The feel is like wrapping your skin in a silk blanket. SO comforting and rich while still remaining silky and absorbent.  It feels expensive and luxurious. I was recently supplementing with a different cream and repurchased my tatcha today and nearly cried with joy. I tell my husband it's one of the small luxuries of my day. My skin immediately feels better. I'll never be able to use anything but the dewy cream! It's the best!

reviews.review_title: Probably the best stuff ive put on my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels so good when applying to the face, it is nice and thick and sinks in easily to the skin. It has a light, fresh smell, but it goes away quickly. It sits really well underneath all my makeup and it helps my skin look bouncy and fresh at the end of the day, even with loads of makeup on.  I have defiantly seen a change in my skin hydration and texture as well as how long my makeup is lasting and how much better it looks in general

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin and I found that this wasnt enough for me especially since it's been raved about as the HG for dry skin. It does go on quite nicely and feels luxurious but I found my skin felt tight and dry a short while later.  I wouldn't repurchase and I'll continue to search for a better moisturizer for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail moisturizer for Dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my HG moisturizer for the last 5 years. Iu2019ve tried hundreds, and none have been as hydrating or plumping for my dry, 36 year old skin as this. I wouldnu2019t recommend this for oily skin types as it is VERY hydrating  and leaves a very dewy finish. I love the fragrance, but if youu2019re sensitive to it this also might not be for you. I will never stray from this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive acne prone skin and I love the indigo serum cream so much so I wanted to use them together! But unfortunately it stings my skin. I am continuing to use it because it feels luxurious and smells so nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out like a teenager going through puberty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini size for my birthday from Sephora, so naturally I was so excited to try out Tatcha! The cream itself is a wonderful velvety consistency- BUT it was not all that. I have tried out several different creams as I work in the skincare industry and other than the consistency, I didn't see all the hype. I HAD to apply this product twice, & I don't really see how this is for dry skin as it wasn't all that moisturizing. I have normal skin with combo T Zone & my T zone was drier than usual.. I also have sensitive skin and I had NO problems using this cream. I would give it a try if your on the fence but wouldn't add to my routine.

reviews.review_title: bought it after bday sample it was that good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a mini-sized for my birthday gift, I absolutely LOVE it !! I am 51 and have seen a huge difference in my skin after 2 months, my fine lines are gone no joke, especially under my eyes. I have super sensitive skin (due to cancer) and no issues with it at all , I ever bought it after it ran out , some one on a huge budget , its a little pricey but its worth it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product 2 weeks, I've noticed my skin more hydrated and smooth and I am 46. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like the previous reviewer (and several others), I got this as part of my birthday gift and I'm already in love and planning to head back to my local Sephora today for a full sized jar.  Everything in the name is true - it is dewy, plumping and hydrating.  Even though I'm fairly well stocked with moisturizers from other companies, with winter approaching, this cream will be really wonderful.  And the dewy fresh glow it adds will be welcome in the dull days of winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I got the little sample size in one of the birthday gift things and I am HOOKED on this. It makes my face feel so soft and makes it look so glowy! Take it from the teenager lol  *Ik this review says I'm 54+, but I'm not.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much! It has a nice smell thatu2019s not over powering, and an amazing consistency. It melts in your skin and moisturizesu2026. But it irritated my skin too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A must have for winter season. The only moisturizer that worked to fight off the dry climate in Alberta.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for last few weeks results are amazingu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is a holy grail product, for people like me who have dry skin. iu2019ve heard it really doesnu2019t work for oily and combo skin! i tried tatchau2019s other moisturizer (in the green bottle) and it broke me out. turns out, itu2019s for oily/combo skin! but this one, it works wonders for me. i have had so many people ask me what my skin care routine is and itu2019s just this and a cleanser. the price tag is hefty but it lasts FOREVERRRR and a little goes a loooong way. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_title: Broke Me Out Like A Teenager
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always been curious about this product and it was an investment but I love the scent and Iu2019m such a sucker for packaging so I thought itu2019d be worth it. It completely broke me out with cystic acne and whiteheads. Boo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Picked up the sample size as a the free birthday gift and my skin is so soft and feels moisturized! I did have some breakout around the mouth area and I'm not sure if that is the rice polish or this because it's ONLY around the mouth and nowhere else. It could be neither but I love tatcha, and they are a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_title: Sample worked well.... Full size not so much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I always wanted to try this so I redeemed my birthday gift early so i could get the sample set. I really enjoyed the face wash and this cream but when I purchased the full size of both, that's when I started to have issues. The face wash is fine but the Dewey skin cream is a whole other story. the sample set one felt more creamy and made my skin feel really hydrated and it would last throughout the day, I also would have no reaction. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this for my free birthday gift. I had heard great things about Tatcha and had been wanting to try it for a while so i was extremely excited and hoping to love it.   Right off the bat this has a fragrance. Iu2019m not particularly sensitive to fragrances but it is worth noting. It is also EXTREMELY oily and greasy. It felt disgusting to have on my face. I was hoping this would go away as I worked the product in however that did not happen. The cream remains oily and never really works into the skin how a cream should. It sort of just sits on top. Itu2019s literally as if I applied an oil on my skin.   Overall this was not a good experience. Iu2019m unsure if maybe I got some sort of defected cream. I see so many great reviews and was hoping to have a similar experience. I really did want to like this product and was even hoping on purchasing the full size but Iu2019ve changed my mind.   Donu2019t purchase this without having tried it first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this moisturizer. it is super hydrating, great for night time use but it's not oils so it works for daytime use too, especially if you live in a dry climate like myself. But after about a week of using it along with the Tatcha Rice Wash, I broke out with terrible acne all over my chin and forehead - I normally have very clear skin and, aside from a random pimple or two every once in a while, I never break out like this. I will never use anything from Tatcha again after the experience I had with this product.

reviews.review_title: I absolutely love Tacha Dewy cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Chemotherapy left my skin dry and dull. Bettering my skin was something that i had as a small goal. After my health improved I began my search for a skincare regimen. I tried two drug store brands and didnu2019t like the results. I upped my price range and found a product that I still use as a back up but it wasnu2019t my u2018itu2019.  I decided to visit Sephora and was overwhelmed by all of the skincare products. I honestly chose Tacha because of the display. It looked luxurious and classy. There were two formulas that i was interested in but the Dewy cream costs less.  I donu2019t use any specific facial wash or serums. My simple face routine is the Tacha Dewy cream along with Olehenriksen banana eye cream. These products have completely turned my skin around. I get compliments on my skin all the time. Iu2019m even accused of wearing foundation on the days Iu2019m not wearing any.  NOW, when you first put the cream on, it looks greasy aka u2018dewyu2019. But donu2019t fret. It melts into the skin leaving a soft healthy hydrated glow. A little goes a long way.  I was too excited when I found out it was this year's birthday gift. The sample consistency is not the same as the jar you purchase but i have gotten the same exact results. The full size cream has a thinner velvety consistency. The sample size was more of a balm texture.  I feel like i found my u2018itu2019 product. I have no desire to try anything new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream leaves my face feeling moisturized and dewy, and I love the cooling, relaxing feel of it. I have normal skin which is easily irritated by new products but this did not irritate me at all! I know its a thick cream but I found it okay to use year-round. As a comparison, the thick Sunday Riley ICE Ceramide cream DID cause my skin to break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got it in my birthday gift, and oh my god.. my skin has NEVER been so clear, plump and glowy in all my life. I have PCOS and get awful bumps from the hair removal and since using this, I donu2019t get any irritation anymore! I have extremely sensitive skin and This doesnu2019t seem to bother me at all. It does have a light lavender scent, but I donu2019t mind it for the results I get. I ended up purchasing the largest jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer covers all of the bases in terms of diminishing the signs of anti-aging.  It leaves my skin  soft and hydrated, firm, fine lines and even deeper wrinkles are decreased markedly and areas of discoloration are reduced.  I've been using Tatcha's skincare for 7 years now, and am very pleased with the results.  It's important to purchase the products that are matched with your personal skin type.  If you're in your 20's and don't have any prominent signs of aging OF COURSE you may breakout because this cream is meant for dry, aging skin.  Tatcha has products for every skin type, you just need to use those products that will benefit your own individual skincare needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

This is a thick, light purple colored, cream. I have repurchased twice now, I do really enjoy it, it is very hydrating and I have never experienced any negative side effects. This is actually one of the few heavier creams that I can use daily without breaking out. I avoided Tatcha products for the longest time, the price and reviews stating they werenu2019t great considering the price. There is something about them, they give a noticeable hydration and glow to the skin. I donu2019t need to apply much of this cream, the jar always lasts a very long time. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with extremely dry skin and this product is very moisturizing! It has helped me a lot.
