reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini size in a subscription box and it has lasted me awhile (little over a month). At it's price point I was expecting a lot more, but I honestly don't see much of a positive difference. *I have pretty normal skin that can get dry patches if my eczema is flaring up or if it's cold outside but I also lean combo in the summer.* I tried to use only the dewy skin cream twice a day (with cleansing and toning) but I found it was too drying to use at night so I opted to use it during the day with a heavier cream at night because it was causing my skin to peel around my nose and forehead, as well as cause more dryness overall. I only got one or two pimples while using this, but that may have been for hormonal reasons. The most effective way to apply this (for me) was by cleansing and toning, then waiting a few minutes and wetting my hands with water to apply about a dime sized amount to my face by pressing it in. That was the only way I could actually get this to sink in, probably from the HA in it. I really can't justify the price point but I feel this product may be much better for people with very oily/combo skin, and there is a light citrusy fragrance but nothing overpowering so if you're sensitive to fragrance it's not too heavy especially if you like citrus scents like me (lol). Overall, not my cup of tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product as a emergency treatment when I over exfoliate my skin. It helps with the dry patches. I have oily skin so I use it as winter moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you struggle with very dry skin this is the product for you! I would recommend using less than you think as a little of this product goes a long way! I also want to say that I am fortunate to not struggle with acne so havenu2019t had the problem some people mentioned. I have however struggled with insanely dry and dull skin my whole life and this has been the BEST product to meet my needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently using the dewy skin serum, which I really like, so I decided to try this mini that was included in my Sephora birthday gift. I have mixed feelings. It is very rich as it claims to be, however, it glides over my skin and I donu2019t feel as though it absorbs very well. I have only used it at night. The second morning I woke up with a big red blemish on my face. It may or may not be due to this productu2026 so I may try this again and see if another blemish pops up. I am not one to waste products so I will use it as a luxurious hand and cuticle cream if I decide it is not the right product for my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this for my birthday gift last month. The 10ML lasted a month. I used it twice a day. I love it! I will definitely be buying the bigger size when i can. I have dry skin year round and this product feels so light but also very moisturizing. The only u201cconu201d is the price point. It is VERY expensive especially in this economy lol but in the end I think itu2019s worth it. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this as my bday sample-just hit the big 4-0!! Iu2019ve always taken care of my skin with Josieu2019s argan line, and I still will use the stuff because it is affordable and I see great results-but this stuff was mind blowing! After one application, I was in love. The scent is subtle and clean, the feeling is soft and luxurious. A very little goes a long way-it especially helps if your fingers are damp while applying the cream. I canu2019t say enough good things about this cream.

reviews.review_title: Made A Believer Out Of Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first received a sample for my birthday gift in January and quickly fell in love. Iu2019ve been searching for a moisturizer thatu2019s not too thin/not too thick for my sensitive skin. I can sometimes react harshly to niacinamide and Iu2019m allergic to beeswax and bee products so it was a wild ride finally getting to the Tatcha brand. My skin feels more plump, glorious and dewy. I absolutely love this moisturizer! The consistency is perfect and the smell is lovely, IMO not too strong and I just love the way the packaging is. So classy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free birthday gift from Sephora. I have not used the cleanser yet but I love the cream. Itu2019s nice and thick and creamy and makes my skin feel fabulous and I donu2019t break out from it. I will definitely be buying the larger version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised that this didn't get a universal 5 stars in the ratings because this is hands down my favorite moisturizer. But when I looked into it, the complaints were from women who had acne issues. This is NOT a good moisturizer for acne prone skin.  However, it is AMAZING FOR DRY SKIN.  I have always been complimented for my beautiful skin, but that's because I have always taken care of it. For years I used Chanel and LaMer products. At about age 45, I started using Clarins Double Serum (which I *still* swear by).  After trying a sample of Tatcha's The Dewy Skin Cream, I realized that it worked just as well, but cost a fraction of what Chanel's Le Lift or La Mer's Creme de la Mer. I switched and haven't looked back. I'm nearly 60 and I still have people compliment me on my beautiful skin and who are shocked when they hear my age. I have a simple routine: removing my eye makeup with Lancome's Bi-facil, rinsing my face with water and a washcloth (and occasionally using micellar water), drying it and adding a small dollop of Clarin's Double Serum, and in winter, following with this Tatcha moisturizer.   My skin is reactive, tending to Rosaceae. I am very pale (Irish descent) and burn easily (followed by freckles). I also tend to have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved the texture, feels so soft and luxurious .. and it does create that healthy glow which is beautiful, but sadly anything that has fragrance irritates my skin, this is no exception, within minutes of applying this I saw my skin reddened.   So.. If you have sensitive skin think twice before investing in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only downside to this is the crazy price tag- other than that I love it and Iu2019ve yet to find a moisturizer I like better than this one! My skin looks and feels itu2019s best after using this stuff- beautifully moisturized and hydrated yet still doesnu2019t make my skin feel heavy or greasy. I use the water cream as a daytime moisturizer in the summer months and save this for nighttime, and in the colder months this is what I use morning and night. It hasnu2019t failed me yet!
This product is one of my favorite moisturizer in my bathroom. It not only hydrates but the glow that it gives my skin is amazing. I must add that a dime size or smaller goes a longggg way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin so dewy and hydrated and Iu2019m shocked since I have oily skin. The scent renders it half unusable and this is a recurring issue with Tatcha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was an amazing moisturizer, really thick and hydrating. I love Tatcha's Hadasei- 3 complex and found it helped plump and hydrate my skin. I initially bought this assuming it would work on combination - dry skin however I found it was too heavy at times and made my skin oily. I would recommend this if you have extremely dry or mature skin but maybe not otherwise. I also didn't love the inclusion of Mica and fragrance in the ingredients list even if it's in trace amounts - but a pretty solid product overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a miracle cream! It's my first luxury skincare purchase and it's well worth it. Also reached out to their customer service and they are wonderful. 10/10 lovely company and products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is overpowering and unpleasant. Renders it absolutely unusable..

reviews.review_title: cured my bratty skin - thank you Tatcha!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For context - I started working in cosmetics at 19 years old and was quickly introduced to quality skincare products. For ten years, I could not find anything that worked for me despite my willingness to invest the money and all of the research Iu2019d done over the years. I had very dry, patchy skin that is also very prone to breakouts. This moisturizer is the only thing that was able to cure both, while still delivering some preventative benefits for aging. I donu2019t even know if I can classify my skin as dry, anymore. Am I normal now?! Iu2019ve been using this moisturizer for 3 years and still get excited every time I apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I patch tested a tiny amount of this on my cheek and woke up to a silver dollar sized red dehydrated splotch with pimples scattered around it where the cream must have migrated overnight. The red spot feels almost like fine grit sandpaper - there is ZERO moisture. It has been four days and seemingly no amount of moisturizer or hydrating masks will bring it back to life. The surrounding bumps have calmed so that is a plus. My skin was in excellent shape before I gave this a try - PLEASE be careful and patch test in a discrete area before using all over your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful! Everything from the packaging to the texture to the scent feels so luxurious. It gives an instant dewy look and is intensely moisturizing. This does leave me a bit greasy, though, given that I tend to run on the oilier side, so I might not recommend it for folks with oily skin. The price is also a concern, which is the only reason I wonu2019t be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_title: I had no business loving this so much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I cannot believe the difference it makes in my skin. Itu2019s so hydrating and makes my skin so soft! This was particularly shocking for me because I have combination skin, but even my more oilier spots love this. I will absolutely be purchasing the full size.  For the record, this is not something that can just be replaced with a more affordable dupe and Tatcha knows it. I think what makes it so special is the rice ferment filtrate and algae blend. My skin is bouncier, more plump, and perfectly dewy after using this. It also feels so much healthier! I had no idea what I was missing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This has to be the best moisturizer on the market. I know not all skin is the same but for my slightly dry skin, this is magic in a bottle. I have mature skin (40 years old) and I see a visible difference is plumpness and dewiness which give me a more youthful look. It has a nice scent too, a light lavender mint but not too strong, I guess would be my best description. Unless you have super oily skin, you are going to love this! Itu2019s a little pricey but worth every Penny. About to purchase my 2nd 2.5 oz jar.

reviews.review_title: Amazing- Skin is SO dewy and hydrated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a sample and ended up ordering the full size. I use it only in the morning, under my face sunscreen. Just like it says, it leave you with a beautiful dewy finish. My skin looks so hydrated and glows- love it, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff but came with a giant air bubble meaning it was missing like 1/3 of the product. At this price, thatu2019s a huge miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels so soothing and smooth when applying on the face. I love this product. I tend to have dry skin, a bit of an oily T zone and my skin looks so plump and moisturized after applying this product. 10/10 for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as my part of my birthday sample present from Sephora and unfortunately I'm not impressed. The texture is so smooth and soft but after 3 uses (both with and without other products), I've had pilling all over and it just doesn't seem to soak into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with the Tatcha rice wash and the essence water but, I cannot recommend this! It gave me terrible deep breakouts on my chin, when I normally have little to none ever (even around my time of the month). Iu2019m extremely bummed because I wanted to love this product, I guess they canu2019t all be winners. If you have acne prone skin this is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me the worst break outs of my entire life. Have been working so hard to get my skin perfect and this product ruined it.  Caused me to have the worst skin. Donu2019t recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as my birthday sample and really enjoyed it! It made my face feel so soft and moisturized. The only negative was that I was not the biggest fan of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product in a set for my birthday gift and I hated myself for falling in love with it but it happened. I have very dull/ dry skin and this moisturizer makes my face glow. I like using it after I wash my face at night because it is a little more on the heavy side but not in a bad way. And the smell is very light, clean, and a little bit does go a long way, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this from the birthday gift set. At first use, I loved this product - it made my face feel so hydrated and soft. However, after a few days of using it, I experienced breakouts that I haven't had since I was a teenager. I had small acne/whiteheads bumps across my forehead and on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in a promotional package and I was looking forward to loving it as I've heard such great things, but I was left disappointed. Reapplied in the morning at 8am (did not put makeup on) and it did not sink into my skin until around 3pm. My face felt sticky to the touch and looked greasy. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, really wondered if it would work and feel good on my face with NOT breaking my face out. I LOVE IT, A MUST REORDER!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! Got it in a free gift set and love it! Hydrating and doesn't break my skin out and my skin HATES everything. Don't really care for it as a day cream so I only use it at night that's the only reason for the 4 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it. Itu2019s not too heavy on my skin and it really hydrates the dry areas of my skin. Itu2019s creamy and sinks into my skin nicely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this product was OK. It has a thick creamy texture and it is great for dry skin but it does feel sticky. The stickiness causes me to only use this as a night cream. It would feel too heavy for day use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m another critic of this over-hyped product. I also received this as a birthday gift and it looks nothing like the actual product. Iu2019m not sure if the product was expired because it was a sample, or if the ingredients did not go well with my skin (my current serums did not contain retinol so not quite sure how it started). Spend your money on another product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the birthday gift size of this and Iu2019ve only been using it for three days and Iu2019m already seeing an improvement, definitely my new favorite product to splurge on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Like a lot of people I thought this was yet snother overhyped product so I never even considered trying it. I was an option for this tears birthday gift from sephora, so I opted to try it. To my surprise it works magnificently. I have very dry skin all year round, and this moisturizes so well. I always trying new moisturizers in hopes to find one that works for my skin, and this is it, my holy grail. I don't think this is a great option for oily or even combination skin, but for dry skin it's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst breakout in years. I received a small Sample as my free birthday gift. After only 3 uses I had a face full of deep red bumps for a solid 2 weeks. They took forever to heal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This can actually be used to reduce the look of deep acne scars

reviews.review_title: I had high hopes for this cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested it for several weeks, and although my skin felt hydrated and dewy, this cream caused breakouts all over my face including painful below-the-surface blemishes. I have combination (closer to dry), sensitive, acne prone skin and I spent quite some time doing in-depth research about this cream. Not sure which ingredient is to blame, but please be careful with this product if your skin is acne prone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The texture is amazing and luxurious, a little does go a long way and there are no harsh scents. The dewy finish is likely because it tends to sit on the surface of the skin and never fully absorb, leaving an almost sticky feeling.  The biggest disappointment is the cost.  I don't mind spending a bit more for a good product but this is way over-priced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin feel soft and hydrated, and i love the dewy look. A tad heavy but i donu2019t mind that feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample and didn't love this. The dewy texture seems to come from a vaseline-y ingredient so it goes on very thick and feels heavy...if using this plus an SPF it can feel like a lot for the first hour. That said it is very hydrating and does leave skin softer.

reviews.review_title: Expensive, but give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini sample from the bday gift set and I was impressed. A little goes a long way (mini sample lasted 1 month, applied once a day). I have an oily forehead but dry cheeks so I was concerned on how this would do but it passed the test. My entire face is moisturized throughout the day and it doesn't look like I washed my face with grease :D  It's expensive so I suggest you buy the sample first before making a purchase.

reviews.review_title: Works even with acne prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute chokehold this moisturizer has on me is wild. I have super acne prone skin so I thought for sure this would make me breakout but I put it on at night before bed and I wake up super glowy and hydrated. I highly reccommend but voting down one star for the very high price tag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I havenu2019t broken in out in months, years maybe even and I used this once. Once. I have broken out horribly as have my three other friends and we all have to go to the beach next weekend so thanks a lot. I could only get too pictures but thereu2019s pimples on my forehead too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating = A+ Soothing for dry skin = A+ Finally found a moisturizer that makes my skin feel soft & glowing. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail for Dry Skin Peeps
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is just the best. Thick. Dewy. My skin stays plump and hydrated for hours. I wear this day and night. Itu2019s the holy grail and Iu2019ve come to accept that I need to dish out the cash if I want this high level of quality. Itu2019s the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: iffy unless you want to spend a lot

reviews.review_text: i love this skin cream! its very moisturizing and i use it before i go to bed and it leaves my skin refreshed. i got it in my birthday gift, but i think the pricepoint is unreasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: she is great and she is amazing. itu2019s super hydrating and not heavy on the skin, it absorbs pretty quickly and doesnu2019t leave that oily cast some moisturizers sometimes leave on your skin. i love it but BOY does it smell like garlic sauce.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a travel size cream and cleanser from this line as today is my birthday. This cream is very good. It plumps, hydrates and leaves the skin soft for a long time. Lately my skin is a little bit irritated by a new retinol serum I started to use and this cream did not react harshly with it as some others I use did. Unscented. Non greasy. My only thing is ... as good as this cream is, it is way overpriced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most luxurious product I have ever owned. Feels like putting velvet on my face. I love using this at night as my moisturizer to lock everything in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail. Sensitive, dry, occasional acne prone skin. This stuff is amazing! Just makes my skin look plump, and glowy without causing me to breakout like others have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Moisturizer ever SERIOUSLY! I have combination skin oily t-zone but the rest of my face gets seriously dry. I use this once in the morning my skin feels hydrated all day. This and my skin care routine made my skin have a serious GLOW! Everyoneu2019s skin is different. And what may work for me or someone else, may not work the same for other ppl. Learn your skin care needs pay attention to what your skin tells you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this is extremely sticky and thick, but not in a rich creamy moisturizing way. It feels like applying corn syrup to the face, and I don't see how this could work for any skin type

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 44 w/dry to combination skin on my face.  I have swore by clinique and glossier creams, among others, for many many years..  My skin always felt dry regardless of how much lotion I put on until Tatcha.  I have to be honest and say if you can't buy the face wash to go with the cream you're really missing out as I was until recently.    I hope it helps just one person to not feel like their face will never feel quenched or youthful again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll admit that my skin looked great and moisturized when I used this however, this gave me really bad breakouts which went away/stopped after discontinuing. Beware if youu2019re acne prone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It did help a tiny bit with dryness, other than that it's pretty disappointing. Super sticky and make my face look so oily, yet doesn't absorb well. Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity? didn't help any of that. So expensive, I wish I would have my refund.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a sample set with the moisturizer. I have combination skin and struggle with cystic acne on my cheeks and acne on chin. I used this for 2 weeks and I immediately felt hydrated and not sticky at all. I bought the normal size and it's been 2 months. my skin is more smooth and even texture. barely any acne on my chin and my cheeks mostly cleared up. I wear  N95s at work so it's impossible to avoid maskne. The price is way more than what I usually pay but if it works then stick with it! I only need a plump pea size amount toi. Highly recommend!
Product is awesome. I got the mini as a free sample and it completely cured my dry skin and made it dewy and glowy

reviews.review_title: Beautiful for fall-winter on dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this is expensive and there are lots of great creams out there. But this is so incredible. I recently bought my second jar. It is worth the price for the fall-winter months if you have dry skin, in my opinion. This moisturizes well without being greasy. If you can try the mini size or a sample, I would recommend doing that before buying. I will continue to buy this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sampled a ton of beauty products over the years. Most are fine but nothing special that I makes me go buy the full sized version (or write a review). I donu2019t know what it is about Tatcha, but every product of theirs I try, I seem fall in love with. This one was no different. It feels instantly soothing and hydrating when I put it on my face and leaves my skin incredibly soft and bright. It also has a lovely smell and beautiful packaging and feels like a luxury to use. It is definitely pricey, but I would rather pay more for a product that I love and works well on my skin than one that is just ok.

reviews.review_title: Love the product! just not the priceu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s really nice on the skin and leaves it super soft! I also love the way this smells too! My only thing is I think itu2019s way overpriced for the larger sizes so I canu2019t justify buying it myself! I only got it in a sampler!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first my skin needed to get used to it. It got a little bumpy. But thatu2019s often with my skin when trying new products. Then I was going to send it back because I didnu2019t notice much of a change after a week or 2. Now that it has been a month, I am keeping it. My skin looks so healthy, no bumps and overall better! Itu2019s the first moisturizer to not clog my pores!!! That alone is magical to me. All moisturizers usually clog my pores and make me sweat. Great job Tatcha! Oh and the packaging is gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this worked wonders for me but now it seems as though the formula changed or maybe the other person that thinks it changed and I got the same batch and it wasn't mixed properly? I'm not sure, I just opened my new one and it isn't nearly as moisturizing as it usually is and i've been using it for years. I'm not sure what to do, i'm just hoping my skin will tolerate this batch because i'd hate to scrap it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended to get the Tacha Dewy Moisturizer and Rice Wash Cleanser by a Sephora employee for my skin type (combo-oily, super oily t-zone, dry patches on my cheeks and outer corners of my eyes). I first got the $25 travel set as a trial pack, and WOW did it have more product in it than I thought it would. The two tiny containers lasted me 3 weeks. More than enough time to see how my skin would handle the new skincare routine. I wash and moisturize my face twice a day and Iu2019ve seen a tremendous improvement to my skin. I would have bright red breakouts on my chin, all over my jaw, cheeks, in between my eyebrows, my forehead and hairline. I have had a pimple maybe once in the past few weeks now? I do have scarring and some discoloration from years of picking at my poor skinu2014so I will be looking for a spot treatment for any pop-up zits and dark spots, BUT! I love this stuff. A little goes a long way and itu2019ll last you forever. The moisturizer smells good, has a nice feeling, dries quickly and has your skin feelings so incredibly soft. I was worried since this is a u201cdewyu201d moisturizer but Iu2019m less oily after using this moisturizer than if I used an oil-free or gel based one as I have in the past. Nourishing and moisturizing without leaving your skin feeling oily or greasy. Iu2019m just so happy I finally found something that worked! Totally worth the money, I buy this stuff maybe once every 2 or 3 months? Yes, it will last you that long. I just wanted to share in case someone also struggling with combo-oily, acne-prone skin was feeling iffy based on the reviews. Try the travel size! Your skin deserves it. <3

reviews.review_title: My skin feels so soft and youthful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so good and soft since using the Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer.   I have tried different moisturizers over the past couple years with never results like this as I would have irritation as the different lines would be either too rich, have properties that would cause breakouts or even worse dry my skin out even more.   My skin has changed in the past five years from oily combination screen to dry rosacea break outs and some fine lines. I tried the cleanser from this line with the combination of this moisturizer but found the cleanser stripped moisturizer from my skin so for me it was not a good combination.  My skin was just ok but didnu2019t feel great and felt dry.   I really loved this moisturizer though and knew there must be a cleanser  that is milder but yet soothing for my acne rosacea skin that would be complimentary with this moisturizer.  I lucked out as after experimenting using  CeraVe SA cleanser and the Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream moisturizer found it was a winning combination. Must be the ceramides & salicylic acid in the cleanser that keeps the skin blemish free. The Tatcha moisturizer works beautifully after I cleanse my skin as it gives the bonus moisturizing plumping properties. My husband complimented my skin and and that made me feel so good that it is noticeable.  Iu2019m happy as my skin feels healthy and youthful again.

reviews.review_text: I've received this product as a trail size in the birthday sample kit. My skin is on the dry side. I've also been introducing retinal to my skin care regimen which adds on to the dryness. I've tried 3 different kinds of moisturizers (farmacy, laneige, drmtlgy) they was not hydrating enough. I've also tried Clinique dramatically hydrating jelly and cerave which seems to help somewhat. With this cream being my last resort, I've tried it and it just soaked into my skin and my skin felt incredibility hydrating. It has been months since my skin felt completely hydrated. It does leave a super dewy look. A little really does go a long way. I feel like too much can contribute to pore clogging which I haven't experienced.  It looks well under my skin tint moisturizer but 1st allow this to settled into your skin before make up application. The reason why I removed a star is because I am not a fan of jar packing (although the packing is absolutely stunning), I do not like the the last 5 irritating ingredients at the bottom of list (listed on the packaging and tatcha website) which are: alcohol, fragrance, citral, limonene, and linalool. Although these ingredients do not irritated my skin personally, but overtime with repeated usage, I do not know what kind of affects this will have on my skin.  The fragrance is light and has a spa like smell. It is not overpowering and it do not linger. However the facial wash is quite strong. I've purchased this full size and will continue to use until otherwise my skin dislikes it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 45 years old... so this is thru the lens of a middle-aged woman.   If you want a LOT of hydration, I'd go for both this and also the dewy skin mist they sell. This is probably one of the most hydrating things I've used on my face, but it's not hugely irritating and fairly creamy (not heavy) for the amount of hydration it gives you.   I have very sensitive skin and this brand doesn't bother my skin.   The two products that seem to be the winners for my skin are this and Sulwhasoo's anti-aging First Care Serum.   I use the Tatcha oil Cleanser to take off my makeup, the Sulwhasoo serum after, and then this as my moisturizer.   The first picture is 6 hours after I put on my makeup with this moisturizer underneath and I used the Dewy Mist just for fun- I am not sure I even needed to use the Mist. The second picture is with my makeup off and after going thru my cleansing routine.   If you think these are good results and you're around my age, I'd try this.   P.S.   If you double cleanse and have sensitive skin like I do, be mindful. The oil cleanser is great, but I have noticed that double cleansing can be highly irritating- just my opinion with my own skin sensitivity and likely the age of my skin. If I just use the routine I listed above? Perfect.

I never write reviews but I wanted to leave this here to maybe help someone whou2019s struggling with the same skin issues & is frustrated that nothing works. I get it. But just try this. Itu2019s working for me. Pics are of my skin before using this & now six days later using the products morning & night. La version spu00e9ciale 75 ml nu2019a aucune odeur et cu2019est tru00e8s dommage car la version originale sent si bon! Vraiment dommage, je suis du00e9u00e7ue de mon achatu2026

reviews.review_text: I started using  the water cream and although I enjoyed it and received compliments (my boyfriend asked if I got botox) I needed something a bit more moisturizing, I already have oily acne prone skin and thought maybe the dewy cream would be too heavy for me, but it absolutely is not. Been using this just at night for about 6 months and have noticed significant improvement in my skin.  It's smoother, more glow and radiance, and plumping up.  I can wear a bare face now and look like I have perfect skin.  Don't be discouraged by the reviews about acne.  Acne is caused by estrogenic drinks like coffee and grains which mess with your hormones, not skincare!!  clean up your diet for beautiful skin and keep it that way with tatcha

reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to purchase this for some time but I'm always hesitant with commercial brand moisturizers/overhyped products etc. I typically only use professional grade stuff from the beauty store depots. However, I kept seeing how everyone raves about this so I I finally gave in. Here's my insight.  + Feels nice on skin + Hydrates  + Feels nice in the morning + Cute packaging?  CONS +INCREDIBLE ARTIFICIAL SMELL. It's so overwhelming, and can be a bit irritating to the face and nose! +O.K moisturizing. You can find so much better results. +Insanely Overpriced!   If you want to pay for an overpriced product and get mediocre results, then this is for you.  ALTERNATIVE: Try the SERENE lac 10 moisturizer for night time. You'll wake up feeling like a different person, I kid you not. skin feels gooey and elasticky, feels amazing. similar price point for more product and MUCH better / noticeable results from the FIRST try. it's a professional product so Im not sure if it's available for everyone but if you can get your hands on it, dont hesitate. note: You cannot go into the sun with it on your face. it's really for night time / morning and wash off before being exposed to the sun.   I have sensitive skin / rosacea.

I have been using this nearly every day since early Feb (still lots left in my trial jar) and my skin has never looked and felt better. It is positively glowing! I have not had any breakouts like thick I have in the past with thick lotions, and didn't have any skin issues during my monthly cycle which can sometimes result in a small breakout. I tend to have rosy cheeks and don't like going out without at least foundation on to even out my skin tone. After using this for over a month, I don't even need foundation! This is the only change I have made in my skincare routine. It is dewy and leaves a glow. It does leave a shine, but it doesn't feel greasy to me.

reviews.review_text: This moisturizer pills and leaves your face feeling greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i had so much acne from my skin acting up and being dry but this actually completely cleared it out. I'm still amazed. it feels so hydrating even though I use the smallest amoutn

reviews.review_title: My skin is obssessed for this and nothing else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never loved a moisturizer this much until I started using this Tatcha dewy skin cream. The application glides on as smooth as butter. You only need to use a small amount to nourish your skin. I have tried switching moisturizers because of the price of this one, but other moisturizers didn't leave my face as hydrated as tatcha's; With other brands, my skin felt bumpy and flakey, but with tatcha, it becomes so smooth and even!!! This moisturizer has a slight sweet fragrance, I highly recommend it for people who normally dislike products with fragrance, it just leaves you smelling fresh, yet it is not overpowering what so ever. The price is quite shocking but it is well worth it since you only need to use a small amount to cover your face, it can last for up to 5 months with the standard size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw someone recommend this product on an IG story and put it on my wishlist. A few friends got this and the Tatcha Violet-C Brightening Serum for my birthday, and WOW. Over the past few weeks, I have had to double-check myself in the mirror because I'm shocked by how smooth my face looks! My complexion looks so soft and brighter, and many of my sunspots and scars have faded into the background, which was my biggest concern. They are still there if you look hard enough, but they are not as noticeable as before. The moisture also works incredibly well for my normal-dry skin during the winter season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: so incredibly nice on the skin. i have super dry skin and this, twice a day has completely transformed my skin. i have a constant glow, i look healthy and alive. plus it smells so nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick consistency but a little too heavy for my skin type. I have dry skin so if youu2019re acne prone, I wouldnu2019t recommended this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is officially my favorite moisturizer. It goes on so creamy & smooth and it rehydrates & soothes my dry, tight winter skin. I canu2019t wait to repurchase in the large size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really good for dry skin. I feel like it definitely plumps fine lines and it smells so good. I use this nightly.

reviews.review_title: I love this product way too much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I used it for about two weeks and I will probably end up buying the actual size. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i would totally re purchase of it didnu2019t have fragrance. thatu2019s a BIG no for me because it breaks me out so bad but it is very hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer for dry skin. SO hydrating, dewy, and smells great too. It's pricey, but I'll keep repurchasing it. So far, nothing even comes close to being this good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the trial box as my birthday gift. I absolutely love the cleaner and the face cream! My skin has never looked better! This has changed the game for me and even though itu2019s expensive itu2019s worth it! I use the rice wash, the dewy skin cream, fenty fat water toner and vitamin c oil. If youu2019re like me and have normal skin but itu2019s sometimes dry and dull give this combo a try!!

reviews.review_title: Dewy skin at first, after 2 months felt drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m late 20s with normal skin. The first time I tried this moisturizer I absolutely loved it, enough to repurchase. My skin felt hydrated and dewy. After using for 2 months, I donu2019t feel the same effects. I find my skin is often dry and I need to use another moisturizer to compensate. After application it has started to cause sensitivity and trigger small red patches on my face. It has beautiful packaging, and I did initially enjoy the cream, but I would not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this moisturizer, BUT I was extremely disappointed to find that 1/3 of the container was AIR. It feels great, and my skin loves it, but for the price, not filling the product completely feels very scammy. I can literally see the bottom of the container and itu2019s untouched by product, so this isnu2019t a case of the product settling strangely during transit. Itu2019s a pretty sizable air pocket. Iu2019m looking for a new moisturizer b/c itu2019s a no for me. I donu2019t care how much I like it, if Iu2019m not getting the amount I paid for.

reviews.review_title: made skin feel warm and prickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received the sample size of this as my Sephora birthday gift, and upon first use I determined that it wasnu2019t for me. The texture is more like an ointment rather than a thick, moisturizing cream, difficult to pick up and push around the skin. The product is tinted purple and includes shimmer, which seems like a lot for a skincare product. Most importantly, however, is the way my face felt after applying itu2014I wouldnu2019t say my skin is sensitive, but it definitely felt warm and prickly after applying it after my usual skincare products. The end result does produce a  dewy look but I would attribute that to the u201cointmentu201d texture that I mentioned and the shimmeru2026 really hoping it doesnu2019t break me out terribly in the morning like other reviewers have said.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Prepare for hydration. This cream is light and can feel on the greasy side. Use sparingly as a little bit will leave your skin very soft and dewy.  I did break out with tiny whiteads after using on my face, so I restrict it to my neck and chest. I feel like it's more of a luxury spa treat after a long bath than an everyday workhorse like Kiehls Daily Moisturizer.   Nice, light, clean smell. Not heavily scented. A nice touch after a shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!  Skin feels so smooth and silky all day!  Noticeable right away.  Canu2019t recommend highly enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as my Birthday Gift option this year along with the cleanser. Iu2019m not someone who cares what the packaging looks like, Iu2019m more concerned with if the product preforms. I hate to say, this is pretty awful. Itu2019s incredibly fragranced, tinted purple (why?) and stays tacky for quite some time. I donu2019t see any benefit to adding fragrance to skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What a great moisturizer ! I have pretty dry skin in the winter and this felt great on my face. Itu2019s a nice thick formula and makes the skin look amazing. I got this as my birthday gift this year and I would repurchase but the price is just too high, thatu2019s the only reason itu2019s getting a 4 and not a 5! But really a great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a couple of years now & it is the BEST thing ever!  It feels super nice & it makes my skin look so glowy.  I never want to use anything else.  This is the HG for me.  I put Ilia's tinted serum over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: About to buy my third jar - everything about this moisturizer is just superior. The smell and texture is perfect, I apply this at night and when I wake up my skin is plump and super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had been searching for a replacement moisturizer after the brand I was using changed formulas. This was one of approximately a dozen brands I tried and it worked best for me. I accidentally overused a retinol which dried out my skin and this did an amazing job at normalizing my skin.  It is definitely worth the price for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product. I have been using religiously (1-2x per day) for the last two months and it has done wonders for my skin. It has improved skin texture, breakouts, and hydration. This also helps my skin have a natural glow, especially under foundation. I highly recommend this moisturizer to anyone who is looking for good quality skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for my birthday gift from Sephora and I am obsessed! My skin looks flawless.

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wowu2026 I canu2019t believe I avoided this moisturizer and brand in general for years.   I received the mini version for my birthday gift this month and I put it on. Wow, Iu2019m extremely mind-blown!   A little goes a long way. This is great for normal to dry skin. It leaves my skin extremely soft, moisturized, and of course, dewy. My makeup even looks flawless when I have this moisturizer on. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I live in a dry winter climate and during the winter months I donu2019t think my skin could take it without this moisturizer. Tried switching due to price point and nothing else makes the cut. Rich and creamy texture that hydrates my skin and is the best supporting role to all of my actives (retinol, lactic acid). Worth every penny. It goes on a little thick so you donu2019t need much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer as my birthday gift from Sephora. First, it does not absorb into the skin-it just sits on top of my skin like Vaseline. This resulted in excessively shiny face. I think with long term use it could clog pores. Additionally I cannot stand the scent- itu2019s very synthetic/artificial like cheap plastic. To achieve DEWY SKIN like this product is claiming to do, itu2019s most effective to use the combo of chemical exfoliator and moisturizing masks. This product does not deliver. I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Thick and moisturizing but goes on smooth with a nice amount of slip. Only use the size of a pea to put on and put SPF over top. Container lasts over a month with daily use. Scent is light but lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is AMAZING!  I am 58 and have combination skin.  I use it both morning and at bedtime.  You only need to use a very small amount, it goes a long way.  When I wake up in the morning my skin is so soft. During the day under my makeup it keeps my skin plump but not greasy at all!! Could not love this product any more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Left my skin very oily. I tried using it twice and it doesnu2019t seem to make my dry patches hydrated. Very disappointed and will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample size in my birthday gift. I was very excited for it as I've used other Tatcha products and they work well but this one really missed the mark. It is very oily, greasy, and thick. I have dry skin, so I thought this product would work well for me, but it never absorbs in to the skin. I wore it for well over 2 hours after I applied it and it still felt oily and wet on my face, my hair was sticking to it, and it was clumping up so everytime I touched my face there would be little clumps of cream coming off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just like all skin care products, it's a trial and error. I personally have had no issues and really love the feel of this product. My skin is beautiful when I wake up, but I assure you less is more with this. Yes it is thicker, so again, trial and error. I never buy a full size product without giving it a with a mini size first. The rice wash is beautiful and I use this moisturizer JUST at night because it is heavier. I've purchased cheap a** products off Amazon that have worked great, and I've also splurged on brand name products that do nothing for me. I got lucky with this one, but again I get the mini sizes to try first. Cleansing oils/moisturizing oils make me break out, whereas other people love them. I recommend this product and I am a fair, sensitive skinned, freckled ginger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with sensitive combo skin this honestly did nothing for me. Felt like I had to constantly reapply and def didnu2019t give my skin a dewy look and feel. Packaging is cute tho!

The pros of this product is my skin looked visibly more dewy/radiant after application. My skin felt hydrated and the application was smooth. The cons (in my opinion) are the smell is not my favourite and I thought it would be a more rich/thick cream as explained. To me, it wasn't thin but it wasn't overly heavy/rich like I anticipated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how this moisturizer first goes on to the skin. I received it in a subscription service. Then I saw the ingredients. Too many known irritants like color, fragrance, and pore cloggers like silicone in this one. Hard pass

reviews.review_title: Does not absorb well for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample as part of a birthday gift. The initial texture feels lovely but once Iu2019ve applied it I found it to be very greasy and thick. Also quite fragrant. I would not consider this moisturizer for oily or combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really bummed I didnu2019t like this product since I love the Rice Wash. It was just too dewy and sticky for me and I broke out a lot from it. I ended it up using it as a body moisturizer to not waste it and that worked well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this in IPSY. And Glow Recipe Watermelon serum , in Boxycharm .These 2 with the Tatcha face wash , from the line has done a 360 on my face. Now I have such a clear face with a beautiful glow , before I even start adding after product . after I wash. Now I am a regular purchaser of them .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Left my dry and sensitive skin with patchy dry spots. unfortunately, this is not it for me.

reviews.review_title: I hate that I love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really really hate myself for loving this so much. It has a really nice light scent that doesn't linger on the skin and you need so little. Smaller than a pea size so it's going to last forever. I think the people who think this is too oily either have the wrong skin type for this cream, wrong climate or they're putting too much on. It applies very smoothly and feels like silk. It is a heavier cream that takes a while to absorb, but it doesn't feel that heavy on the face. I was really shocked to see how thick it is, but it feels so silky like thick whipped cream. It adds a really nice glow to my face too. What I really love about this cream is how moisturized and smooth it leaves my face even after I wash it. It keeps my face moisturized, smooth and glowy both in -30u00b0C windy weather and when my heater blasting all day and night. I'm currently using a trial size, but I'm definitely purchasing the full size when I'm out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t wanna love this because of the price, but I fell in love the minute I tried the small sample version. No problem throwing money at this stuff now because my skin looks so damn radiant and glowing in the middle of -5u00b0 arctic air winter. This is a permanent must for me now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I use it with the Violet-C Brightening Serum and the Silky Peony Melting Eye Cream. It works for my dry complexion, makes my skin feel nourished and hydrated. Love the glow, would recommend and always buy more once out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail! I use this every morning, evening and night.

reviews.review_title: if youu2019re oily/combo, do not bother at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream I ever tried! Very good for my dry skin, I would totally recommend!:)

If you don't have dry skin I wouldn't use it in the summer, it may make you oily and 'over moisturized'.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this broke me out the next day :)) it doesnu2019t absorb either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I know we all have different skin, so reviews should always be taken with a grain of salt. That being said, this is my favorite moisturizer of all time. I can see a noticeable difference in my skin, it makes you look hydrated and brighter (maybe thatu2019s when used with the other skincare products I use!). If it helps, I have pretty u201cnormalu201d skin (not dry or oily) and use this with a face oil (Sunday Riley) and vitamin C serum (Olehenriksen) daily. I know everyone says not to splurge on moisturizer but I really really love this and make sure I never run out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It is thick and it is borderline oily looking when you use too much BUT it does moisturize and leave a glow under make up. A lot of people say this pills but theyu2019re simply not waiting long enough before applying face makeup. I donu2019t know how long I can pay 70$ for a moisturizer so I am on the hunt for an alternative but there is a reason why itu2019s a cult favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This cream is very hydrating. Love it, put has too much fragance in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for a few weeks. Was struggling with dry skin since itu2019s winter.. this cream is hydrating and moisturizing! It does leave your skin looking dewy..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo/normal skin, I get dry in winter and oilier in the summer. I like glowy foundations, powders and concealers, Iu2019m fine looking like a donutu2026  The first thing I thought was:  this smells so bad(floral pine-sole but worse?)u2026 why does is feel like vaselineu2026   I feel like I put grease on my face and Iu2019m gonna break out if I keep using itu2026Thatu2019s the only u201cplumpingu201d sensation I got.  Got it for the Sephora birthday gift and it didnu2019t live up to the hype, Iu2019ll stick to my gel moisturizers. Only get this if your skin is in a constant state of the Sahara and crackling like a reptile and even still tread lightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the best moisturizer Iu2019ve ever tried. My skin is naturally dry, but during the winter is when it gets worse, to the point where i have dry spots. This moisturizer has helped so much and a little really goes a long way! Will definitely be used for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Combo leaning dry skinned gal here. I got this as a sample from a Sephora employee and it did not work out for me. Some how this managed to make my skin even more dry, Iu2019m thinking maybe because it has alcohol in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Iu2019m not typically a fan of products in a pot because of potential bacteria building up, but this one comes with a little spoon to scoop it out, (but I would still prefer it in a pump bottle).  It feels silky smooth when applying. My skin has been dryer than usual with our Canadian winter this year and this has kept my skin hydrated and plump. I havenu2019t been wearing foundation or concealer so I canu2019t speak to how it performs under full-face makeup, but on its own itu2019s lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin so I use in the winter every other night. It smells amazing and leaves my skin very hydrated and moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is way too oily for my skin I hate it. Iu2019m so glad I didnu2019t buy and received for a birthday gift. Horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I admit it, the dew is real with this one. I personally find it to get a little sticky after prolonged use but Iu2019m sure that can be powdered away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this moisturizer fo lr years.  I have tried other products here and there but always come back to this Dewey cream.  It is so moisturizing and leaves your skin so glowy!  I pair it with the night cream which is just amazing!

reviews.review_title: itu2019s okay but expected more for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to splurge and get this product with my Christmas gift cards. It makes my skin so glowy and beautiful, itu2019s a huge confidence booster. The packaging is also super luxurious, will definitely purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dehydrated skin so I thought the dewy skin cream that everyone has been raving about would benefit my skin too. Unfortunately, it just gave me dry patches on my skin. This ain't it. I'm going back to Shiseido.

reviews.review_title: love how soft my skin feels
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Iu2019ve bought it twice since then, and love how moist it keeps my skin. I use it at night after washing my face and in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this combo for bday gift and although it feels amazing on skin and hydrated (dry skin, somewhat sensitive) it gave me painful acne! I tried it the next day and got 2 more pimples- painful. I have used so many clean products that I canu2019t even remember the last time I had acne.   Also didnu2019t notice a non-comedogenic description on box at all, I overlooked it.

reviews.review_title: I've found my forever face cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this moisturizer, especially in the fall and winter. As a 50-something redhead, I need a thicker cream to do the job. This soaks in beautifully without feeling greasy. I've definitely found my forever daily face cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you need silky moisturizer this is it. Not goopy or oily and leaves skin soft and silky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed an immediate improvement in the moisture of my skin over this winter. I layer this over the Inkey List Polyglutamic Acid Hydrating Serum in the daytime. It immediately fixed my dry, stinging face because of the winter weather. I canu2019t wait to continue to see and feel the great results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my 3rd bottle. This is magic in a bottle. It is hydrating & gives you a very dewy look. I have sensitive skin that gets red and itchy when products have ingredients that are irritating to my skin. So I tend to switch products to see what works. This moisturizer works so well with my sensitive skin. I put it on daily mornings and nights. It doesnu2019t seem to absorb, it stays on the skin but it still keeps my skin feeling hydrated. Honestly all I have been using lately is this moisturizer, an eye cream at night, and sunscreen during the day and my skin feels and looks good with no breakouts or irritation.  I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this cream since Iu2019ve only heard great things about Tatcha. Iu2019ve been in denial for the past 1.5-2 months Iu2019ve been using it that my face is NOT looking or feeling good. I suddenly have breakouts and my face looks oiler than ever in the middle of winter! This cream just sits on top of your skin giving it a greasy sheen. Wearing it to bed made it even worse. Sadly this will have to go to waste. Hopefully I can repair the damage itu2019s done to my skin soonu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as the trial size (5ml). It was at least half empty, and the contents were nothing like the images online - the moisturizer was hardened and not creamy at all. Even though it was just a trial size I was very disappointed. Would certainly not entice me to buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: TO ALL MY PEOPLE WITH DRY SKIN! THIS IS IT! I have very dry skin and I struggle with finding face creams that moisturize my skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEE this product! My face feels so moisturized!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Found my holy grail after a billion different tries. It works well together with my prescription lotion I  have to use on my dry eczema rosacea type skin, I LOVE this moisturizerI it's the only one that has really improved my skin, including the lines caused by intense dryness. keeps my skin moisturized all day. I recommended the other one to my brother which also improved his oily skin. It easily absorbs into the skin and doesn't make it feel too heavy. sometimes I get small cuts in my face due to dryness and the moisturizer does not cause burning. However it can be irritating for me sometimes, it's mostly due to the scent. After my skin calms down from a reaction though, it's completely fine again. It definitely was the least negative reactive moisturizer I've used.  Purchased the 75 ml size this year in April and still have enough for the rest of this year. I'm sure the 50ml is perfect amount to use for almost an entire year (although it probably depends on how much you need and cover your face)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It comes with a tiny spatula to help you pick up product, I use that every time to apply it and what the spatula picks up is more than enough to cover my whole face. I donu2019t know if people know this but if your local Sephora store is located inside a JCPennys store and you have gift cards from JCPennys, you can use that gift card at that Sephora. reviews.review_text: I love trying new products so it takes a lot for me to stick with just one. I am a huge fan of this cream. My skin tends to be dull and very dry, especially in the winter months. I would say I like it just as much as I like Drunk Elephant Protini (my holy grail moisturizer). If you are unsure, I recommend trying the travel sized kit first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is always so dry in the winter here in Calgary and no matter what moisturizer I would use from medical grade skincare, it never looked as dewy until I tried this cream from Tatcha. Seriously, made all the difference in how my skin looked with makeup! I was getting so frustrated not being able to find the right moisturizer for my dry skin. I highly recommend this moisturizer if you find your skin is looking really dull and dry under makeup. It also gives a really nice plumping effect, but unfortunately that's only temporary. This is my first time purchasing from Tatcha and I will definitely be buying more products from them moving forward. It is pricey, but you seriously get what you pay for.

reviews.review_title: worth it, but look for it on sale!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. My skin feels and looks hydrated and healthy.

reviews.review_text: So glad I finally tried this product. Leaves my skin feeling dewy and hydrated after application, and I wake up with soft and moisturized skin. Helped soothe my dry patches and got rid of my flaky skin. It is very expensive which stopped me from buying for a long time.  My skin is dry and sensitive, and my go-to moisturizers are the First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream and Belif True Cream Moisturizing Bomb. However I recently moved and my skin became drier than ever, with flakes and dry patches that werenu2019t going away, even with the addition of La Roche Posey Cicaplast Baume and REN Recovery Balm. This Tatcha moisturizer worked and helped my skin on first use, better than the others. I would only use this for dry or dehydrated skin. I have sensitive skin thatu2019s acne prone, and this hasnu2019t broken me out. Iu2019ve already repurchased during the winter sale in a gift set as I donu2019t want to be without this for the coldest months.

I am going to try Dr. Jart ceramics cream next to see how long lasting the moisture is especially since itu2019s about $20 cheaper.

And for the right person, this cream may be perfect, but it did not work for me. Almost immediately upon using I began developing deep painful cystic acne on my chin that disappeared after i stopped using it. Wasnu2019t the right match for my skin!

reviews.review_title: Clean at Sephora? Why the silicones?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I alternate with DE Protini cream which has a similar gel cream texture on my mid 40s, combo sensitive skin.  The texture is great, melts in the skin and overnight got rid of redness and parched patch. This is 5 stars.  Silicone is the 5th ingredients. It does not seem to clog pores and is not noticeable in the texture but why call it u201ccleanu201d?   Will repurchase still and highly recommend.  Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Value. Love this for my dry skin, and I don't need a lot each use so lasts me over 6 months I couldn't believe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am really enjoying this cream. I am currently using it at night under my retinol and it works beautifully, you do not need much and it spreads without any tugging. I really hope itu2019s nourishing enough to combat my winter dry skin (I usually have a u201cnormalu201d skin type most of the year-neither dry or oily), Iu2019m going to start using it in the daytime when it gets colder. It does a beautiful job at making the skin appear dewy without looking shiny or oily. I took off one star because of the added fragrance which might make my skin more sensitive if I chose to use this long term. This is an all around solid choice for a moisturizer and I think most buyers would be satisfied!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When the product is so good you need to tell the world. I suffer from eczema on my face and have tried SO many different creams of all price ranges; lama retro, fresh rose cream, water cream from LN some were good in not irritating but didnu2019t deliver enough moisture. I look for two things one that wonu2019t aggravate my eczema especially around my eyes but also one that hydrates it enough to keep the dry/flakiness at bay. I learned the hard way that I always need to try a product before buying and I can instantly tell if itu2019s going to irritate me or not. At Sephora I tried a sample and put a dab on my eczema prone skin to see if it would irritate and it seemed ok so I bought the kit of face wash, serum and cream and crossed my fingers.. let me tell you my skin is hydrated and plump and glowing and eczema no where to be found in just a few days. I cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer of all time. I have dry skin and this makes me look so radiant.

I didnu2019t find this product u201cgreasyu201d, though I would absolutely not recommend for those with oilier complexions. Definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the price! I have very dry skin, the only consistent moisture I have found to last all day/ night was LaMer, this is 1/3 the price & works beautifully! PLUS the spatula on the lid is So Nice!!!

reviews.review_title: I love it. Pricy but works.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer that I've tried so far.   I got many samples of it and then hesitated to buy it due to the price. I've been trying many options but I didn't find an absolute dupe. I did the jump and I don't regret it.   For people who have reactive dry skin, try a product with toleriane or toleridine in it : Laroche-Posay or Bioderma. You can use it daily, alterne it with the dewy cream. Tatcha alone reduces the pain, the pulling sensation and irritation that my face has by it's own, but I do use both and see a major difference.   A little bit goes A LONG WAY. Try to apply it when your face is a little humid. You don't need more than 2 dabs to cover your face and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It does leave the skin dewy but with my dry skin and make up it will even out to be a natural finish.   Highly recommend to others with dry skin.   I have tried FAB, skinfix, belief true cream, glow recipe banana, etcu2026 this is significantly more moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: My skin literally craves this lotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been suffering after stem cell transplant. Pre-leukemia, my skin was more oily/combination and I struggled keeping makeup from creasing or sliding off. After, I experienced issues that made me miss my pre-cancer skin.  Radiation brought on serious dryness issues and sensitivity and GVHD breakouts took away any hope of stability between the dryness bouts. I have been dedicated to using only Arbonne products for years, but suddenly, nothing was helping. I was going through cycles of horrible painful and itchy cystic breakouts, immediately followed by a mass peeling event. This lasted for the more than two years after transplant. After changing which Arbonne line I was using multiple times, to no avail, I decided it might be an intolerance to a common ingredient as it happened with all products, not just one.  I bought this magic cream based on the reviews alone, and I'm never buying another.  Within 24 hours the peeling had stopped and hasn't returned.  I haven't had a single GVHD breakout.  I go bare-skinned during the day now with confidence, when I NEVER left the house without at least a CC cream in the past - including before cancer.  This cream will always be in my routine now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
