reviews.review_text: not gonna lie mainly bought it for the packaging. But the cream is really nice too , it very luxurious feeling from the way you apply it using the golden spatula to the texture. I use it mainly as a night cream. 75mk is a lot of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin feel so hydrating and smooth. Will always be apart of my skin routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and this is great for my cheeks when they feel dry. When itu2019s winter and my skin is drier overall Iu2019ll probably use it all over, but I donu2019t need the extra moisture on my T zone in the summer. Iu2019ve also heard this works great to prep under eyes before makeup, but I havenu2019t tried it yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I purchase this moisturizer every winter . Only one that helps. Iu2019m in my thirties ,olive skin

reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling very dewy & it helped calm my redness a lot & while having sensitive skin this didnu2019t break me out at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this face moisturizer is a dream for sensitive dry skin. It is worth every dollar. This is like a dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a Christmas present from a dear friend. Been buying ever since. Ditched my go-to moisturizer for years because of this. The best one yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lowkey a little greasy, and Iu2019m pretty sure it broke me out, but I was hydrated throughout the night, always woke up nice and moisturized.

reviews.review_title: Did not like, but it did itu2019s job
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I knew the ingredient list was bad (Iu2019m very picky) but I wanted to know the hype anyways.. itu2019s good but for the price I expected it to do a lot more. The aesthetic is beautiful but a jar packaging is really unhygienic. Iu2019ve used this every night for two months and I probably have another month left however I noticed the texture of the cream looks different than when I first got it. It looks more watery and less whipped in the jar now but still applies and wears the same.. it probably changed texture because itu2019s exposed to air every time I open it which is why I prefer a tube or airless pump. For the price Iu2019m not thrilled, I will stick to other moisturizers that donu2019t have perfume because it made my face more red as well. There are better heavy creams with far better ingredients out there, But I knew all the possible issues before I bought it so I wonu2019t hold that against tatcha. I would not recommend this. Itu2019s a basic heavy moisturizer to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry and sensitive skin and this moisturizer has been a game changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream. I have combo skin, something acne. So this cream heals amazing. Skin feels soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tatcha dewy skin cream. Unisex and the tiniest amount goes a long way. Amazingly gives you that real dewy look immediately. I use it after cleansing and drying face. Last part of morning skin routine. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out so bad and I never break out. Felt really good going on but a few days later I looked like a young kid going through puberty lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been completely unimpressed with Tatcha Products.  This is So greasy, does not absorb at all!  I have very dry skin but this seems to just sit on top of the skin and NEVER ABORBS!  I have been using this at night and when I wake up in the morning it still feels like it is wet on my skin.  Itu2019s actually gross.  Unfortunately Iu2019ve tried several other products from Tatcha and I donu2019t think any of them really work well, disappointed spent a ton of money for lackluster products.  Donu2019t believe the hype!  If you want luxury skincare try La Mer much better products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hydrates and plumps so well!! this is my second tub of moisturizer that iu2019ve finished and iu2019ve noticed pretty drastic results on my face. my skin is much bouncier and doesnu2019t get that midday oil slick from lack of moisture. my skin feels so comfortable after application and the light scent is so refreshing! would recommend even at its higher price point, one of my holy grail items

reviews.review_title: Stay Away, comedogenic, will clog your every pore
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out in tiny pimples and gave my lips a huge allergic reaction. Iu2019ve tried the water cream, which was fine, but felt I needed more moisture. Stay away unless you want a moisturizer that will congest your face and ruin your  skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a believer! Love this stuff! Smells great - feels luxurious - gets the job done! It really can be used in place of a primer as well for daytime beauty. I can't see myself ever using another daytime cream and I am very interested in exploring other Tatcha products because the quality is excellent. This one is worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS CREAM! I have normal to dry and dehydrated skin, and it had done wonders for my skin. Because of its thickness, I use it as part of my nighttime skincare routine. Seriously, this product is just downright fabulous! I wake up the next day with soft, glowing skin. I can wear it alone and/or I can layer serums underneath it. I used to apply the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel to my skin at night, but this Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream has beaten it. Iu2019m officially a Tatcha fan! I may buy the whole Dewy Skin skincare line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it leaves your skin soft and supple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW.  I had never spent this much on a skin care product.  But I had this Sephora gift card and decided to splurge.  My skin (not young) is dry, flaky and just dull looking.  I've never had a cream like t his.  Dewy doesn't do it justice.  It's not oily, soaks into skin leaving behind a soft glow.   I am going to have to find a way to fit this expense into my budget because I'll be purchasing for a long time to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many creams, & always had to follow up with a thin layer of Vaseline. I no longer have to do that because of this cream! This is THE only product that works for me! It's perfect for combination to dry skin with flaky skin tendencies like mine. It cured the dryness on my face that I spent years trying to resolve!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfectly creamy and hydrating for my sensitive skin! Iu2019m so glad I invested in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving it.. this cream is so moisturizing, I love the texture, the smell, my skin looks plumped the next morning. I feel it has also improved my pores. I recommend it and I will surely buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Makes My Skin Soft and Moisturized
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I asked the sales clerk what SHE uses and she recommended this moisturizer.  A little goes a long way and it makes my skin soft and moisturized; I use it as a night moisturizer.  I like the build-in dip stick as well.  I use this with the Tatcha cleanser and the combination works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer ever. It is very heavy. I only use it at night or with very dry skin during a season change. I have repurchased several times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its a game changer. It leaves the skin hydrated all day, looks dewy and healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have very dry skin due to eczema, that is over my lip area. But with this product I have the right amount of hydration that allows my makeup stay on and looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Keeps my skin soft and I love the smell. I donu2019t think it makes it Dewy though...but maybe my age has something to do with that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this for about 4 days and Iu2019m already hooked. It makes my makeup look better, and my skin look healthy and glowy. Iu2019ve been wanting to try Tatcha for a while now, and bought the mini size to test it out. Needless to say, I will be purchasing the full size. Iu2019m normally a bargain shopper, but this stuff is WORTH. EVERY. PENNY.

reviews.review_title: wanted to love, fragrance made it impossible
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I get that everyone has different skin, and I wanted so bad to love this product, but it wasnu2019t it for me! I have dry, incredibly sensitive, slightly rosacea-prone skin and this product was unfortunately a disaster. It is luxurious and beautiful, but despite being a u201ccleanu201d product, my skin reacted to the fragrance INSTANTLY. It smells wonderful, but itu2019s not ideal for sensitive skin. I wish I could have tried it for a few days to see how the hydration lived up to the hype, but I had to wash it off quickly due to the reaction to the fragrance!

reviews.review_title: MOST AMAZING! Swapped out La Mer for this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer Iu2019ve ever used. Iu2019ve been using the La Mer Treatment Lotion and Moisturizer for about a year now, and the moisturizer really helps my dry, cracked skin because I live in the desert. I was going through so much of it and my friend suggested this Tatcha, and I fell in LOVE! I had been using the blue Tatcha water cream as my normal everyday moisturizer for several years, but this dewy one is superior (especially now that Iu2019m in my 30s). MUST NEVER BE DISCONTINUED!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light fragrance and the way it feels when I apply it, but this moisturizer always breaks me out. My skin problems tend to be redness and pores, not acne, so the fact that I get an acne outbreak whenever I try to use this regularly tells me that something in the ingredients is either very clogging or just not the right thing for my skin. However, I know folks who use it regularly and love it. Definitely something to buy in a trial size first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer. I love how soft and dewy my face feels all day.

reviews.review_title: If you are on the dry side, just buy it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I never take the time to write reviews for products but this is just different.  This is the MOST moisturizing cream I have ever used in my life. After so many moisturizers that hydrate for a short while only to leave my skin feeling dry & dehydrated after a short while, this is a breath of fresh air. The moisture lasts ALL DAY and ALL NIGHT long. You can wear it under makeup and on its own. Everybody that I know has told me that my skin looks better and glowy since I started using this, and they donu2019t even know I began using a new product, they just see massive differences in my complexion.   My skin feels so soft, it is plumping up like crazy! My under eye hallows are almost completely gone and my smile lines have decreased insanely much. My entire complexion as a whole is just better and more youthful looking.  This is very thick and may not be suitable for oily people or acne prone skin, due to just how hydrating it is. But for us dry, dehydrated, and/or hallowed skin folks, this stuff is a game changer. Expensive but worth it. I will be repurchasing as soon as I run out of this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s scented really nicely and does feel great when you first rub it in, but itu2019s way to greasy for me. Makes me feel like I have a layer of oil sitting on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was scared to try this because I have combination acne-prone skin. Very few products donu2019t cause my sensitive skin to feel like burning but this one (even tho is fragranced) is very hydrating and definitely has replenished my skin moisture barrier so I can use it only in my night routine and not reapply during the day. My fave part about it is that it doubles as an eye cream. I took out one star because I have some fine lines under my eyes from using concealer and this cream doesnu2019t seem to live up to its anti-aging claims. I will definitely finish it and might repurchase if I donu2019t find sth that works just as well but with a lower price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If i could give this zero stars, I would. This is awful. not sure why itu2019s a fan fave. It doesnu2019t absorb into the skin, it made me break out horribly, and it made my face feel so greasy. not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for about 5 months now. It has a really nice consistency and itu2019s only lightly scented, and it does give a nice glow if used morning and night. However, I live in Saskatchewan (dry and freezing cold half of the year) and this just didnu2019t hydrate my skin well enough. Even now that itu2019s spring I still have a stubborn patch of red, dry skin by my nose and this moisturizer has not helped much at all. I also have acne-prone skin and I noticed this will clog pores and break you out if you use too much, so make sure to use no more than a pea-sized amount. I think this would be good for people who live in a place with mild weather, but if you live somewhere dry/cold, you will need something more hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer,  hands down! Since turning 35 my skin started becoming super dry and dull. The dewy cream was a game changer.  My skin is supple, moisturized and stays that way all day. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so much but it was too greasy for me and it didnu2019t absorb into my skin at all.

reviews.review_title: Worth the price, a little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see a lot of people saying this gives them acne breakouts.  Maybe cause they use too much, too often or itu2019s something else? Idk. But I have combination (more oily) skin & somehow this doesnu2019t ever make me breakout. I use a very small amount all over my face & neck 3-4 times a week. Only at night. I let it sink in for at least an hour before sleeping because itu2019s so dewy. The rest of the week I use Tatcha Water Cream because itu2019s lighter. Personally I absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way & surprisingly it doesnu2019t have an overpowering smell that triggers my very sensitive scent allergies. Iu2019m in my 30u2019s now & have been using anti aging skincare since I was in my early teens - premature aging isnu2019t something Iu2019ve ever wanted. They say the skin gets drier & duller as we age (which is why I added this to my nighttime routine) & itu2019s been doing pretty well now for almost a year - in terms of keeping my skin moisturized. Dryness isnu2019t an issue for me, but dullness can be if I slack for a few days (covid lazy lul). Anyway, I highly recommend at least trying this out. The price tag is high, but I believe the shelf life is 12mo (?) so really itu2019s not expensive once a year if you think about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my 6th bottle of this. If you have dry skin itu2019s amazing especially for night time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Your skin will be dewy! It can be tricky to find the right product for sensitive combination skin but found everything i was looking for. After using this for the last year my skin has kept a supple glowing in a way that looks natrual. The one down side is if my skin is having break out it can make it worse. Make sure you only use a small amount in morning and night or it may feel only. I promise you only need a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but I have tried SO HARD to like Tatcha products, and after this one Iu2019ve thrown in the towel. I love the way it feels, but immediately after starting to use it my skin felt dryer, rougher, and I broke out horribly. This was right after trying and hating the essence, which also made my skin feel like sandpaper. Officially done with this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me it works great when my skin is dry but when I use it for more than couple weeks it clogs my pores and unfortunaletly it gives me acnes...  I really liked it at the begining because it really moistured my skin very well. I wouldnt recommend it for person who has a problem with acnes but other than that its quiet cool

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally dry skin.  This moisturizer is the first one I have found in a long time that actually does what it says it'll do.  It's made with wonderful ingredients that don't harm your skin It actually absorbs and does not leave your face feeling oily. I finally found a moisturizer I can trust.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not care how miracle this product is, this is unexceptable for a $68 product. I spend a lot of money on luxury skin care product and this is the first time I receive a product that only come 2/3 of the jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not hydrating at all. I bought the duo with the face wash. My skin wakes up tight and dry and itu2019s May. The wash says cream but itu2019s foaming. If youu2019re in the 35+ age range and donu2019t have oily skin, donu2019t waste your money or time. One star for clean ingredients, would have given second for eco-friendly packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry flakey skin, along with sensitivity. I am a longtime Tatcha lover and had high hopes for this moisturizer. But unfortunately it made me break out LIKE CRAZY. I never get acne, except for the occasionally hormonal acne... but this was bad. Little bumps everywhere. I tried only applying it to the really bad/ dry areas of my face, but the same thing happened. Such a shame because I do feel like it moisturized my face good, but totally useless at this point. Gave it 2 stars for the moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skin care is not one size fit all, but as a 48yo perimenopausal woman with dry to normal skin, this moisturizer really brings back the youthful dewy glow. I don't think it would be good for those with oily or acne prone skin. If you have mature skin, and make this part of your routine after a good serum and before a dewy highlighter and then sunscreen, hello youthful fresh glow.

reviews.review_title: A little dabu2019ll Dew Ya. Had to MacGuyver it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought the value size. Because who doesnu2019t love a bargain, amirite? Hereu2019s the thing though, my skin is wonky. Sometimes itu2019s too dry, sometimes itu2019s oily, and the Dewy cream just confuses it. It doesnu2019t know if it just wants to be overly shiny, hydrated, or both of those things depending on whether or not Mercury is in Retrograde.   However, I have DRY skin everywhere else. My neck. My du00e9colletu00e9. My legs. Everywhere else is the great printer paper white Sahara.   u201cbUt Itu2019S sO eXpEnSiVe If YoU uSe It As A lOtIoN!u201d.  Naw. A little dabu2019ll dew ya. And itu2019s not greasy or sticky.   Plus, it has that little 6M at the bottom. Meaning, you best use it entirely in six months. Except, Tatcha products are MADE to be used in tiny, humble, and modest amounts. When I got the Water Cream sample it lasted me almost a month. The full size lasted a little over six months. And thatu2019s using it twice a day. The size of a pearl like they suggest (okay, okay, maybe my u201cpearl sizeu201d is more like freshwater pearl sized).  So, if you buy it. And youu2019re disappointed because your skin flip flops between oily, dry, combo, and acne...but youu2019re drier than Death Valley in the middle of summer, it makes a nice lightweight moisturizer for everywhere else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best moisturizer for dry/combo skin. I have been using La Mer and augustinus bader for a year and I happened to re-try this cream after a mid-day face wash, and it truly has resolved the dry skin Iu2019ve been experiencing for months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail moisturizer. So light and moisturizing. My skin looks so plump and glowy. It is hard on the wallet (it is worth it). But with times being hard right now I do think the Neurtogena Hydroboost Gel Cream Extra-Dry. Fragrance Free. But has to be the fragrance free version so watch if you ever purchase!!!! But Tatcha moisturizer is still my favourite and again, is worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Wish I would bought it sooner, I love it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you havenu2019t tried this product, let me tell you.. You're sleeping on it! I wish I had tried it sooner... My face stays very well hydrated with this product. I will stick with it for sure!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to buy a moisturizer that got discontinued by Kate Somerville last year and have been on the hunt for anything similar ever since. After trying SEVERAL different moisturizers, I finally found this. It leaves my dry skin SOO soft, plump, and supple. Get this. You will not regret it
Bought this for my mom and she loves it. Itu2019s. A little pricey for a moisturizer but it worths as my mom loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this with a vitamin c serum and peptides...it works beautifully.  Iu2019ve been trying the Augustinus Bader Rich Cream over the past month because of all the hype.  My skin is missing this Tatcha Dewy Cream!  Back to it for a few days now and my skin is thanking me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely moisturizes well - my combination skin liked it well enough in Canadian winter months, however, it is too heavy for the warmer weather. I also had to dock a star for the price as there are a lot of moisturizers that can do same/similar job for much more affordable price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a great night cream, does what it supposed to do and surprisingly doesnu2019t break me out! I have to deduct a star though because of the strong fragrance. If you donu2019t already know, fragrance irritates acne even more if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love love love this moisturizer!! i havenu2019t found anything like it! my face is always soo dry, especially living in Wisconsin in the winter... this stuff is literally heaven sent! only thing that truly lasts on my super dry skin, keeping it moisturized for over 12 hours (work 12 hr night shifts in a very dry hospital!) literally recommend this to everyone! expensive but works so well! so happy to have found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product I have combination skin and I feel like this does an amazing job at moisturizing my skin and leaving that dewy finish. Definitely wish it was cheaper but it is one of those products that is a must for me. Perfect for summer time to make your skin glow and I recommend it to my friends all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my second tatcha review! 2 weeks ago, I bought another brandu2019s moisturizer recommended to me by a Sephora lady. unfortunately, it didnu2019t work well as it made my skin tight and extremely dry. i went back to Sephora yesterday and exchanged the recommended moisturizer for the dewy skin cream. Today, I woke up with my skin feeling less dry and amazing !!!!! I canu2019t wait to incorporate it to my skincare routine along with the melting eye cream !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed to write this review, but this cream really made me break out badly. I have generally very clear skin and got zits all over my face. I appreciate that it is Clean and moisturizing, but i would only recommend for extremely dry skin or for someone with more mature skin to plump skin. Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super cute, but that's really about it. It gave me a super oil appearance to my skin, and didn't really hydrate it well for me. If you have dry skin, this might work better for you, but it was a solid no from me..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few products that I buy over & over again. I have dry skin & it works well for me.  It keeps me hydrated all day. It works well as a day & night cream. It does make my skin look dewy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a bad moisturizer or a good moisturizer. My skin is very dry but this is just way too oily for me, and therefore causes breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels great. Not too heavy and works well under foundation and other serums. Always feel well hydrated and helps my skin from drying out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love it ! it's so moisturizing ! the fragance is superb too.

reviews.review_title: Youu2019ll love it if you have really dry skin......

reviews.review_text: Really thick and moisturizing and I also love the color. People with really dry skin should really enjoy it. But I would say if you are someone with normal (even combo) skin or slightly dry skin, it might not be for you. I enjoy a thick moisturizer, I really love the skinfix one and also the ceramidin cream by drjart. But this is too thick for me. I woke up the next day (after my first application) with two new pimples (one on my chin and another on my forehead). Could be unrelated but I am definitely not inclined to test the theory.

reviews.review_text: This cream is AMAZING. I'm in my 30s and seeing signs of aging. This cream gives me baby soft skin, reduces any dullness. It makes me feel dewy and plump. I use it at night and I love how refreshed my skin looks in the morning.

It leaves my skin so protected and glossy to go to bed. it has changed the appearance of my skin and completely evened out my skin tone. I used to have lots of red patches sunspots and this cream has turned my skin around. Can't recommend it enough!

reviews.review_title: for those having a u201cgreasy problem u201c

reviews.review_text: I suggest you use a tiny amount. I noticed that this was a thickkkkkkk cream sheu2019s a little lighter than the cetaphil cream that comes in a jar but if you use the perfect amount of this itu2019s truly so worth it. Yes there are cheaper alternatives but this just feel luxurious overall. I have acne prone problematic skin and I normally have a problem with fragrance however the scent in this from my understanding isnu2019t added itu2019s from the ingredients that they use and I donu2019t find it to be irritating my skin which usually freaks out if a try any new skin care. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the cream when I was applying it. It felt smooth and had a herbal medicine smell to it. However I woke up in the morning with a very dry face. It is meant to be used for dry skin but it's not hydrating at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. I'm closing into my 30's, so I noticed my skin is changing as well. Although, my skin does lean onto the oiler side.  This product woks for my skin. I have sensitive skin. My skin is acne prone, itchy and really red. I only need a little bit of this product to soothe the redness and stop the itching. My skin feels soft and plump.  However, if I use too much, I will break out because my skin already has enough oil (anything of too much can be bad at times). So, I only need dime size and it works. Fortunately, this product will last me two months because of how little I need to use it on a daily bases.  In the past, I have used so many moisturizers from drug store to high end brands and they all had terrible effects on me. Some caused severe break outs, others made my skin itch and caused uneven texture (the little red bumps) or left an ugly residue on my face. Other times the smell of the products would give me headaches. I tried tons and all left me feeling miserable about my skin.  I keep coming back to this product. It's beautifully packaged. The texture of the creme is lovely. It blends well with other products such as face washes ( biossance, first aid beauty) and makeup. I will be looking into other Tatcha products.  It's pricey but it last in my case it last quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is is VERY oily aka dewy. It was great-ish for me during the winter months, but now that itu2019s spring I had to switch to a lighter facial moisturizer... and Iu2019m glad I did.   Hereu2019s why...  Even during the winter months, when Iu2019d get SUPER DRY skin without using this moisturizer, this was still too heavy of a moisturizer. So much that I had to alternate every other day to a lighter one.   For me, regardless of how Iu2019d incorporate this moisturizer into my previous beauty routine, it really didnu2019t agree with my combination, hormonal cystic acne prone skin. I trialed an entire 1.7 oz and had daily cystic breakouts throughout the entire time I was trialing this.  Now, Iu2019m using CeraVe PM Moisturizer with Niacinamide to fade all my previously earned acne scars and control oil. For me, the CereVe PM works like a dream and Iu2019ve been using it for 3 weeks now with no breakouts!  Bottomline, everyone has their own unique skincare needs. This is a very high priced moisturizer. Packaging is beautiful, scent is YUM, but it just wasnu2019t a good fit for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I got a couple sample of this in one of my online Sephora orders. I loved it. So I purchased the mini size bc I couldnu2019t commit to the price of the full size. AND THANK THE LORD I DIDNu2019T!!! The PROS: if you have dry skin, itu2019s crazy thick. And it smells decent. The CONS: I had to find just the perfect amount that works for my skin thru trial & error otherwise my extra product is so hard for my skin to absorb & my skin was greasy. I have really dry skin so at first it didnu2019t bother me. BUT THEN I noticed depending on which sunscreen/primer combo I use after this moisturizer, it always pills !!!!! ALWAYS!  It was hard for me to find a  Combination of my products that works well with this. Considering the price (for even the small size!!), youu2019d expect having no issues at all with this. But nope. I do still use it at night sometimes on days when Iu2019m feeling extra dry but I have completely stopped using this as a daytime moisturizer because itu2019s just too heavy, doesnu2019t absorb well into my skin, and doesnu2019t always interact well with my other products. So thereu2019s my review and no, I wonu2019t be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how dewy and plump my skin feels. I typically use at night and use the water cream for day under make-up.

Large, red, swollen pimples that are painful. Iu2019m fuming. As others have already commented, this product is extremely comedogenic. Tried this as a sample while waiting for a shipment of my usual moisturizer. Tacha - fix this, stop selling it, or slap a warning sign on tje label. It seems like a lot of us have the same problem.

reviews.review_title: Missed the bar... not worth price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Giving this two stars. I love the dewy mist spray so I figured I would finally give this a shot. Unfortunately it did not work well with sensitive skin. My face rejected it, and to be quite honest there are other moisturizers out there that do a way better job at moisturizing than this. The fragrance was too overpowering to start, big no no for sensitive skin. Consistency was good but left a slight hot feeling to my face after applied. Other reasons for a low score, it didnu2019t sink in well enough and my face didnu2019t feel as hydrated compared to other moisturizers Iu2019ve used. My acne was also not a fan. I would say if you are looking for dewy completion go with using a hyaluronic acid under your fav moisturizer, let it sink in, then pump in some more hyaluronic acid  to your moisturizer, mix apply to face and then either spray the dewy spray or pat and press a light weight oil on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst moisturizer I have ever used.  I used the entire thing before I felt comfortable enough to write a review.  I stopped using it for daytime about 2 weeks in because it completely ruined my makeup each time.  I tried this with many different foundations and concealers from all brands high end and drugstore just to see if it was the ingredients from one brand that was clashing with Tatcha, but they all had the same reaction--pilling up and flaking off, pilling and foundation coming off in patches, etc.  This moisturizer does not sink into the skin, it just sits on top of the skin and dries.  Anything you apply over it will slide around or come off in patches because of this.  I ended up using it at night and was still unimpressed with the moisturizing properties.  It wasn't even just ok, it was horrible.  I honestly can't believe people like this.

The product comes with a tiny gold colored spoon and has a little space for it to store on the top of the tub.  Iu2019m about to have a bunch of tiny gold spoons.

reviews.review_title: Best cream for normal to dry skin types

I've even purchased it as a gift for a few people which have all ended up loving it also. Some people complain that it's too oily, I think they're either using too much for one application or its not the right product for their skin type. The Tatcha water cream is probably better for them since it leaves no oil behind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So normally I wouldnu2019t review something without using it a while but my issue with this didnu2019t need much time to figure out.   Itu2019s super greasy. I really wanted to love this and thought it would be great for my combo skin that tends to get really dry in places on occasion. Itu2019s feels lovely going on but it just never really absorbs. I put it on 6 hours ago and my face still feels like I rubbed oil all over it 6 minutes ago. I tried rubbing it in, multiple times, but itu2019s going nowhere. It doesnu2019t feel like I have a thick cream on or anything like that. Just literal oil. Itu2019s strange. And it unfortunately didnu2019t seem to absorb even my dry areas.   If your skin is at all oily, anything other than super dry actually, I would probably give this a pass. Or buy the sample size like I did to try it out first.

reviews.review_text: So I had a 15% off coupon and I decided hey why not try this product that my friend waved about. Well this really did not disappoint me. I was pleasantly surprise about how the paddock melted into my skin didnu2019t cause any irritation which is a plus. I exclusively was using drunk elephant products at the time and like the line until winter came around my skin so dry even though I would have combination in early skin during the summer but because I should get older your body changes I decided I need to up my regimen. I donu2019t do Botox Iu2019m not against it but itu2019s just not my thing. I have done chemical peels Which has been helpful but are quite expensive and require a lot of prep no working out not get a massage at least a week before and after. So using this product along with the oil in the cleansing oil I have to say itu2019s my new favorite thing. Of course I love the scent of hyacinth. Yes oil is a little pricey. Itu2019s on par with some of the high-end products. But with the 15% off and Iu2019m about to get 20% off I decided to splurge.I always was a believer in you get what you pay for and when you invest in your skin which is the largest organ if your body and you take care of it you will see the results. So girls go for it splurge on yourself why not you deserve it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite heavy cream.  I have used many over the years, and after my last container of Kiehl's Ultra Facial cream, I got a sample of this cream and it's fantastic.  It feels good on my skin and doesn't irritate my skin.  I don't know if I will use this in the summer, but for fall/winter, this is my current favourite.

reviews.review_title: Lost count of how many Iu2019ve bought

Really nice under makeup!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

But otherwise this product works wonders! Keeps my face nice and dewy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: holy grail! this works wonders for my dry skin but isnu2019t too heavy or thick. i would steer clear if youu2019re more on the oily side, but if you have fry skin like me iu2019m sure youu2019ll love this!

reviews.review_title: If you have Dry Mature Skin.. You will love this!!

reviews.review_text: I am 50 years old with dry mature skin and this moisturizer is wonderful. It keeps my skin hydrated without feeling too heavy or greasy. I talked about this moisturizer on my Youtube Channel NeeCJae check it out!! This is perfect for dry mature skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute fav during the winter time, works wonders for dry skin

reviews.review_title: Hydrating but hard to layer with anything
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very hydrating and a little thin layer will do. I only use this at night by itself because I find it hard to layer anything under this. Itu2019s very thick and it wonu2019t absorb if you layer this on top of any serum or essence. It starts to pill. Even when you want to use a little extra it will bunch up and pill. Try the water cream if you want for absorption and layering option.

reviews.review_title: Received 1 sample, have used 3 containers since
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use reviews to weigh pros and cons of what I'm looking to buy, so hopefully I can help a few others! I started with a sample size, liked how it felt and have since used 3 containers of this stuff. I love it. The texture is almost exactly the same as the CeraVe cream you can get almost anywhere, but this feels like it stays on your skin a lot longer. It has a very soft scent to it, I don't know if it's an added fragrance or just how the product smells, but it's nearly unnoticeable and personally I find it pleasant.  Pros; Very hydrating. You can layer just about anything under it and it won't pill up. It's thick and perfect to use before bed. My skin is very sensitive and this hasn't given me any issues. It's not sticky, and it doesn't really dry down in the sense that it feels like it keeps my skin hydrated until I wash my face in the morning again. Unlike the Indigo cream, it doesn't leave any sort of color cast despite the purple color of the lotion. I'm pretty fair so the Indigo cream makes me look blue, but this doesn't change my skin color at all.  Cons; It doesn't sit well under makeup for me. It pills a little bit if I put anything drying over it like powder or sunscreen, so I actually don't use this is the morning if I plan on using any sort of foundation (I don't use foundation often so this isn't a problem for me, but I felt it was worth mentioning. If I do plan on foundation, I actually use their water cream.) Another is the price point, I really recommend buying the little sample size to test out first to see if it's for you. A little goes a long way, their sample size lasted me about 5 days of using it day and night, but it's still about $25 if I remember it correctly. The packaging it also deceiving, and the container takes up a lot of space.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had purchased two Tatcha sets to see what all the hype was about. Really changed the way I viewed my ski regime, has oily, slightly sensitive skin and issues with hormonal/cystic acne. The Tatcha products helped clear it up and skin looked the best it ever had. It says for normal and dry but I used this during the summer and never had issues with breakouts. Didnu2019t wear a lot of makeup but when I did, still no issues. Ended up running out after my 2nd full size and stopped using bc I have a lot of other $$ moisturizers & other products to use up. Annnnd back to breakouts and uneven, dull skin. I use the steps from the Camellia Oil to primer, and itu2019s done great things to my skin that I havenu2019t experienced using everything from Drunk Elephant to Ole Henriksen to Proactive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, Iu2019ve purchased it 3 times now! I have normal skin for the most part, sporadic sensitivity, and, dryness here and there, but this has never felt irritating! The feel is creamy, slightly slippery, not heavy at all! I loved to see the value size, you know I had to snatch it. My only observation with the value vs standard size was the quality of the packaging, the jar specifically is definitely cheaper made than the standard. Regardless, this moisturizer is THE BOMB.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, it sits really nicely under makeup, and makes my face feel really moisturized, without the oily feeling. It feels so luxurios and I don't notice the smell too much. The blue tatcha moisturizer made me break out, so I was really nervous about trying another one of their moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hydration bomb, love the glow. I canu2019t live without it. Iu2019ve tried all the face creams at Sephora and this is my favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It feels so luxurious and satisfying to apply. I absolutely love the feeling of it but I didnu2019t notice any results from using it. It just feels amazing to apply but thatu2019s about it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this caused me to breakout badly. My skin was moisturized, but not worth the acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo/dry skin and during these colder months I feel like I cannot get enough hydration!  Prior to trying Tatcha, I was using another clean beauty brand, and I was very happy with it.  When a friend recommended the dewy products from Tatcha, I honestly didnu2019t expect to see a difference bc I was already happy with my skincare routine. Iu2019m always looking for the next best thing in skincare, so I gave it a try.  Wow!  I totally saw a difference in my skin.  The whole line is awesome, but this cream specifically is super hydrating without being greasy or heavy.  It is heaven.  I really do feel like my skin looks brighter/fresher/dewier/younger just from a few weeks of switching to Tatcha!  I am very happy.  My only suggestion is that they remove fragrance from their products, then they would dominate all the clean beauty brands:)

reviews.review_title: If you can buy this, do it. you wont regret it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cream!! its so smooth, and rich. Its not greasy, I use it at night becaue it;s very hydrating and dewy . It makes my skin look amazing. I have combo skin, oily in the Tzone but sometimes dry around the chin and nose. I love the way it feels and I've had this cream for about 5 months now and I have noticed a difference in the texture of my skin. It was dull and uneven, I see it has a bright appearance , still working on getting it even. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try this, but the price tag had me a little worried. one day, I took the plunge and bought it and I am not kidding when I say this has changed my skin and even how makeup applies on top of my skin. I have acne scarring along with pretty dehydrated skin and this is just lovely. I do hate that it's so pricey, but now I'm hooked and just purchased my 5th one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it, keeps my skin moisturized for about 12hrs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had wanted to splurge for this moisturizer for the longest time, as I have always wanted a dewy, rich cream for my face. Iu2019ve tried COUNTLESS moisturizers and nothing gives me as much of a dewy but not greasy glow. I eventually splurged for the 2.5 Oz of this and was super excited to try it. It definitely gives such a beautiful base for makeup, and feels so rich. However, I find that it can feel very oily and heavy. Normally I prefer this, as I have used cerave cream & other thick moisturizers in the past, but this product felt unbearably heavy on my skin. The scent was very noticeable too in my opinion, and I typically do not have a problem with fragrances in my skincare. Although I think it would work well for people who truly love a heavy feeling cream, I would stay away and opt for other moisturizers meant for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You can really tell the difference between this and a cheaper moisturizer. I have dry skin and moisturizers would hydrate my skin for a couple of hours after application and then rub off or be absorbed completely by my skin and leave it somewhat dry, but not this one. I apply this one nightly and it moisturizes my skin like no other. In the morning, my skin is so plump, soft and I still have a small residue of the moisturizer. I would recommend everyone that can to save up and splurge later on this one if they have dry skin because you can really tell that youu2019re applying a quality product to your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best Moisturizer hands down.  You can tell the difference when I use this especially once my make up is done. It is worth every penny! One of my holy grail!! I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating. I feel like my skin has even gotten more clear since using. My face still feels moisturized when I wake up in the morning. I mostly like using it at night since itu2019s on the thicker side. I havenu2019t tried it under makeup, but it feels like that might not work best.

the bottle came unsealed, so not sure if i am writing review for real product or fake. i am using this product for a week now. overall not an extraordinary product. you can easily get this quality in low priced products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! My skin was suffering from dry skin due to winter weather.  This is a miracle once on it eliminates my dry flakey skin. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hands-down best moisturizer I've ever used! pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In the winter, I'm always struggling with dry skin 24/7. This cream makes a moisture barrier that prevents the dryness from coming back all day. Bonus - you don't need to use a lot of product to make a difference. Highly recommend if you suffer from dry skin all day like me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s such a beautiful moisturizer that i have used in the past, but now as my skin has changed, it does not work for me anymore. It never causes me breakouts or whiteheads or anything of that nature, but i do have a different issue with this. Now when i use this, it ruins my makeup. At first i thought it was because of my sunscreen (that I have used with this in the past) so I tried without sunscreen and it still happened. I tried without a drop of oil (my skin is dehydrated so I find that helps) and it still happened. Maybe I got a bad batch or something, but I will likely not purchase this again since at that price, it should be perfect. I still love Tatcha, but if you are thinking of trying a product from them, try the vitamin C instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite moisturizer on the market! I got it as a sample and I noticed my skin cleared up and looked hydrated. I got so many compliments and decided to get the full size. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my nightly moisturizer as of late and will remain so until I finish it because I need extra hydration for my dry-leaning skin. I canu2019t and wonu2019t do gel creams because they arenu2019t hydrating enough, so decided to get the limited edition 2.5 oz size. I either apply this on top of serum or mix it with a retinol serum product thatu2019s oil-based. Either way, my skin is comforted and left cushiony soft and protected. Sometimes Iu2019ll use this in the day and apply sunscreen then some bb cream, and my goodness, my skin is radiant and glowy. I really like this cream and am glad I finally decided to purchase after several years of eye-shopping it. Try it if you need extra moisture and want a dewy glow to your complexion.

reviews.review_title: Simply put I love it always and forever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m always skeptical about trying new creams on my face because my skin is so sensitive however Iu2019m here to say this cream is absolutely wonderful. Its so creamy and rich and not to mention you donu2019t need a lot. Iu2019ve been using it for over a month and see a huge difference in my skin itu2019s so soft and clear and has a natural glow itu2019s beautiful. I would highly recommend this product for any and everyone two big thumbs up from me. Itu2019s a bit pricey but well worth the money youu2019ll spend.

reviews.review_title: Don't consider if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but sadly it was an oily cream that pretty much just sat on top of my skin not doing anything. On top of that, it caused me to break out like crazy. So, like a few of the reviews here have mentioned, if you have sensitive skin, do not buy this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't recommend this product for combination skin , It causes  breakout !  It contains fragrance and dyes in it , but does not bother my sensitive and eczema prone skin

reviews.review_text: its an ok moisterizer, not plumping to me and also I dnt like the scent... i feel like a moisterizer tgat goes on your face should be fragrance free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pass for me. My skin is not particularly sensitive and I found it quite irritating. I donu2019t mind the scent (and I usually hate scents) but for all the hype (and insane price), I was pretty disappointed. Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: I feel like a goddess wearing this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this product twice now! Itu2019s a winter staple for me since I discovered I had perioral dermatitis. This product helped nourish my skin without further irritating. Giving a 4 stars though because it can sit on your skin rather than sink in like you hope, I donu2019t mind that too much so long as Iu2019m not going straight to bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to winter moisturizer! I have dry skin and it peels sometimes if Im not hydrating my skin enough. However, my skin always feel plump whenever I use this cream. It has became a stable in my everyday skincare routine. One thing I wish Tatcha would change is the packaging for this product.I wish it came in a tube or pump bottle. Otherwise it's a perfect product for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got 2 of these guys as a sample. I gave one of them to a friend and we both came to the conclusion that this moisturizer packs a lot of heat it just didnu2019t live up to the hype. We both are on the dryer side, so this might work better for someone with combo skin. The smell is kind of weird but you could probably get past it. If Drunk Elephantu2019s protini fell off the face of the earth, I would probably use this instead. That being said if you want what this claims I would try DE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm kind of obsessed with this product. The only reason I wouldn't get it is if you're looking for a lighter cream, especially for summer. That's not this. That said, it's not overly heavy or cakey. I like the way it smells and it totally helped clear up some acne issues I had been having. It left my skin feeling soft and not at all oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini version of this moisturizer for free after making a purchase off the Tatcha website. However, if you purchase the mini version yourself, the retail value is $20. This seems a bit expensive for such a small amount of the moisturizer. This face cream absorbs into the skin well, and there isnu2019t necessarily anything u201cbadu201d about it. However, I much prefer The Silk Cream because it absorbs into the skin better and is slightly lighter. The Dewy Cream leaves your skin a little shiny/glowy, so this may be a good face cream for those searching for a winter moisturizer or those with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well worth the money. My favorite moisturizer morning or night. Non greasy. Love love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 4th repurchase of this product--that says a lot! It is my hydration staple for both my day and night moisturizer. I can't say enough good things about it. I just hate that l love it so much because of the price. But it is so important to invest in the health of your skin, so if something works, I am all for it! This is a lightweight but heavy moisturizer. Meaning if you have normal to dry skin like I do, it needs something extra and this delivers everything that I need. It offers such a beautiful glow underneath my makeup and my makeup doesn't slip or move around. Winters in New England are tough for my skin this time of years and using this, I have had zero dry patches. If you're looking for an anti-aging cream that hydrates and takes care of your skin in the long run, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this moisturizer for over one year and have no reason to try anything else.  Extremely happy with the way it moisturizes my skin and the texture and consistency of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive, YES! But you get what you pay for! DEFINITELY worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY moisturizer I have ever used that can keep my dry skin feeling hydrated all day long, after one application. I have patches of keratosis pilaris along my jaw, and I have basically tried every moisturizer imaginable to help alleviate the symptoms. Nothing, and I do mean nothing, has succeeded in making my entire face soft and plump the way the dewy cream has. The price may be a shock but if you have DRY dry skin, do yourself a favor and just buy this. (Also cleanse with an oil based cleanser like Tatchau2019s camellia oil!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since being pregnant, Iu2019ve experienced a lot of dull uneven skin tone, and super dry skin. This has saved my skin and I did some research and found that it is pregnancy safe!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW...Iu2019ve always been sceptical of purchasing expensive skin products but this is truly a steal. You get so much product for the little amount you use daily. My skin feels soooo smooth and looks bright during the winter months. Cannot recommend this more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Tatcha, for this blessing of a moisturizer that has seriously rescued my skin! Cold weather this winter + being acne prone + maskne made for an absolute disaster. After months of frustration and desperation testing new moisturizers thatu2019d pair well with my adapalene and the flaky dryness/sensitization that comes with it, Tatchau2019s is THE one! Much to my surprise, I can put on a thick layer without worrying about breaking out. Instead I wake up with luminous, dewy, hydrated skin. While the price point is high, itu2019s so worth it for the quality, luxury, and effectiveness. You can purchase the mini before fully committing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this packaging, also the size! All of Tatchas moisturizers are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I was always one of those people that didn't really believe in expensive moisturizers. What's the big difference between this product and it's $20 counter part? Well, let me tell you, there is a difference. I've tried a lot of items and this one wins every single time. It truly works, making my skin feel so hydrated and dewy. Nothing else comes close. You're skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer, it really makes your skin look dewy and hydrated. Definitely buying again when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SAVED MY POOR DRY SKIN!! Been using for about 3 weeks now. My skin is extremely dry in the winter up here in the Pacific Northwest. I use this day/night and my skin feels so soft and plump. Husband even noticed when he kissed my cheek. This will be too heavy during summer so it would become a night cream. If you have dry skin you MUST try this :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great. It has a silky consistency when applying it. It is not heavy like a cream. It is super hydrating but not greasy. My skin is smooth and refreshed after applying it. I would highly recommend this product for dry or combination skin.

reviews.review_title: one of the best moisturizers out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this moisturizer. Itu2019s thick, and packs a punch. You only have to use a bit, which makes it last forever. I use it as my night cream, and when I wake up in the morning, my face is still moisturized. This is moisturizer is a staple in my lineup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is dry and this is a great product for me. I also like the light scent. I use this as a summer night moisturizer and a winter day moisturizer. I try to get these when there is a sale because Tatcha is pricy. The small spoon on top gives the exact amount. You can also check out Yoglio for a Tatcha facial massage to see a great way to give yourself a facial massage using this. Itu2019s fabulous and I mix in other oils to make it nicer during super dry months. I always come back to this even tho I use other day moisturizers in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way!  Perfect for aging skin. Not recommended if you have oily skin.  Perfect for most people mid-40u2019s and up.  Love how it makes my skin bouncy and fresh and glowing. Great under makeup or as a night cream.  Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my skin i have combination skin and was having dry rough skin around my chin and cheeks due to weather received a sample of this and loved it purchased a full size directly from Tatcha with 15 percent off  Iu2019ve been using this religiously non stop and havenu2019t noticed a greasy face but definitely glowy and soft skin has came to play

reviews.review_title: Not right for my skin type

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love this product. One of the best skin creams I have used, it just absorbs right in.

reviews.review_text: Received this as part of the Skin Wonderland kit. My first time using any Tatcha product and I quite liked it. Really nice, not overpowering scent. Moisturized the skin well - dewy without being oily.

reviews.review_title: Be cautious if you have sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin but not at all prone to acne. This product did ok as a moisturizer but also made me break out and seemed to cause mild redness. Would not buy again- thereu2019s plenty of other products that do the job without irritating or clogging my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves a nice healthy glow! Also has a nice fresh scent. Very hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it as a sample. Leaves your skin very greasy and didnu2019t soak in for hours. Unless your skin is very dry, this will leave you looking like a grease ball.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me tell ya, this product is phenomenal! I struggle with oily and blemish prone skin- this moisturizer doesnu2019t add excess oil during my day, it keeps my skin nice and moisturized which helps to reduce my blemishes, and it lasts forever. If youu2019re concerned about paying a good amount of money and running out of product withinin a month, worry no more!! I bought the $68 1.7 oz. and the jar has lasted me over a year. I highly recommend this product!! (pic is the 1.7 oz jar compared to a standard tennis ball)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think the dimethicone in it is creating the dewy effect and also leaves the skin very greasy/sticky. Not a fan of that at all. Im glad I had a sample to try it first, I will not buy.

reviews.review_title: Use if you want to wake up with the most dewy skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

This is one of the most perfect products i've ever tried and worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: A dewy dream for dry skin ski
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with this rich, silky cream. Layers beautifully over my many layers of essence and serums. I initially recieved this as a sample and ran out to buy the big jar before my sample even ran out. Holy Grail moisturizer right here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hate it. Itu2019s like butter on my face. Donu2019t get absorbed. Such a waste of money

reviews.review_title: EXPENSIVE but wonderful moisturizer for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
