It is pricy and I definitely donu2019t think you should have to spend this amount of money on a moisturizer but if you want something luxurious it is amazing and I would highly recommend it for anyone with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m only leaving this review based on my skin type so it may be good for some, for me gives me beet red hives and I gave it to my mom because I didnu2019t want to waste the product and she had the same problem...I am sensitive so I thought that was normal but she is not , hopefully I will find some one to give it to but not for oily sensitive skin..I thought it would have been ok because I absolutely love the water cream and was looking for something a little richer when the weather changed and I needed a bit more moisture,unfortunately this wasnu2019t it , it just sits on top of the skin and afterwards I have a weird dry feeling Iu2019ve never had with any product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer saved my skin this winter. I have combination leaning more towards oily skin; however, due to wearing masks and just cold weather certain parts of my skin became very dry to the point of being flaky! Never had experienced that ever! I tried so many hydrating products and nothing helped until this! After using it two weeks consistently no more dry patches. It smells amazing and I find that a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and perfect for hot summer months when I need a lighter formula that still contains enough emollience to keep my skin supple and hydrated all day. The spatula and lid are super cute and fancy, yet utilitarian. Iu2019ve purchased several jars throughout the years and have even given this as gifts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found it just alright. I didnu2019t have the amazing results I expected based on the product description (which sounds perfect) and the glowing reviews.  Feels too thick and slightly greasy for my skin and then I woke up with dry spots on my forehead still. Maybe with prolonged use, it would improve. But itu2019s just not worth the price tag for me.  For a super hydrating and clean cream, I prefer the biossance squaline+ omega repair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is exactly what I was looking for: a texture like a balm that makes my skin feel protected and moisturized without making my skin break out. My few black head disappeared after 2 weeks u201cnaturallyu201d even if it wasnu2019t what I was looking for. SO If youu2019re looking for a product with a rich texture without making your skin oily, this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing. Itu2019s the only cream i really feel hydrates my face and neck well, i apply over night and my skin stays glowing the next day.  Itu2019s definitely not a light moisturizer but it is a great night cream and does a great job and what it says it does

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this cream after purchasing about a week ago and I swear it's the perfect moisturizer for me. After trying both the indigo cream and the silk cream, this seems like that perfect texture and moisture level in-between the two - where it's thick and luxurious and ultra-hydrating for my dry and sensitive skin, but not too heavy for AM wear. I'm loving using this cream in the AM and also in the PM after my retinoid. This cream is honestly perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product!! Such a rich formula that feels great. Will be repurchasing this product

reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin normally but because of being home all day with the heating on itu2019s really taken a toll on my skin inside and out. My sister recommended this product and I am so in love. It feels refreshing when you apply it yet so moisturizing. I describe it as a quenching mountain breeze kissing your face. I was afraid of breaking out because I do have sensitive skin but my skin is actually the clearest and smoothest its been in a while. I also love how it leaves me with a fresh and clean glow after. Plus it smells divine! Not a strong fragrance though, just a subtle cooling scent which is not harsh on my sensitive skin. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried quite a few moisturizers and this is by far, my holy grail. I have very dry and sensitive skin and this leaves me feel hydrated and moisturized. I honestly love it and will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for dry winter skin. I have very dry skin and this cream is so thick and luxurious. I love it! The scent is subtle but really good. Packaging is beautiful. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to moisturizer! I began using Aklief, a prescription retinol gel, this year and my oily skin turned dry. This has been the perfect daily moisturizer for me. My makeup applies over it beautifully. At times, my skin has some sensitivity to the lovely scent. I stop using it for a day or two when this happens. Itu2019s so great that itu2019s worth it for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started out with the starter size of this cream and i really loved it but since it was pricy i tried out another brand of moisturizer and it totally broke me out all the time and my skin really loves this product so now i own the largest size it really does absorb to your face beautifully!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream looks and feels more like a a thick balm than a moisturizer, almost similar to a silicone based makeup primer. Sits on top of the skin, doesnu2019t absorb at all. It feels very heavy, but not greasy. Theres also fragrance and colorants which can be very irritating for sensitive skin.   I gave it 2 stars because it does give you a dewy glow, not 100% sold on the u201cplumpingu201d  I think the only time I would use this on my face would be if I had extra dry skin and I was about to go out in the dry cold for an extended period of time (ie skiing or snowshoeing), I would imagine in that scenario it would be great at protecting you skin from chapping.   Iu2019ll be using my deluxe sample as a lip balm or under eye cream until it runs out...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have really dry and flaky skin and this is one of the only products that actually worked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I suffer from very dry skin and this thick, nourishing moisturizer feels amazing on my skin. It also leaves a nice glow which shows up wonderful under my makeup routine! Highly recommended for dry skin. Also it smells wonderful and does not irritate my sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in LOVE with this product. It took mh winter skin from dry and irritated to dewy and beautiful. The more I used it, the better my skin got. I was Sooo sad when it was gone! I haven't purchased more just yet because of the price point, but it is definitely on mh splurge list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the nicest moisturizer Iu2019ve ever used. It does a great job at keeping my keep hydrated and feeling bouncy. I had a terrible dry skin patch and rosacea flare up and this helped calm it down incredibly fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Itu2019s gentle yet effective and soothes my agitated skin. I thought Iu2019d only be able to use it during the harsh winter, but this moisturizer has proven to be just as great during the summers. The only downside is that the jumbo size is packaged cheaply. The 1.7 oz size has the same weight as the 2.5oz. I was really looking forward to the packaging because I know that this price point it would be heavy and luxurious. Unfortunately they skipped out on a lot of components and I donu2019t feel like Iu2019m holding a tatcha product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin and my face eats this up. It's the best cream I've found for winter. I wish the price point was lower because I can't afford to buy this regularly, but I make what I have last because it makes my skin feel and look so hydrated and glowy. I also don't get any irritation from retinol when I follow with this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

I can imagine this would be great for dry skin, but if you're like me, try the Tatcha Water Cream instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin & need a moisturizer that will ILLUMINATE your skin & prep your face for makeup, this product is worth the splurge. I have tried many moisturizers that would quiche my thirsty skin while also leaving my skin dewy & luminous. I have yet to find a moisturizer that acts the same as this one. Grips well to the skin without sliding, hydrated & skin will GLOW.

reviews.review_title: Great as a night cream, not day.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is very moisturizing.  If you have dry skin it is amazing! It does not dry for a very long time.  I could not put makeup over it. But I love it at night.. Great for very dry skin!

reviews.review_title: Smells Lovely, but Missed the Moisture Mark
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of Tatcha products, always very subtle and fresh. I recieved this as a sample size and as much as I wanted to love it I find it really missed the mark. It's more like spreading Petroleum Jelly mixed with silicone on your face. I warmed it between my fingers and pressed it onto my face but it just kinda sits there and doesn't absorb or provide moisture to my -40 winter parched skin (my makeup looked all flakey ontop). I'm glad I recieved this as a sample prior to purchasing a large size as it was a big miss for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start this by saying I've gone through 3 jars of this moisturizer! The consistency is silky, spreadable and beautifully scented. It makes your skin feel like it took a drink of water and makes it look...dewy! But in a natural hydrated way, no shimmer in this!  A little goes a long way and the little gold spoon helps get just the right amount. The packaging also makes me feel so bougie, its luxurious and feels like a treat every time I use it. (lol) I've tried many moisturizers but i always come back to tatcha!  If you have dry skin just treat yourself and try this! You will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_title: So glad I graduated to using Tatcha!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For years I gave struggled with very dry skin. I cycled between many brands and products, but none of them would relieve the tightness of my skin that comes right around lunchtime and persists until I put on lotion again. Mixing squalane and cosmetic oils into my moisturizer helped a bit, but didn't solve the problem. I use this rich moisturizer twice a day, and I am finally happy with how my face feels! This face cream is non-oily, yet so nourishing. I think I finally found the perfect cream for my dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely product! Quenches my dry winter skin and leaves my face feeling super soft. Nice light scent. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed in this cream. It makes my face very oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried going to a different moisturizer but missed using this one so much. My skin feels nourished and plumped. I love the dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best facial cream Iu2019ve ever used. Itu2019s not oily at all. This is my second tatcha purchase and have not been disappointed at all! The products are great and Iu2019ve seen a huge difference in my skin. Iu2019m acne prone and have noticed that I have less oil than normal. This will be my forever go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff! Iu2019ve been focusing more on skin care and then wearing less makeup so with just a tiny bit of this, Supergoopu2019s Glow Screen, and IT CC foundation my skin has never felt better! Itu2019s perfect for winter! And my skin just soaks it up! Definitely wish Iu2019d started using this sooner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The very best for dry skin. I use year round (early 40u2019s). Probably to heavy for someone younger with occasional dryness or acne. This is my go to for years, as with most of their products. Very dry winter climate in Minnesota. I can tell immediately when I havenu2019t used for a day. If dry, it wonu2019t disappoint IMO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thick, hydrating cream for the dry skin.  Infuse it day and night and it keeps my face soft, smooth, and dewy.  I am hopeful that the larger size remains available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my third jar of this stuff! Itu2019s so moisturizing, but without the thick or greasy feeling. It leaves my face looking so fresh and healthy. I got my mom hooked on it as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is hydrating, glowing & great for dry skin. Unfortunately it is NOT for extremely sensitive skin. I didn't know when I perched this but there are tiny gold flexes in the cream & when applied to the face I could see. It wasn't glitter but more of super fine flexes of gold. My skin had a HORRIBLE reaction to it so unfortunately I had to stop using it. If they made a version without the gold flexes it would be perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good moisturizer for dry skin, especially during winter it helps. So I highly recommend it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it caused so much redness and acne, it looked like I had hives! I have dry/sensitive skin and found this too rich. I would definitely recommend the water cream over this any day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for dry skin and does leave a dewy glow. I l like the tatcha line. This does not sit on top of the skin and it absorbs right in. My skin is hydrated all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my 3rd purchase and I don't even feel guilty about it! This cream has done wonders for my face, it looks and feels amazing. Honestly bc of the price I was very hesitant, but the sample was enough for me to invest, and haven't looked back since. A little goes a LONG way, so the product lasts. I have extremely dry skin, especially during winter and wearing a mask, this saved my skin. The packaging is cute and the smell is heavenly, not oily at all. I have gotten so many compliments on my face on how it looks dewy and healthy. Hope this helps!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING and worth the money!! I naturally have dry skin. On top of that, I am currently prescribed retinol for adult acne. This means my face is SUPER dry and was peeling in the beginning. This was a life saver for me. Does not make me break out more and helps keep my face hydrated! I also utilize an oil at night mixed with this.

reviews.review_title: EVAPORATES - quality content but needs new seal!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product works for hydrating BUT I will say it is better as a night cream since it can make the skin appear oily for day wear (appears oily with makeup & dewy with natural skin). Typically I have VERY dry skin. It does do the job however I'm not sure I could justify repurchasing based on price and well... (read further)! It has helped the dry skin on my cheeks & around my mouth (p.s. I am 25, I use it in combo with their enzymatic exfoliant and rice wash - I have good things to say about these products). Why I am rating 'The Dewy Skin Cream' lower is because I purchased it exactly a year to date, I have used it sparingly due to price and because I didn't need such a rich moisturizer in the humidity of summer 2020! I store the product in my bedroom away from sunlight, I seal it tightly each time but have noticed the product EVAPORATES. I have lost HALF the container in the time I have owned it and so over the past few months of this fall/winter I have tried to use it up. I started noticing around the 3-4 month mark that it was going quickly but I was most disappointed with it not being due to use. I still recommended this product  but TATCHA please fix the packaging so we can get all the content we purchase. If you purchase it you may need to use it quickly and if you used it generously daily, my estimation is it would last you around 6 months. Thanks for reading!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure I was going to like this at first. I learned that you donu2019t need much. At first my skin looked so oily but I adjusted and used less and now I really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing I had a little sample.. then the $30.. now the $100. Itu2019s expensive but idc itu2019s 100% worth it. Never had a cream so amazing and SMOOTH. Smells great. Not too light not too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan at all. This made me break out so bad. It literally gave me cystic acne now Iu2019m struggling to get my skin back on track. Super bummed out that it didnu2019t work out especially with this price point

reviews.review_title: Love the look, hate the scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My number one issue with this product is the smell. I just really donu2019t like it - itu2019s kind of overpowering and in general I prefer unscented skin care products. The cream itself is very thick and rich. It didnu2019t cause any breakouts on my sensitive skin and I noticed I donu2019t have the dry spots I sometimes get on my forehead and the corners of my nose in the winter. However, I canu2019t say I really noticed a big difference in things like increased firmness or fewer wrinkles. I do love the packaging, though. Iu2019d give this about 3.5 stars because I think itu2019s pricey for what it is. Likely wonu2019t purchase it again but would consider buying another product from the brand if it was unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely incredible, my skin has been going through it and I started using this cream and the face wash and wow no words, my skin is healing, healthy and glowing. I am in awe, purchases 3X

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using tatcha for over a year now and this is my favorite for my combination skin. Especially in the colder months my skin has been loving this cream. Itu2019s on the thicker side being a cream but absorbs so wonderfully into my skin. If youu2019re looking for that dewy look this is perfect for you. My skin shines even through my makeup how hydrated this formula is not to mention all the wonderful ingredients! Itu2019s a game changer for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! Itu2019s hard for me to switch products, especially those I use on my face.

I receive my product with what looks to be finger prints in the middle.. although the product was sealed, I just feel like $68 dollars is just too much to spend to not receive a full jar of the product. On top of that, i would have to pay out of pocket just to ship it back in which I donu2019t think is fair. There should be a paid shipping label for mistakes like this. I rated one star because if the product comes like this, I will not recommend buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It feels and looks really greasy on my face. It makes my skin look gross and weird in the morning. It reminds me of cheap drugstore creams like olay or something. I really donu2019t understand why this cream is so popular.

reviews.review_title: If you have oily skin, use less
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very hydrating. if you have oily skin beware on the amount you use. i have oily skin and i lathered this moisturizer like i did with the OLEHENRIKSEN Sheer Transformationu00ae Perfecting Moisturizer and woke up to a mini breakout.   i skipped out on using this product for a day and let my skin breath. i tried it again two nights later with less product and i found my skin to be very hydrated the next morning and i found that i didnt break out again!   Moral of the story is, if you want to use this product and you have oily skin, make sure to use a smaller amount.  a little word on the cream itself: it feels very luxurious and creamy. it smells lovely but not too strong. i also find that you get a lot of product in the jar which is a plus for me since the cream is so expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have awful dry skin and this moisturizer as well as other tatcha products have helped!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally used tatcha in the green container but gave this a try because I like that dewy look for makeup application. But I find the product is to greasy and I have to let it sit or I have to wipe off with a towel which is a waste otherwise I will look oily when I apply my makeup. I have sensitive acne prone skin hasnu2019t caused breakouts . I have noticed small fine bumps but I use other products in my skincare regiment so canu2019t blame it on this product solely. When it is done Iu2019m going to try transitioning to drunk elephant as a moisturizer and their serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My 42yo face adores this cream. It is the most moisturizing cream I've ever tried, and yet it's smooth under make-up and doesn't leave me shiny. I wish it came in a larger tub!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Used it both in the morning and before bed, hydrated throughout the day. W.O.W.!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly dry skin, especially in the winter. This cream paired with the rice wash has done wonders for my skin! The hydration actually lasts & my skin feels plump and clean. You donu2019t need much product to get the job done so I think Iu2019ll continue to buy the mini one. Such a great skincare brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and had the hardest time finding a moisturizer that wouldnu2019t cause me to break out. This is definitely a thicker cream but absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It might be good for people with really dry skin, but I personally think that the cream just sits on my face. On days when I put this on, my face is covered with oil within 2 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My wintertime hg facial moisturizer.  I prefer something lighter in the summer.   But this is amazing in cold temps. I have pretty normal skin but in winter i lean dry. I've been using it on the dry areas near my mouth and forehead.  I keep touching my face because it's so smoooooth... I'll never be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tatcha and this is my favorite moisturizer that I have tried from them so far! It makes my skin glow from within.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive and dry skin, and this left my skin feeling perfectly moisturized every single time! This is an absolute WIN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a moisturizer junkie, and this is one of my favorites that I've ever tried. I got a mini of this a couple months back, and immediately fell in love! A tiny bit goes a long way, so I expect my full size to last a while. For reference I have normal skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product a while ago, and at first I did not like it. Since then I have used drunk elephant, fresh, and other moisturizers before coming back to this product. I am so glad I did! I have extremely dry skin and lala retro just wasnu2019t doing it for me. This made an instant change in my skin and I will never go without it. Since then, Iu2019ve picked up more tatcha products and my face feels so smooth and so beautiful. This line did what others couldnu2019t and I would absolutely recommend this!!! I donu2019t care for the scent but it is very light and fades quickly so I just live with it. After a few weeks I noticed my skin was clearer and maintains a nice plump texture. More recently I have started using the Tatcha Essence & Dewy Serum as well. The whole line is luxurious and great.

reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin, but I figured why not? It had some good reviews. Usually within a day, my skin will alert me if it doesnu2019t like a new product. Seriously, a pea size amount will cover your whole face and blended down into the neck area. I apply once in the morning, and a little bit more liberally at night and add some to my lips. I adore this cream and will be purchasing whenever I run out, which looks like it will be a while! Also, it comes with a little scooper on the top of the cap so you can measure out a pea size amount for your face, and so that youu2019re not sticking your fingers into the jar and contaminating it. So clever and this stuff smells WONDERFUL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So let me preface this by saying that I have been trying to find a moisturizer that my incredibly dry skin would love. After trying a few different ones, I finally decided to try this one, the Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer, and was instantly impressed.   Itu2019s important to listen to your own skin and my skin definitely liked this product. Itu2019s the only moisturizer that kept my skin soft and hydrated all day long. With other moisturizers, I would have to reapply during the day because my skin was dying of thirst. I donu2019t have that problem now because this product is great at keeping my skin happy.  Also, a little goes a long way! At first, my skin looked too shiny because I was accidentally applying too much. This was because that was exactly what I had to do with the other moisturizers. After I figured out what the right amount was, my skin looked great!   So why didnu2019t I give it 5 stars? Truth be told, I think this is wayyyy to expensive for a moisturizer. In fact, if I end up finding another moisturizer that makes my skin happy like this and is cheaper, I will definitely switch over. As good as this product is, I do think that $68 is a lot.   If the price works for you though, I still highly recommend it!

reviews.review_text: I used this for a little over a month. I didn't really see much of a difference just as with the water cream. The hydration feels amazing once you put it on your skin, but throughout the day I still feel dry and not dewy at all. I wanted to use it as a daytime moisturizer but it's just not my cup of tea. It is also formulated with quite a bit of fragrance which makes it smell nice. I don't need fragrance though. The package and feel of the cream is spot on, but as far as effectiveness, I'd stick with something else. A bit overhyped for the pricepoint and effectiveness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cru00e8me super hydratante et tru00e8s confortable! Les ru00e9sultats sur la peau son instantanu00e9e! Du00e9finitivement un de mes produits pru00e9fu00e9ru00e9s!

reviews.review_title: I was surprised by how much I love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dewy skin cream is what your dry skin has been searching for!   The cream comes in a beautiful container and has the lovely applicator want built neatly onto the lid! Wonderful to protect your cream from bacteria, and not lose the applicator in the process!   The cream glides on with a beautiful smoothness and feels luxurious and instantly soothing. Be careful! A little goes quite a long way!   There is a light, fresh, almost milky like scent, that instantly disappeared.   I use lactic acids and retinoids daily and this product helped keep my skin soft and minimized dryness. The cream played well with my current skin care routine.   Did work well with daytime makeup, if you use the cream sparingly. Looks dewy and gorgeous on bare skin.   I have not used this cream as long as I have my normal products, so I cannot vouch for the long term benefits, but I will update. I have favorite night cream (which also has algae), but found this cream much more hydrating, if it performs as well as my other, it may knock it out of my line up, at least in the winter.   My husband has oily skin and large pores, but still likes this cream when applied at night. I thought it really plumped his skin. Probably not good for day time oily skin.   #Tatcha #DewySkin #Hydrating #Cream #Clean #CrueltyFree

I honestly look forward to putting this cream on every morning and night, and I am dreading the day this runs out because I will totally have to purchase more!! Also the packaging and purple color cream is really cute. Lastly, I struggle with redness and uneven skin tone, and I'll say that I do think the cream in combination with the Tatcha balancing toner are helping to reduce that.

reviews.review_title: good for dry skin in winter, but no dewy effects
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is very thick. I have a very dry skin and this product works well with me in the winter. That being said, I think itu2019ll be way too heavy for people with normal or oily skin and also to use in spring/summer time. Overall, I think the product is just okay, considering the price and occasions that I can use. Plus, I donu2019t see the dewy effect on my skin whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what it promises to do. I found this more hydrating than the Tatcha sensitive cream. For context, I use the Tatcha water cream in the summer time and then I use this during colder months. This has been a fantastic product. Itu2019s certainly dewy when you first put it on. I love waiting to put makeup on since my skin looks glowy, I let it sit and then put makeup on for ideal results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is amazing. It hydrates my skin so well and leaves my face feeling plump, dewy, and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous to try something hydrating since I have oily skin & it usually causes me to break out, but this stuff is a game changer! After using it for a whole week, Iv totally fallen in love! Instantly my skin feels smoother and soft. It gives you a beautiful natural dewy glow without any greasiness. Also love the way this product smells.Super refreshing u2728I prefer to wear it on no make up days, but have also tried it under a full face of make up & it didnu2019t feel heavy or u201ccakeyu201d. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer with all my heart. My skin is so dry especially in the winter. This is the only moisturizer Iu2019ve found that actually keeps my skin moisturized and hydrated! My skin truly looks dewy- hence the name Dewy Skin Cream! Iu2019ve gone through like 3 full sized and love that thereu2019s a value size now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t want to believe the hype, but the hype is real! I got a small size of this cream along with the dewy on the go set and in just a few days my skins texture has improved so much. My skin was really dry from my buildings radiator and my skin looked terrible and textured because of it. After 4 days my skin already looks and feels so much better, and it really stays moisturized throughout the day and all night (I use it twice a day). Looks like Iu2019m going to have to get the full size when it runs out .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST.   I received this as a sample in my ipsy.  Once I hit 35 my skin changed and it seemed like nothing was working for the dry patches and hormonal acne but this cream is a game changer. Smells amazing, moisturizers DEEP and leaves my skin fresh and flawless.  Just try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feeels very great on my dry skin I love how it doesnu2019t feel heavy it feels smooth and hydrated now my foundation doesnu2019t look patchy no more Iu2019m obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite night time moisturizer! Love the smell and the thickness of it leaves my skin very hydrated !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best DAY moisturizers for winter time! The weather change always tends to make my normal skin type on the dryer side so this has really been helpful! It allows your makeup to go on smoothly and not tacky as well. Itu2019s not moisturizing enough for my night routine though. It also doesnu2019t have a lot of active ingredients for a night moisturizer so I would probably try to find something thatu2019s more active to see better results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tatcha stop playing with us and give us the jumbo size of the water cream too. This whole limited edition of it all is a joke.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using the Dewy Skin Cream for the last year! Iu2019m absolutely in love with this product! It really works in keeping your skin hydrated all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tatcha's Dewy Skin cream is for everyone. It is especially for those who like the natural make-up look! I am one of those who loves the I'm a glowing bronze goddess look, and I succeeded w/this. Just used Tatcha's Dewy Skin cream, Tower 28's SuperDew Highlighter balm, Too Faced's Hangover 3-in-1 and Fenty Beauty's Invismatte Blotting Paper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have combo skin with dry patches around my nose/cheeks/temple and this melts right into my skin. I've used this year round with no issues. 1.7oz lasted me roughly 8 months and that's using it twice a day. Definitely would recommend and the price is well worth it imo. I also tried the indigo cream but it didn't melt into my skin like the dewy cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A dose of intense hydration! Such a rich, smooth cream that leaves you dewy and glowing! A light, pleasant smell, beautiful texture! Great product!

reviews.review_title: THE HOLY GRAIL for dry and dry/combination skin!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on so silky and smooth, and locks in super hydration all day long for my dry skin in winter. However, I will say this cream is more on the oily/greasy side once you begin working it into your skin. That being said, a little goes a long way and if you have oily skin I highly recommend you go for the tatcha water cream instead. I originally purchased this cream in the dewy glo set a while back, and itu2019s been my go to natural glowy/dewy moisturizer ever since! Love ittttt & totally worth the price in my opinion. Will be buying more tatcha products to try soon !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is incredible. A little goes a long way and the scent is mild and lovely. Right away I noticed my skin was soft and smooth and the hydration lasts. I tried this while I was using La Mer's Creme de la Mer Moisturizer and this is just as good, if not better. Definitely use the little scoop tool and follow the instructions - you really don't need more than a pea-sized amount!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini trial sized pot of this in a Sephora Favourites box and have been so excited to try it. I see such positive reviews through beauty bloggers, and I understand why. This leaves my skin glowing, and I really do like it. However, I think the price is absurd. There are some great ingredients yes, but I think it's moreso a marketing ploy to make the product appear more elite. There are much more affordable and comparable creams out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for dry skin! It leaves my skin so soft and hydrated! Your skin will be glowing all day! As a bonus it smells so yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't want to love this because of the price but its so hydrating. I tried a cheaper alternative recommended by a beauty blogger and it just made me miss this product after a few uses. The only con to me is that it doesn't really seem to dry down & can be a little sticky. Not sure if I am just using a little too much though. The sent is not strong and gives you that spa relaxing feeling. I have purchased this twice now! Unfortunately for my wallet I don't see myself stopping lol.

reviews.review_title: Pour les peaux grasse u00e0 u00e9viter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: je pru00e9fu00e8re  de loin la water cru00e8me u00e0 celle-ci! je nu2019ai pas vu du2019effet du ma peau du00e9ju00e0 grasse u00e0 mixte.. ju2019ai fini lu2019u00e9chantillon avec un usage sur le cou et bustier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is amazing the tatcha water cream is better but both are amazing buys. this one will leave u dewy with a shine. super hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have EXTREMELY dry skin, stop everything youu2019re doing and buy this!! This is the holy grail youu2019ve been looking for! I almost donu2019t even want to leave a review because I want it all to myself.. I live in an extremely dry, desert climate. My skin is incredibly dry and sensitive. Iu2019m prone to red, painful, dry patches on my face. I used to put oil AND a moisturizer on in the morning, but by noon, my nose and forehead would look like a snake shedding its skin. Not a good look especially with makeup on.. I randomly added a sample of this moisturizer to my cart when purchasing a lipstick. I had super low expectations because Iu2019ve tried it all.. I was genuinely shocked when I put it on and immediately had to buy the biggest size. My skin has never been this moisturized for the entire day. Iu2019ve also never seen my skin be dewy. Ever. Only crusty and dusty. This moisturizer is a game changer. It has a very gentle scent, not overpowering and doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. Itu2019s not oily and doesnu2019t make you look greasy. Start with a tiny bit and give it time to absorb before putting on makeup (comes with a spatula attached to the lid). I would probably not recommend it for oily or normal skin as I could see it being too heavy. But if your skin is parched and flaky, you will try it once and throw your money at this product for the rest of your life. I promise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute FAV face cream!  It is nice and neutral, but has a very luxurious weight and feel when putting it on.  Great for winter time when you want a lot of hydration.  Even though it feels luxurious, it doesn't feel overly greasy.  I also LOVE the smell of this stuff!  I bought a couple of the super small sizes first, and then finally splurged on the regular sized jar.  Delicious =)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this cream for a couple of weeks now but Iu2019m loving it! I usually use Korean products or Sunday Riley products but decided to try this based on the reviews. I love the scent and the consistency of this. My skin looks very dewy and hydrated. Iu2019ll be repurchasing it when Iu2019m done with this jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this cream for a couple of weeks now but Iu2019m loving it! I usually use Korean products or Sunday Riley products but decided to try this based on the reviews. I love the scent and the consistency of this. My skin looks very dewy and hydrated. Iu2019ll be repurchasing it when Iu2019m done with this jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. Truly smells amazing and leaves the skin feeling dewy and less dry. I even use it just under my makeup as a primer and it makes your makeup go on better and more dewy. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy and luxurious. This is perfect under BB cream and foundation.

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer. A little too expensive.

I just wish it was more affordable so I don't have to feel so guilty every time i repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t really absorb into the skin. Disappointed because I wanted to love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Tatcha cream for my dry skin that also breaks out from rosacea occasionally. I have found that it actually has helped reduce my redness and blemishes from rosacea (although my case is mild) as well as all the other great skin benefits. It definitely is a thick and luxurious cream, and my skin just drinks it up. Iu2019ve received compliments on my u201cglowu201d from others since using this and will continue to purchase this. I highly recommend it, especially if youu2019re in search of a solid night time cream. The price I feel is reflective of the high quality product so I am okay with spending the money since I am seeing results.

reviews.review_title: Dry or Dry Combo. NOT FOR OILY SKIN!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only removed a star because of the dimethicone and gold that are ingredients in this. Other than that itu2019s deeply nourishing and you just need a little bit to feel moisture. Too much can leave you greasy. Iu2019m not a fan of dimethicone because it stops the product from penetrating the skin and thatu2019s good with makeup but with my skincare I want every ingredient that can protect my skin barrier. The gold can be sensitizing to the skin so beware of that if you have sensitive skin and the minor fragrance that is added but itu2019s nothing too bad itu2019s far on the ingredients list so it does not cause sever irritation or any for myself. I have dry skin so this actually really saved me during these winter nights and the dry patches I get are always a problem but with this in my collection I feel saved. I recommend this for dry skin to dry combo. Definitely not friendly to oily skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but my skin does become dehydrated in the winter. I love the consistency of this, itu2019s thick. When I applied it, my skin felt super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I just used this as a sample and was very excited to try it. However, I am not a fan of the smell, I can still feel the residue on my fingertips, and I think this is just not what my skin needs. I have a pretty elaborate skin care routine with naturally oily and acne prone skin. This is just too thick and my skin hasnu2019t absorbed it all yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy Grail of face creams. I live in Arizona where it is very dry and it helps my skin maintain moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My combo skin loves this moisturizer in the fall and winter. My skin is fairly sensitive and can be prone to acne, and so far no issues (2 weeks use). Looks great under makeup with and without primer, and no pilling. Looking to repurchase the larger size to see how it does come spring/summer. Also, the smell is lovely and not over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite moisturizer for winter!! Itu2019s so moisturizing without being greasy! Itu2019s definitely one of my favorites and helps with the cold winter weather. Buying it for the third time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bon produit pour les peaux su00e8ches. Je l'ai trouvu00e9 cru00e9meuse et riche. tu vois une diffu00e9rence des les premiers jours d'utilisation. Ne commencez pas le mu00eame erreur que moi  j'avais pas remarque qu'elle est pour les peaux mixtes su00e8ches, ce qui ne convient pas a ma peaux mixte grasse (ca peut etre trompeur) ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So i got this as a sample and was excited to see what the Tatcha hype was. I have very dry skin and with the winter cold, this definitely did the job. From the very first use, i was complimented on how my skin was glowing. I don't know if this product is the reason but my skin cleared up from some blemishes I had. In any case, it definitely didn't break me out and I have sensitive skin. The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is the scent. I'm not a big fan of fragrance, but it's tolerable. Besides that, pretty much a tie with Drunk Elephant's Lala Retro Whipped Cream.

reviews.review_title: Wish I didnu2019t fall for the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t live up to its hype. Personally, if Iu2019m spending $70 on a cream, Iu2019m going to want powerful ingredients that are visually going to change my skin and help my acne. I saw no improvement in my skin besides it being dewy, but nothing a drugstore brand canu2019t do. I also didnu2019t like the fragrance, but it wasnu2019t strong and faded away. I like the YTP dream mask better and noticed a difference in my hyperpigmentation and it was just as dewy for a third of the price. Also like the drunk elephant moisturizer in the morning better and it has great ingredients and growth factors (synthetic) too. Really wish I bought a mini version of this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used points to get a sample of this product and Iu2019m glad I did because I wouldnu2019t spend my money on it. I have the facial cleanser that matches this and I absolutely love it. The moisturizer leaves me so greasy and shiny and it feels like it just sits on top of my skin. Instead of this product I recommend Farmacy Honey Halo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that this contains ginseng and smells nice but the 1 star is for the dewy aspect. The dewiness doesnu2019t last. An hour after applying  my skin looks dry...it doesnu2019t give me the glow I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on and I swear my skin is clear the next day!! I will continue to repurchase !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product seems to be mosturizing but the smell is overbearing. I suffer from dry skin, especially on my jawline. This cream slightly burns my face on the dryer sensitive areas. All in all, it's a decent product but not worth the price to me. If you have sensitive skin this product probably will be too fragrant for you. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great product, I have dry and sentive skin and my skin love it. A little goes a long way. If you put too much It will make your make up like if you are peeling. Currently, my eyes are very dry and when I put this cream it irritate a little bit so be carefull around the eyes... I don't know if it's because the scent... and I don't like the smell tho... I like better when it's unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer more than anything, but the packaging is so wasteful. Itu2019s such thick plastic meant to make it look like you get more than you do, but it really is just an environmental waste. Regular users know it doesnu2019t come with that much, so I hate seeing such careless packaging. Further, the box includes so many layers to create a feel of luxury, but itu2019s wasteful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer for cold weather! I have combination skin and keeps my skin hydrated all day long!

reviews.review_title: check the ingredients list - myristyl myristate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels wonderful in the skin, however it contains the Myristyl Myristate is a naturally occurring fatty acid. Myristyl Myristate is an emollient that gives skin a smooth appearance. The side effect is that Myristyl Myristate is very comedogenic and can cause breakouts. Awful ingredient added to such an expensive product.

reviews.review_title: Loving this now that itu2019s cold and dry out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this at the wrong time of year and made my summer skin look greasy no matter what makeup I used. Now that itu2019s winter and dry I have pulled this back out and I am loving it. It gives my dry skin a healthy dose of hydration in the morning and looks great under the more matte foundations making them a little more skin like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/dry skin and live in a very dry, harsh climate with long cold winters. Iu2019m always on the hunt for a great moisturizer, and this is it! Itu2019s very thick and rich so a little goes a long way. It has a light fresh scent but nothing too overpowering. Immediately after application my skin is so plump and dewy! Iu2019m 28 years old and it makes my skin look like it did when I was a teenager. Because itu2019s so dry where I live, I usually wake up with my skin feeling dry no matter how much product I slather on before bed. But not anymore!!! Also layers beautifully under makeup and acts as a wonderful primer. 1000/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is absolutely IT for me. I will say I can see why this might not be for everyone. Itu2019s thick. Itu2019s creamy. Itu2019s extra hydrating. It leaves skin looking youthful and plump. Me and my girls are absolutely addicted. I used to LOVE the consistency and thickness of La Mer but was not loving the price and this is a fantastic alternative. I would say itu2019s not for those with oily skin or those looking for a lighter gel consistency..this is NOT that. This is for colder winter climates. But i am absolutely sold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im about to order me a second one because I LOVED it!! Im 36 years young And I need a good moisterizer. This is one of the best ones Iu2019ve found so far. You wont regret it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this cream. It was almost a chore to actually bring myself use it up. The smell is nice if you like the Tatcha scents, light and not overpowering. It feels nice going on the skin but it did NOT absorb at all. It left a sticky film on my face that made me look greasy. I had to blot it with tissues because otherwise my face mask would stick to me. It also wasn't enough hydration for my dry skin, even if I didn't blot it. I initially gave it 3 stars, but now that I remember how much it costs I am going to give it 2. I didn't have any of these issues with their Water Cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I can give this 100 stars.my skin game changer!!!its pricey n was hesitated to try but after all the hype I give its a try n it was best decision for my dry dull skin.omg I can't tell you how much it change my skin.right after first use skin feel healthy firm n the glow is out of world.i got so much compliments.give it a try you won't regret

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used this cream for 2 nights now and I can tell already that itu2019s a incredible product. It hydrates the skin while still keeping it fresh. It does feel a little sticky but since I have combination I expected that. But honestly the way my skin feels and looks is like a million bucks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect under makeup or on  a no-makeup day. I would recommend to those with dry skin. A beautiful moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome! I have dry skin and eczema on my face too. Best moisturizer that I have used. Works well with serums and oils!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin and this makes my skin feel hydrated, which is saying a lot(Iu2019m also currently using the Dior serum as a daytime moisturizer for dry skin and that is great as well!). I would be cautious about wearing this under makeup though in case it ruins foundation from balling up or it -may- be too thick. However, I would definitely say this product is a great bedtime moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I got a sample of this in a kit and it is the most beautiful moisturizer I have tried. I have dry skin and it actually lasts on my skin whereas most moisturizers only last half a day and I'm constantly having to reapply. It just feels different, so luxurious and keeps my skin feeling soft. Highly recommend if you have dry skin and want to treat yourself!

reviews.review_title: Take all of my money!!! My dog! Boyfriend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a poor nursing student and as a graduation gift I saved enough money to treat myself to a good moisturizer. I cringed at the price but have heard so many good reviews about this product. I waited till my boyfriend fell asleep (if he found out how much I spent, heu2019d disown me) and snuck my sephora bag in and went straight into the bathroom. I waited a few days to give an honest review. Iu2019m in my 30u2019s and dry sensitive skin. During winter months I tend to get eczema under my eyes and my nose peels. After using this, my skin is glowing and no sign of dry spots! My skin looks so healthy!!!! 100000000 stars!

reviews.review_title: the best choice for fall/winter for me!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only moisturizer my skin loves in the fall/winter time. In the summer my face is so oily but in the fall/winter it gets soo dry and tight and this takes that away for me completely and is so soothing. I tried to change my moisturizer a few times to something less expensive and I regretted it, genuinely this moisturizer is the move lol. I know its expensive :/ but if you can swing it, or try the mini, or ask as a special occasion gift, its amazing and feels special to use. PS, in the summertime I still also love using it as my nighttime moisturizer to replenish and soothe overnight. PPS, I donu2019t write reviews quickly, first I see how a product does over time, and this product has definitely prevailed for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on this product is unbeatable. The cream smells so good and keeps my skin super hydrated and glowy. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore u00e7a frau00eecheur,u00e7a senteur et le ru00e9sultat. Je recommande certains.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is does everything it claims to! My only criticism is that it tends to linger on the surface of a skin longer and not soak in for quite sometime which I personally don't like. Other than that, it is a really nice smelling well textured moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice moisturizer very hydrating and dewy. made my skin healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Of all the items I've tried from Tatcha, this is my favorite. I keep various moisturizers on rotation, and I tend to use this one at night time. It's especially nice during the drier, winter months, although it can be used year-round. The Japanese know how to take care of their skin, and I would recommend this to anyone, not just those who want dewy skin. You only need a little bit to feel a burst of supple moisture, and I much prefer this to Tatcha's water cream. I first got this cream as a sample in 2019, and I have tested this for months... it has taken me a while to write this review. Sure, the packaging is BEAUTIFUL, but that's not why I recommend this. It's legitimately decadent, and it would be a nice luxury moisturizer to gift to someone (or yourself).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My face is super dry especially in winter and this moisturizer keeps my face nice and hydrated 24/7. I would recommend tatcha's whole line of products. Definitely worth the $

reviews.review_title: Might be better for summer instead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not completely done with my jar of cream yet but I will say so far Iu2019ve been a bit disappointed. I think this might work better for the summer but for someone who has dry skin, It just wasnt moisturizing enough for me for the winter. Iu2019d have to put on extra layers to feel moisturized but when i wake up in the morning its dry again :(. Im sticking with my Lala retro cream for the winter time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the rice wash cleanser along with this dewy skin moisturizer and itu2019s a dream combination for my dry skin! You donu2019t need to apply too much product to get results, just a small amount. The moisturizer is not heavily fragranced and I love the purple color! Worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample. It smells amazing and I really do like it a lot. I had really bad peeling around my nose due to my acne treatments and none of my moisturizers helped, but this did. It is a thick cream and I do have oily skin so I wouldnu2019t use it everyday but it was great for an extra boost of hydration that I needed. I would definitely recommend for dry skin and would try the water cream for oilier skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this product and soo disappointed. It pilled up on my face. Feels so sticky and greasy. Feels like i put sunscreen on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t like it. It doesnu2019t get absorbed on my skin for some reason. It just stays there, making my super dry skin so sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It wasnu2019t for me. I returned it after one use. I applied it before bed and my face was like an oil slick still by morning! Itu2019s like it doesnu2019t absorb into your skin. My skin is not oily either Iu2019m normal/ dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate myself for liking this so much because it is so expensive. But it is perfection. I have done away with all primers as this makes any foundation I put on look flawless.

reviews.review_title: Not for dry skin or people who can smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bad first impression due to the wasteful packaging. Upon opening,  I was borderline gagging from the bathroom cleaner reminiscent fragrance (like a cheap fresh floral). Ultimately did not work for my winter dry skin due to having to apply 2-3 layers of this just to feel like my skin was getting some significant hydration. And in retrospect I think the added colour is totally unnecessary. But letu2019s be honest I was filling out the return form after just smelling it. Itu2019s a no from me dawg.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recommend this tatcha moisturizer for who has a very sensitive and dry skin.  I tried many product but I think this is the best one for me. It hydrate and moisture my skin well. My skin has less ance after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (3) points:  (1) The cream itself is PURPLE - I LOVE this although I don't know why really....it just makes it fun to use. (2) The cream is heavily fragranced. I don't find the fragrance pleasing and would prefer a cream that is unscented. (3) It leaves a residue on your face - hence marketed as a dewy skin cream. I prefer Biossance's Squalane & Omega Repair Cream also sold here on Sephora as a deep moisturizer (unscented) for a cream that is also dewy. The packaging is much less jazzy but I consider it to be the better cream of the two.  BOTTOM-LINE: Heavily fragranced purple cream in very pretty packaging, that leaves a reside (dewy). Competent cream but there are better IMO.  3.5 stars out of 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample and was hooked on the first try. Iu2019m relatively oily but in the winter my skin never feels hydratedu2014yet most moisturizers make me super greasy. This feels decadent and hydrating but dries down to a luxuriously soft matte feel. And I swear my skin looks instantly more youthful. I bought the full size as soon as my sample ran out and literally counted the days down until it arrived. Definitely worth trying out to see if itu2019s for you and if you do love it I think itu2019s well worth the price. Plus the packaging and box it comes in are their own amazing experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin that always feels thirsty and this is my holy grail moisturizer! I usually need something as thick as a balm to make my face truly feel moisturizer but I donu2019t want to walk around all day with something that thick on my face (especially during summer) so I usually settle for a less moisturizing, thinner cream. This is the first cream that actually moisturizes my face without feeling too thick or oily. My mom and husband both have normal-oily skin and both love it. It always is perfect under make up because it creates a smooth but grippy surface almost like a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it's a very luxurious cream and it feels beautiful on the skin BUT I experienced what others have described as pilling when I used it in the morning under makeup. Even giving it time to soak in (like, LOTS of time) my makeup still pilled, rolled off when I used this AND it affected the shade of my makeup as well. If you want a REALLY rich cream with a light, pleasant smell, this is lovely BUT I'd only recommend using it at night AND washing your face well in the morning to remove the residue. I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Eh itu2019s alright. I like how it leaves my face when I use makeup but when I use it when layering products itu2019s okay but I do like thicker creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only Tatcha product that has let me down. When I started using it, it never really felt like it penetrated my skin.  If I put makeup on over it after letting it dry it made my foundation look awful. I figured Iu2019d just use up what was left (not much at all). But after a few months, It clumped up in the sealed jar. But more importantly, it feels like thereu2019s small pieces of plastic in it. If I rub it in my hands for a few secs, it goes away but I only noticed because I went to put it on my face and felt the hard/kinda sharp pieces. I have no idea what would cause that.  There was no way it could have been from something on my hands because I wash my hands and go through several steps before getting to moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Texture works like a dream! It glides easily on my skin, leaving it super moist and glowing. I have dry and sensitive skin so I always have to switch to different moisturizers during winter time. This one is the best so far! Skin feels light, not sticky and also have glowing effect. Iu2019ve been eyeing on this for awhile and Iu2019m so happy I finally purchase it. Itu2019s a little bit on pricey side but def worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and wish I could afford to buy a full size. Itu2019s so great! I started using prescription retin-a (Tretenoin) and my skin has been peeling around my acne. This moisturizer manages to feel thick on my hands, but lightweight on my face. It smells great and leaves my skin feeling soft. Iu2019ve tried many moisturizers since getting on Tret and this has by far been the best.

reviews.review_title: I love love love and totally recommend!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing!! I just started using and my skin looks so pretty!! And its so soft!! I've been trying for thr longest to find a good cream and everything irritates my skin or makes me break out. A little goes a long way. I also use the skin cleanser which is great!! I had little bumps under my skin and within a week they started to go down. I love love love and totally recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I foolishly fell for all of the hype and bought this face cream ultimately I regret buying this! Smells very nice and it leaves your skin feeling smooth, but personally it's not worth the price!

reviews.review_title: Moisture without the weight and grease!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to morning moisturizer. It really does everything it's says it does and couldn't be more perfect for these cold Alberta winters!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was doubtful that any product would compare to the Shiseido creams that Iu2019ve used for years but this absolutely goes to the top 3 in my list. It IS a heavy, moisture packed cream that smells lovely and left my face so smooth after first application. I fully recommend particularly if you use after the rice cleanser. Wonderful product!

reviews.review_title: Really good for dry winter skin
