reviews.review_text: Even with oily/combination skin, the Midwestern winters can leave my face dry and dull. I started using this at night, and I can already see and feel a huge difference. It gives me the extra moisture I need, and it hasnu2019t caused any breakouts. While Iu2019m still using a more lightweight moisturizer in the morning, this makes an excellent night cream for me.

reviews.review_title: amazing game changer for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know why more people arenu2019t talking about this product. I love, love, love this stuff. Itu2019s so great for dry skin. It literally fixes all of my dry skin issues. I have acne and I use a lot of acne medication and topical medicines which really dry out my chin area. This saves me when my skin is just so dried out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful product. Gives a beautiful glow and moisturizes well. I find this is excellent under makeup too. I just wish it came with a refill because it pains me to throw away such a beautiful container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is very moisturizing ..!!! I always put this cream at night and my skin feels hydrated even after a day. It makes my skin dewy as well. It also reused redness around my nose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does what it says. A little goes a long way, which is great due to the price. Does leave skin feeling tacky. I donu2019t mind the feeling as long as Iu2019m not putting make up on. I prefer the water one, so will be going back to that.

reviews.review_title: best skin cream I've used ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing skin scream! this is the perfect balance between creaminess and lotion that I've been searching for. the cream feels light weight when I out on but enough moisture without the gunk feeling like when Ive used la mer. my skin feels moisturized all day when I put this on in morning. highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer quality at a more affordable price! I spent years trying different moisturizers and my favourite was always La Mer soft cream...which is quite pricey. I tried a sample of Tatcha dewy cream and was blown away. My skin feels exactly the same as when I would use La Mer and the price is WAY better! Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_title: dry skin? acne prone? this is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Trust me when I say Iu2019ve been through a lot of creams, gels and whatever else you can think of when it comes to moisturizers. This is the best for DRY skin. Itu2019s pretty heavy but thatu2019s why I like it and non irritating. Makes my skin super bouncy and soft always. Iu2019m super sensitive when it comes to my face. I break out very easy and a lot of things turn my face red and hot but this has never done me wrong Iu2019m on my 3rd jar. Itu2019s wonderful Iu2019ll never look back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this product because Iu2019ve used other Tatcha products before. I got this as a free sample a few weeks ago and Iu2019ve NEVER broken out so bad. It leaves my skin greasy and oily and Iu2019ve had the worst acne ever. My skin is fairly normal, oily in the t-zone and I get a little dry on my cheeks. I was so upset about this and I tried to figure out the problem for awhile and realized it all started when I started using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite moisturizer. I would recommend this be used in the fall and winter when itu2019s super dry here in Chicago. I have combination skin and my skin has been looking very smooth and put together after using this. I know itu2019s on the pricey side but honestly it doesnu2019t take much but a small amount applied to cover/moisturize all of the face. Also, itu2019s lasted me for a long time now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 73 with good skin; however, as I age it becomes drier (not extremely so).  I like this cream because it remains on my skin (a refresher needed later in day) but it does what it promises

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did not feel moisturizing at all, in fact, it didnu2019t even penetrate. And the ingredients list parfum/fragrance, which is troubling since itu2019s listed as a u201ccleanu201d product by Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!! I use it every night and my skin in the morning looks dewy and radiant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money! It didn't do anything..I guess if you're using drugstore skincare this is gold compare to that, but it honestly is so expensive and I didn't notice anything. I tried almost everything from tatcha and I'm extremely disappointed! Idk what the hype is about because it honestly isn't worth the price. It has nice packaging and it's made in Japan, which typically has good stuff, but it didn't do anything for me and I used it for over a year. PRIMERA is where it's at!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love my tatcha dewy skin cream!  I have combination, problem skin and this not only cleared up my skin but helps keep it SO hydrated when it is severely dry!  I canu2019t go without it or my skin will break out and become dull and dry!  This is a staple in my PM skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a good texture and feels nice on the skin, however, I didn't like the smell at all. Also, it's definitely not for sensitive skin, as both me and my sister (with sensitive skin) tried it and it irritated her face. One star off is for the smell and the price, and the other was for the irritation in my sister's face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for my super sensitive dry skin. Healed persistent eczema around my mouth from masks. Love it. Works amazing with the essence & kyoto cleanse ritual

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your skin is dehydrated - THIS is the cream for you. I look so refreshed and hydrated. My skin is sensitive and I have no reaction with this one. VERY HAPPY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!  Iu2019m 52 and live in the Midwest, winters are awful.  I use this morning and night and have had wonderful results.  My skin is so soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Surprised By My Love For This
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first got a sample of this but wasn't expecting much as someone with oily skin. I've been experiencing dry patches this fall/winter from Retin-A and tried this looking for relief. I was totally blown away by this moisturizer and bought a holiday set with a full size and two other products. My dry patches are instantly soothed when applied and my face feels amazing. It is a bit heavy for daily use but I love it when my skin needs a bit more. I also really enjoy using this as a night time moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do you have to pay that price to get a quality moisturizer? No. Absolutely not. There are so so so many options that are less expensive.   With that said, my face LOVES it. The smell is very herbal (their classic smell) witch I find good and not overwhelming. I donu2019t think I would personally recommend this product to someone with sensitive skin because of the fragrances though.   Amazing results after not even a week. A sweet indulgence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its okay I guess. Definitely not worth the price. I got a mini as a sample and it was great. But then I got the full size and it just congeals on my skin. It is hydrating and it makes my complexion look good but I cant deal with the congealment. I'm just gonna go back to using Kinship. Its way cheaper and it works fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but I don't think I'll be repurchasing it. The fragrance is nice but too intense for my sensitive skin and I found it very irritating. When I applied the cream it left a weird, sticky layer on my face. BUT after working the product in, it did leave my skin feeling very soft and hydrated. If it wasn't for the fragrance I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely skin cream. With my chronically dry skin, I favor thicker formulations. I tried it as a sample first, and even after one application I was blown away. This one not only makes my skin feel soft and supple, but has a long lasting moisturizing effect. Wearing a medical mask constantly due to work has made dry patches by my nose and chin pretty constant, so I am happy to see a dramatic improvement in redness and flakiness with this cream. I have used a few different face serums underneath, and so far did not experience any pilling or poor reactions with foundation/concealer. Very gentle scent that is acceptable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked up a deluxe sample of this from the rewards bazaar because I had heard fantastic things. At first I was impressed with this cream because it definitely did feel plumping, has a silky and pleasant texture, and a faint scent rather than an overpowering one. However, after about two weeks of regular use Iu2019ve realized that the issue of product pilling on my face Iu2019ve been noticing recently is 100% caused by this product. It isnu2019t incredibly moisturizing for me, and that seems to be because the product sits on the top of my skin and doesnu2019t sink in. I can wear it at night but I cannot wear it under makeup because it pills on application. I have been applying it after cleansing and a simple serum, with SPF over top. With other moisturizers Iu2019ve never had this issue, so it will not be a repurchase for me.

reviews.review_title: Oily residue that lasts and lasts...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No dewy skin here. Now that I'm at the change of life (Thanks, 40) my skin that was once so oily that I was worried Exxon would try to tap it as a resource, is now is in the dry/very dry category.  With that in mind, I was looking forward to this highly reviewed moisturizer. I did not experience the dewy - instead, it was a trip back to the oil slick face of my youth.  Coworkers asked me if I was unwell.  I actually had to find a deep cleanser (rather than my normal gentle/moisturizing one) to get it all off.  I used it consistently for 2 weeks hoping my skin would adjust....then came the breakouts.  Score - teenage skin all over again! Wish I would have gotten a sample first, because now I'm stuck with a giant tub of unusable product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is perfect at night over my tretinoin cream and during the day under makeup if Iu2019m at home. It does exactly what it says: my skin is plump, dewy, and moisturized. I noticed a significant difference when I ran out and used other creams. I tried the Tatcha Silk Cream and thereu2019s something in it (the fragrance maybe?) that burns my skin, and I just donu2019t get the same results. Definitely try the dewy skin cream if the original didnu2019t work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: totally worth the splurge. the only moisturizer iu2019ve used that makes a difference especially on my nose area when i get really dry skin around my nose piercing. you donu2019t need a lot either so it lasts a long time. also love that thereu2019s a spatula so youu2019re not dipping your hands in there over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift set, with the water cream and the cleanser .  I have to say i love the dewy skin cream for my skin better than the water cream as far as the texture goes . The water cream does nothing for me. My skin is combo but this dewy feels so moisturizing and light for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I heard really great things about this, until I had the WORST BREAK OUT EVER. This was a nightmare ! One it has a fragrance, but was listed as CLEAN at sephroa. So much for trusting that verified clean product at Sephora. I looked into reviews and nothing but complaints about break outs. Worse decision ever ! And luckily I only bought $20 sample size. Still a rip off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Tatcha products..This one did not disappoint. Luxurious feeling with this cream

reviews.review_title: Best moisturizer I have ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never knew how awesome moisturizer could be until I started using this. I use this twice a day and when I use it in the morning my makeup goes on flawlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I have a very dry skin and this moisturizer helps me to survive in winter time! Definitely recommend for all dry skin type people.

reviews.review_title: Disappointed considering the hype and the price

reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and the formula feels really nice when you first apply it. HOWEVER, after it dried it started to flake off and made me feel like I needed to scrub my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was too thick for me to use in the hotter months. But on dryer and colder months this is a good thick cream to use. A little pricey but I love Tatchau2019s packaging and scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this for the first time last year and then experimented with other less expensive creams. I finally just waited for the rouge 20% off and got thjs again last night! So happy to have this again ... worth the $, there is nothing else that feels and smells like this. Love how it makes my skin look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: been searching for a product to really hydrate myself for so long. this product is truly worth the price. love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use the water cream by tatcha until I got this dewy cream. Pair the dewy cream with the dewy mist and all I can say is GLASS SKIN!!!! Literally! And I have oily to combo skin and this doesnu2019t make me greasy (which is rare). Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst moisturizer i have ever purchased. Its very greasy and doesnu2019t absorb in the skin. I have dry skin thru the fall and winter season and this was horrible and made my face to have a little bumps . I used for week and a half and throw in the garbage . Dont waste your money . There is way better moisturizer then this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time purchasing and I am not disappointed!! I was looking for something very hydrating for the cold winter months that was not just a typical moisturizer and this product does the trick, paired with other skin care of course. On no makeup stay at home lazy days it allows me to have just a beautiful healthy hydrated glow. Feels like I am giving my skin the weekend off with a little pampering. Under makeup and topped with primer it performs beautifully as well, no pilling when combined with other brands of skincare. Sure the price tag is high but if used properly it will last, remember more is not always better but a waste of product. I believe a good portion of the price accounts for the Boujee packaging that makes the purchase of this product feel like you received something special and extra. I love it!!! Definitely worth a try!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I was excited to try until I opened the jar and the fragrance hit me. Itu2019s 2020, there is absolutely no reason skincare should have irritating fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful soothing and ultra-hydrating cream.  The other Tatcha face cream is way too light for my dry skin but this one is perfect and it feels very soothing on application. I am so happy this cream was offered as a reward! Itu2019s wonderfully hydrating and plumping and calms itchiness or tightness that I get from the cold weather or the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. When I'm really dry I supplement with some face oil but overall a great hydrating cream. Smells great. Decent price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my night cream and if I'm feeling dry during the day and need to put some foundation on. I will use this to give my face the extra moisture it needs for my make up to sit nicely on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I purchased this product! I love the smell and it leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth. I have been searching for the right moisturizer for a while especially because my skin gets super dry in the winter and this product has checked all my boxes! 10/10 would recommend and the fact that itu2019s a clean product makes it so much better :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it makes my skin feel soft and Iu2019m acne prone and it hasnu2019t made me break out so thatu2019s good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Our lord and savior tatcha has blessed us with this moisturizer lol. It's seriously so good. It's the perfect texture, consistency, it has a light pleasant scent, and it gives you beautiful dewy glass skin. I'm not a huge fan of the ingredients or price personally but the only real potential downside (if any) is that it does sit on top of the skin so if you don't like feeling your moisturizer, then this might not be for you. Otherwise it's probably one of the best moisturizers sephora carries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/combo skin so I prefer to use this before bed and let me tell you, the next morning when I wake up, my skin is baby soft, smooth, and not greasy at all. This moisturizer is especially nice for this cold season as I live in Minnesota. I'm really loving this cream so far and will definitely be purchasing the full size after I'm done with the sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very disappointed with this cream . It made my face feel real oily and greasy ! I used just a little drop of the cream like they had on directions . I waited after I applied the cream for a while thinking it would dry some but it still had that oily greasy feeling . I will be returning it today .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what sorcery went into formulating this cream. The texture and experience of using this cream is beautiful. It hydrates like I've had a full dose of sleep. I don't even follow up with hydrating oils anymore, this is all my skin needs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s as nice as everyone says. Itu2019s emollient but in a watery way, not a greasy way. And yet it is more oily than a water cream. It has such a pretty smell. Yes, I know. Skincare shouldnu2019t have fragrance. But in this case, the fragrance really adds to the experience of applying it. Iu2019ve gone through 2 jars. Taking a break to see if I can find something more financially sustainable, but Iu2019m sure Iu2019ll treat myself to a jar every now and again.

reviews.review_title: Better than water cream for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this much more than the water cream. This one is more hydrating and moisturizing for my oily skin and keeps sebum production away for some time. Though mid-day my face gets oily again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m very blown away by this moisturizer especially since I never thought my skin would agree with it.  I donu2019t have dry skin but rather oily/combination to a degree (not an oil slick but more on the oilier side) which is why Iu2019m surprised my skin responds the way it does with this cream. Itu2019s gorgeous! So so gorgeous!  It truly lives up to its name u201cthe dewyu201d skin cream as it definitely makes your skin dewy. Itu2019s one of those creams you have to try for yourself as everyone responds differently but if this does suit you, you will LOVE it, I promise :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews but the Tatcha line is AMAZING! I am 55+ with combination skin and this leaves my skin radiant. I use it morning and night along with the Peony eye cream and my skin looks better than it has in years:-) My skin had been dull, lackluster with uneven tone. This hydrates my skin and I have received wonderful comments about my skin ever since starting use of the Tacha Dewy Skin Cream. It is well worth the investment as a little goes a long way. It makes my skin look youthful again!

I like this product but i wasnu2019t blown away by it. While it did create dewiness, It didnu2019t feel deeply hydrating or nourishing. I would use this as skin prep before my makeup but will not repurchase as an everyday moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer feels amazing. I think I made a mistake buying this one and not the water based one. It made my skin a little red, since I had sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I so wanted to love this after hearing about the amazing reviews. I got this as a deluxe sample to try from Beauty offers. I tried the water cream and it wasn't hydrating enough. I have Combo skin with dry patches, and thought this would be a great staple for my winter routine. Unfortunately it just did not work. It's been over 3 hours since applying and it still hasn't sunk into my skin and has made it overly oily and tacky (I used a very small amount   - little goes a long way). This cream is meant for someone with very dry dry dry skin. I would not recommend this for normal, oily or combo skin, or for summer use. It smells lovely and love the purple. I think I will try the silk cream to see if that balances things out. If you have dry skin, I recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Reminds me of cold cream... so, no.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed. I really like their cleanser... it is one of the best skin care products I have ever used. This reminds me of cold cream. It is heavy, feels oily and doesn't offer much improvement in the condition of my skin.   I won't buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I have dry skin!  Even though I live in Florida this cream works great. On my second jar of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Too greasy and doesn't absorb into my skin. Might work on dry skin but definitely doesn't work for my combo skin sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this moisturizer! The smell, the creamy texture, the richness, the way my face feels! So smooth after application, it makes your skin feel like silk!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s too greasy and thick donu2019t like much. I was so excited but no more. Waste of money you can buy other great face cream in the same budget

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and really had high hopes for it. While it feels pleasant when applied to the skin, it's actually quite greasy and does not absorb, even after after I applied it. If I run my finger on my skin, the residue of the cream peels. Unfortunately I will not be purchasing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found what I was looking for and I didnu2019t have to spend $100+!!  This is a fantastically rich moisture bomb that absorbs beautifully.  My dry skin drinks this up and I love the dewy and yet not shiny finish.    Layers nicely over my serums. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish they would make a jumbo size of this. The BEST moisturizer. Light yet effective in hydration. Lovely scent but isnu2019t sensitizing. Itu2019s everyoneu2019s holy grail for a reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product with my points. I was sceptical at first, I didnu2019t care much for the primer putty, didnu2019t work with my skin. But THIS. O. M. G. A little goes along way, so if you are feeling greasy, use less. I have dry patches with an oily T zone. This is nice and light Iu2019m just really impressed. No strong fragrance, it is a thick cream but I like that, I feel like it actually absorbs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favorite moisturizer! I use a wide variety of skin products every day, so I needed a moisturizer that would sooth and nourish my skin. I have combination skin and this is just thick enough to keep my skin super hydrated without making my skin overly-oily. Ive noticed my skin is more resilient and my pores are less visible. Less redness especially with the onset of dryer weather. Feels so so nice on the skin too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: well deserved face cream. A little goes a long way. I have dry skin and when I use this product, it's not oily, and no residue. creamy and I have seen a positive change in the appearance of my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating. Have been using mostly after scrubs, at night or whenever skin is extra dry. Usually donu2019t have to reapply moisturizers after use. It is light enough for everyday use. I go back and forth between this and the water cream. Skin is really soft. I have normal skin, with some oil in t-zone and sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Love this for my eczema and acne prone skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this as a free sample in the mail with other products and Iu2019ve been using it the past 2 days. I really love this as a night cream since itu2019s heavy on the face. Itu2019s non comedogenic which is great for my acne prone skin. But itu2019s also great for my eczema too since Iu2019m extremely dry. Iu2019m obsessed with the texture and smell of this cream too! Itu2019s very mildly scented which I tend to stay away from fragrance but itu2019s so minimal and has a nice natural clean scent it doesent bother me at all. The texture is rich, creamy, velvety and so soft on the skin. I will definitely be buying the regular size when Iu2019m done with this sample!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This products works better for people with dry skin. Itu2019s thick but super moisturizing. I actually apply it at night along with hyalyronic acid and squalane and I wake up with a baby face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this moisturizer would be horrible so that I would never want to purchase this again because the price is very high.  However, I LOVE this product.  It made my skin feel and look gorgeous, and did not give an oily look that many products branded dewy can easily do.  This gives me a great glow under my makeup, and I want to repurchase this product 100 times over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a sample in my last purchase and when I put it on my skin, it was so thick and sticky. It wasnu2019t even absorbed and my face looked oily. To compare with The Ordinary products that Iu2019ve been used for months this one doesnu2019t even worth the money. I recommend to try it before purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion helps give my skin a new glow and keeps it clear. It keeps my skin super moisturized for at least 24 hours!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in my last order. I didnu2019t have the highest of hopes for it because so far Iu2019ve been let down with the tatcha products I have tried. The silk canvas pilled under my makeup and this cream made my face feel incredibly sticky. I would not purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t absorb well in your skin and leaves skin greasy a few hours after application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and hoped that spending a little extra $$ on what seemed to be a good product would be helpful. This cream is VERY thick and just feels like it's sitting on my face and just makes me look sweaty/oily. Will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I took off a star because this doesnt agree with my morning serums, so I can only use this at night or if im not using my serums in the morning. I have hyper-dry skin and this is one of the ONLY creams available where I do not have dry skin again 3 hours later, so the drawbacks are worth it for me. Itu2019s expensive, but Iu2019m willing to invest in things that make my skin feel and look hydrated. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product but only in winter time. Itu2019s very heavy to use it on summer time. So I recommend to try it when your skin is really needs so strong moisturizing effect product otherwise you will hate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would highly recommend getting this moisturizer. It has some blurring capabilities and looks beautiful underneath makeup. The scent is very pleasant and the texture is relatively thick for a moisturizer which I love as it works with dry skin. It is quite pricey but it lasts a really long time.

reviews.review_title: u201cheathy glowu201d more like greasy or oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews before purchasing products, however I rarely leave them, I felt this was a must. I have normal to dry skin and seen that the dewy cream is for dry skin. I was so excited to try this product as the packaging is so beautiful and feels fancy. That means nothing when the product inside is disappointing. The cream feels very smooth going on but thatu2019s it, it just sits on top of your face. It does not truly penetrate the skin. I used the back of my hand and tapped my forehead and it looks oily or as the description says u201chealthy glow.u201dAs if I need those blotting papers. I have given this product a couple weeks to see if there would be any improvement, hoping each time it will miraculously work but it has failed. So if anyone is on the fence like I was, and you read the reviews that have said they have dry skin and this doesnu2019t work, itu2019s the truth. Save your money and try something else. I find myself always going back to Youth To The People as it hydrates my skin and doesnu2019t make me feel or look greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one fantastic moisturizer. I do have normal/oily combination skin. OMG it does a great job. My face is well moisturized all day long. My skin looks youthful and dewy as well. People don't believed I'm 36 years old. People mistaken me for being between 23-25 years old, even one time I was mistaken for being 21 LOL. For the price of this moisturizer was worth it. Small amounts goes long way with the help of this applicator. I would highly recommend anyone with this fantastic moisturizer. Also I mostly use this at day time and SK-II RNA cream at night time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! Especially for dry or combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On my 5th jar... I love the feel and finish of this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face product. I use it in my nightly routine, and also when I have a makeup free day. Makes you look refreshed, and makes your skin feel fabulous. All you need is a small amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the feel of it when I put it on...but it doesn't really absorb! Face stayed sticky after a few hours and can even rub off on my hands....then the back of my hands gets dewy and sticky....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too oily. Makes my skin look greasy and takes too long to absorb. I love their other products (e.g., water cream, rice cleanser, etc.) and have had no complaints about them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: definitely made  my skin dewy and is long lasting. I started with the smaller size just to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a Kit to try all the products in this line. Smells good but doesnu2019t really get absorbed into your skin. I wake up in the morning with ultra greasy skin and it still comes off on my hands! 6-8 hours later, your moisturizer should absorb at least a little. This stuff is overpriced and doesnu2019t really do much. It even made me break out from being too greasy. Iu2019ll stick with my Clinique and La mer. I sleep on a silk pillowcase as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much! I paid 68$ for nothing.. :( it leaves my face super oily...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I buy this every month for my partner and itu2019s the only moisturizer sheu2019s ever found that works for her dry, sensitive skin. And I have seen her try everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely made my skin very soft but not enough moisturizing, every morning I feel little bit dry around my mouth area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer I have ever used. Makes my skin feel amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I had all the money in the world, this would be my go to moisturizer. I love the packaging and the little spoon/applicator that comes with it. I have dry skin and I feel so hydrated afterwards. This is definitely my splurge moisturizer along with DE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product, and as well as u201cThe Water Creamu201d. Now I have combination skin, and this product works wonders for me in the winter. The cold climate dries me out, and the water cream just doesnu2019t do a great job in those extreme temperatures. However, u201cThe Dewy Skin Creamu201d is great for the winter or for those who have dry skin. My mother in law has dry skin and this has done wonders for her. It makes her look absolutely radiant. All in all, itu2019s a great product. Prou2019s: feels light on the face, but is extremely hydrating. Smells clean. A little goes a long way. The conu2019s: the price. Now, for luxury beauty there will always be a heavier price tag, but with this product you are getting your moneyu2019s worth. I also suffer with adult acne, and this does not clog my pores, nor does it make me break out. I highly recommend this product, and I will continue buying more tatcha products in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the best night cream I have ever used!  I have normal to dry skin, and this feels very rich and hydrating.  It has a very pleasant soft smell.  The packaging is beautiful too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin, thought this would be too much on my skin but its not. I only feel it on for 10-20 min

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer for dry skin. I cant live without this moisturizer , specially in winter. It hydrate as well as leave skin dewy glow and soft .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing Creme! This Creme is rich, thick and dewy. They are not lying! When applied at night before bed, you wake up with soft supple skin, not dried out skin. When applied in the morning it literally keeps your skin moist and hydrated all day long...

reviews.review_title: D, THIS WAS MY 3RD ORDER, WILL NEVER STOP USING IT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: TATCHA, IS THE BEST SKIN CREAM, I HAVE USED EXPENSIVE ONES, BUT TATCHA IS THE BEST

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of the best moisturizers I have ever tried. I have super dry skin and this has made my skin so soft and smooth and glowy. So many people noticed the glow haha. I would definitely buy this again when Iu2019m finished with my current one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am an impulse shopper, so I decided that Tatcha was going to be my new big brand. I planned on switching a ton of my routine over to it. But I had a moment of clarity and got a set of mini samples, thankfully, because most of them didn't do much for me. I wanted to love this. I tried to love this. Not a fan of the scent, and honestly I found that it didn't moisturize for me as well as my tub Aveeno night cream. But I have been using it on my hands, so that's something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why does this have fragrance???? This is not appropriate for people who actually have sensitive skin. Get rid of the fragrance! It is not necessary. Or at least create a fragrance free alternative.

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer, but not if youu2019re in a hurry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m torn on this one. I absolutely love this product. But it wouldnu2019t work in my regular lifestyle. My skin is incredibly dry and sensitive right now with the weather transition. It applies almost like a thin layer of Vaseline. Iu2019m currently WFH, so I can apply in the morning and let it soak in for a few hours (yes, HOURS). By dinner time, I look great. My skin looks youthful. But if I was heading out the door every morning, this wouldnu2019t work. It takes a long time to soak in, but it does work. I am able to apply at least some coverup under my eyes by late morning- just in time for any Zoom calls scheduled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve bought this twice now, which for me is the sign I love something. I have mainly dry skin; this is so easy and light but keeps my skin moisturized. I actually use this as a primer as well, and it works great and gives me a dewy look all day. I love for the moisturizing benefit, but love I can use under makeup makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new holy grail. Nice & light yet super moisture. Smells great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why people who are oily or concerned about shininess are buying a DEWY skin cream... donu2019t listen to them! Iu2019m currently taking accutane and this moisturizer has been amazing! I have dry/sensitive skin anyways, but accutane has made my skin even more so. This moisturizer is great for twice daily use. I donu2019t find that it makes me shiny, but it certainly has a u201cdewyu201d effect which I love! My skin soaks this up wonderfully and I havenu2019t found that it increases active acne on my face or chest. As someone who suffers from severe cystic and fungal acne, I was concerned about this before I bought the moisturizer but I havenu2019t noticed any adverse reactions and Iu2019ve been using it for 8 months! (On my second jar now) Definitely try this if youu2019ve been thinking about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very rich cream. Great for dry skin but not necessarily normal skin. For my skin this cram is too heavy and my boyfriend mentioned that my skin is too shiny after using the cream so I would not recommend it for not dry skin. Other than that the cream smells amazing and design of products is beautiful.

reviews.review_title: not good if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I breakout with using this product. Not sure how they recommend it for sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: I break out and my face becomes oily with this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everytime I use this cream I break out and my skin has an oily film after a few hours. I wanted to love this cream but at this point I only use it sparingly when my skin is drier than usual. I don't recommend for combination skin like mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love Tatcha , but take OUT ALL the fragrance!!! Why is their fragrance in face products EVERY skin doctor will tell you to NOT use products w/perfume!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It works wonders and I absolutely love it but I don't think it's worth the price to use as a daily moisturizer.  My pores look visible smaller and pimple have decreased in size over night. Face stays moisturized through the day and night. Doesn't feel/look greasy and a pea size is truly all you need. Love the spatula on the cap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like all of the different type of Tatcha creams I've used but I like this one the best because it leaves my skin looking healthy with a fresh dewy complection.  Great for no make up days.  I'd definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. My face always feels fresh and hydrated, I used to have dry patches on some parts of skin not anymore! I used a lot of the tatcha products definitely my top favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cream! It smells great and hydrates my skin. I have combination acne prone skin and it doesnu2019t make me break out nor feel too thick. Some reason this feels better than the water one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with the smell and the feel of this product. It reminds me of flower petals and itu2019s my favorite part of my morning routine. I also feel like itu2019s super moisturizing and not too heavy. Iu2019m going to be a life long buyer for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I use it at night because it is a thicker cream and when I wake up in the morning my skin feels and looks soft and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Something did not react well with my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of Tatcha products that I absolutely love, but something in this did not agree with my skin, I have a dry forehead and normal skin on the rest of my face, so I was hoping this would give me the extra hydration my skin needed. However, after the first use, my forehead broke out in a string of acne across my forehead. I do not have acne prone skin and have never had a product react this way to my skin before. I don't think I have sensitive skin and I wish I could pinpoint what the problem could be. A Sephora employee thought it could possibly be a reaction to the green tea or silicone content. I was surprised since this has great quality ingredients. It does smell nice and makes the skin look hydrated, but after trying this a second time and having more breakouts, I've had to give up on using it. I did have good results with the Tatcha Water Cream and Tarte Baba Bomb moisturizer without any reaction.

I tried the water moisturizer in sample form from tatcha but it was way too light for me, Iu2019ve been using the dewy skin cream in combination with Tatchas new rice wash cleanser and have been enjoying the combo. No irritation or breakouts, although the moisturizer might be a bit too heavy for someone with acne prone skin. For me itu2019s been perfect and I have noticed hydration and plumpness all day long from the moisturizer. My only downfall with tatcha is the price point. I do find it to be slightly over priced but like I said so far the moisturizer is living up to the other high rank reviews. Iu2019ll decide by the end of the jar if it will be a repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lovely texture and packaging belong to the one and only the Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream! I've been hearing people rave and rave about this product for quite a long time, and it definitely had my interest especially because I have a dry skin type and tend to love anything that claims to be dewy. However, when I investigated further and discovered that the price tag on this guy is $68 (for a pretty standard size of 1.7 oz!), I definitely started to second guess whether I really *needed* to give this product a try or not. I gave it some time and consideration, but found myself always coming back to it and constantly adding and removing it from my Sephora cart, so eventually I just decided to go ahead and finally splurge on this pricey moisturizer to find out what all the hype was about. And I must say I've been pleasantly surprised! I was a lil worried that the word 'dewy' was in the product's name solely for marketing purposes and that it wouldn't translate to being actually dewy-looking, especially on my dry skin. But I was mistaken! This moisturizer is luxuriously moisturizing and definitely does its name justice in the dewy department. And, luckily, the seemingly mediocre 1.7oz of product you get actually goes a long way because you truly only need to use a very, very small amount of this moisturizer to reap its benefits. I find myself using about half of the amount of product I'd typically use with most moisturizers when I use this particular product. Which leads me to my next topic, which would be whether or not I think the Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream is worth its high price: to that I say that, honestly, it depends! If you have a drier skin type, tend to love any product that claims to be 'dewy,' and can appreciate the bougie details like the luxe packaging and subtle but refined scent of Tatcha products, then I think it's definitely worth it to look deeper into the idea of purchasing this moisturizer to give a try for yourself! If not, then it might not be for you!

reviews.review_title: My Favorite Moisturizer - Worth the Investment

reviews.review_text: OMG I have found my holy grail nighttime moisturizer!! Itu2019s what Iu2019ve always been wanting and looking for! This should definitely have a 5 star rating! I can see how someone with oily skin would not like it because it is so dewy, but oh my goodness for me itu2019s dewy in the best possible ways! I saw an article say it makes your face feel like a freshly seemed dumpling and thatu2019s so true! Lol It smells DIVINE. Not an overpowering Fake smell. Itu2019s very light and smells kind of natural and like a spa. I love everything about it. Please Tatcha never stop making this!!! Love love love! Not sticky at all. Very creamy but doesnu2019t feel heavy on the skin. It melts into the skin but at the same time leaves it looking glowy and u201cdewyu201d. I could go on and on!  If you want your skin to glow but donu2019t like a heavy feeling either this is for you! I got the mini size to try it but Iu2019m definitely buying the big one when this runs out! Ok Iu2019ll stop now :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW FULLY OBSESSING!!!! If you suffer from eczema get this!!!  Iu2019ve tried it all too hun trust me and this product is wild!! If your always trying to paint your glow on like I was hahah get this! It left my skin so plump and hydrated and with continual use it only gets better. My complexion is even and skin is glowing!! This product is LIT ladies!!!! Xx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the sample size. The formula was good just not for my skin type. I had a few pimples the next day from it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini size because I'm in the process of finding my perfect moisturizer. This moisturizer smells and feels amazing.  It is so silky and creamy and absorbs so nicely into the skin, leaving it feeling baby smooth.  I took one star off because I think due to the scent it was not good for use on my eyelids (it made them red, dry, and itchy) but everywhere else on my face LOVES this cream. I can't wait to buy the full size and compare it to my DE LaLa Retro cream!

reviews.review_title: High Quality but Needs Some Adjustments.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So. Let's keep in mind that this is 70 US dollars, okay? Some of that money is donated to a women's education fundraiser. Also, I have dry, sensitive skin.  Pros: The packaging, down to the container and the box you open it with- is beautiful and shows thoughtfulness. A little bit goes a long way. I have dry sensitive skin, and this product did not break me out nearly as much as other new products that I try. Leaves the skin feeling baby soft- even in winter months.  Enjoyable subtle scent.  leaves behind a dewy, 6 hour glow.  Tightens skins. Works fantastic overnight and during the day. I feel pretty when I wear this.  Cons:  The stick feels cheap. The packaging should be biodegradable or returnable (it is reusable) because recycling is not good enough to make an environmental difference.  Does not work well for targeting areas, due to the dewiness of the cream, the difference between bare skin and product application is noticeable.  It is not weightless. I notice that it sits on my skin during the day- like a light filmy texture.   This is a luxury product through and through, my product lasted 6 months with consistent application. I don't find this product practical, however, it's a nice pick-me-up or gift if you're like me and sometimes uses objects to fill the void in your life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been getting between 0-3 hours of sleep consecutively for the past week. I donu2019t recommend this in the slightest but I DO recommend this cream. In fact, I couldnu2019t recommend it more. Despite being severely sleep-deprived, I look like Iu2019ve gotten 8 hours of sleep every day. Now by no means is this a free pass to skimp on sleep, but the fact that it is powerful enough to counteract the effects of my sleep deprivation is astonishing. Never before have I used a cream that made my skin show such visible improvement (with or without adequate sleep). All my friends have noticed the change since I started using it, and have shared their glowing (pun-intended) praise. If youu2019re looking for a dupe for this product to circumvent paying the hefty price, Iu2019m sorry, but you just wonu2019t find one. This stuff is the real deal and well worth the cost. Good news is, a little goes a long way. Iu2019m two months into using this (I apply it every night) and I still have about a 1/3 left. I highly recommend this as an investment in your skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Really works with waking up the skin. Leaving me looking dewy and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This worth the price and worth the hype if you have dry sensative skin. I brought this and used it for a week and then switch over to another moisturizer the next week. After I started using the other moisturizer I immediately started to realize how much dryer my face looked. I started using this one again and have been using it ever since. It gives such a nice glow and you do not need that much product to get the job done. 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont usually write reviews, but I have had awful skin for years up until I started doing dermatology treatments and completely renovated my skin care routine. I have a combination of oily skin but a dry flaky nose. I have tried SO many moisturizers to fix it but nothing worked UNTIL I came across TATCHA!! This moisturizer is AMAZING. Its super thick and creamy. Softens my face instantly and even has a beautiful aromatic scent. Since I started using it a few months ago Definitely, I haven't had ANY dryness whatsoever. Definitely recommend 100%. Their deep cleanser is awesome too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice night time moisturizer. For me, this would be too thick to wear under makeup or even alone during the day. But for those days where your skin feels extra dry, this is the ticket. I did get one very small whitehead using this (no other explanation, this was the only new thing I tried) so I knocked off a star. But overall, this would be greatest during the winter, when you feel like your skin is going to flake right off your face. I bought this travel size, and Iu2019m saving the rest for just that.

reviews.review_title: Ooh, that smell Can't you smell that smell?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so strong like the 90 year old granny we all have thatu2019s heavy on the perfume. It doesnu2019t dissipate. Itu2019s very strong almost like a Bath & Body lotion. Made my skin irritated. I love rich moisturizers but this one is almost greasy it sits on top of skin and stays very oily reminds me of lubriderm lotion that doesnu2019t actually moisturize it just makes you greasy. I prefer La Mer or Drunk Elephant Whipped LaLa as they are very rich but melt into the skin. This product gets a heck no from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I admit it, this cream is expensive. But it worth every penny. Best to use during winter. I have dry aging sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: Wonderful moisturizer!  Love the rich creamy texture.  I have dry skin and really enjoyed this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin feel amazing. I wake up with the softest skin. Doesnu2019t break me out. Expensive but worth it.

reviews.review_text: Wanted to see what the hype was all about, and it definitely lives up to Dewy. It smells very nice, and looks beautiful, but man is it heavy! I dont feel like it absorbs very well, and more just sits on the skin, but I do have oily skin. I believe dry skin would love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Highly recommend trying this dewy skin cream or the water cream for oily combo skin. You wonu2019t regret it! The dewy skin cream isnu2019t to heavy and absorbs nicely onto the skin.

reviews.review_text: This moisturized well, but actively made my breakouts worse, likely due to silicone being the fifth listed ingredient. Iu2019m surprised that such an ingredients-focused company would put so much silicone in their moisturizer.

I had tried the sample kit for this and other Tatcha dewy products and it got me so many compliments that I caved in and got a full size container. reviews.review_text: Great, thick moisturizer.  I use more often on my neck than my face but it doesn't break my neck out like some other creams do.  I really love the way it makes my skin feel.

reviews.review_text: I was initially cautious about purchasing this product since I had a sample from a Tatcha kit I previously bought, and it seemed very thick. I also tried the Tatcha Water Cream and loved the consistency, but I simply wasnu2019t getting the moisture I needed for the extremely dry climate I live in.  Iu2019ve now used the Dewy Skin Cream for weeks and my face is refreshed, glowing and has not had a single breakout - I thought the thickness of the cream would be pore-clogging but it surprisingly is not! Love this product and all things Tatcha.

reviews.review_text: This beautiful cream has changed my skincare life! Itu2019s wonderful for dry or dehydrated skin and it also helps with dullness. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this product enough.  My absolute favorite skin cream, hands down. I decided to try it out after using Creme de la Mer, and after just four days of using this (only nightly), my fine lines are already improving, and my minor breakouts are completely gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream! It is expensive, however, a little goes a long way. The reason why some people are saying it doesnu2019t absorb is because 1. They are putting too much on their face or 2. They are using it too frequently. Iu2019ve used it once and my skin is already visibly brighter and plumper! Iu2019ve always had combination skin and this works wonders. If it lasts as long as Iu2019m expecting it to (hopefully a year!) then the price is not bad, youu2019re just paying more upfront for it to last significantly longer than cheaper skincare products. 10/10! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my first tatcha purchase and i'm in AWE. can i just mention the packaging that the jar comes in is insanely beautiful and well crafted? literally better than any higher-end skincare product i've purchased so far. i appreciate the small intricate details so much. aside from that, this moisturizer is perfect for my oily + sensitive skin. it's extremely hydrating and thick. it's scent is subtle and not overpowering. my skin is in love! this product has the wow factor that you're looking for. i'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great staple moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic moisturizer! It really hydrates the skin and gives it a nice glow. It also smells ver nice and the packaging is super cute. Strongly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m currently on the hunt for a new cream, so I bought the small size to try. At first, I loved it. So Iu2019ve ordered the larger size. Well it will be returned as soon as it gets here. I have dry skin and prefer a heavier cream. So at first I loved this. It did give me glowing skin and I did not have the pilling effect others did. But after two weeks of use, I noticed I was getting a few pimples. I never break out anymore so I thought it was maybe a weird hormone thing. I also noticed I that my skin was getting very pink on my cheeks and nose and that after applying Iu2019d get itchy. This is the only new product Iu2019ve used so it must be causing it. Then I went back to the reviews and read the 1-2 star ones. I wish I had read them before buying. Reviews stated exactly what Iu2019m experiencing. I also learned it has dimethicone and myristyl mysristate as major ingredients. I never would have bought it knowing that. Both of these will cause irritation and breakouts. I falsely assumed because itu2019s a u201ccleanu201d product it wouldnu2019t have these. Iu2019ll have to make sure to check the ingredients on the u201ccleanu201d products as closely as the normal ones from now on.

reviews.review_title: Too much product for shelf life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is similar to summer Fridayu2019s jet lag mask in my opinion. Itu2019s very thick and heavy, not meant for daytime wear. Only reason Iu2019m giving 3 stars is because of the EXPIRING RATE. I bought this little jar a year ago and I am not even half way through it with regular use. This stuff has a shelf life of only 6 months! Unfortunately the texture has changed after time and I cannot use it anymore. I really wish they sold either a smaller size so your not wasting so much, or change the formula so that you can use the whole jar. For this reason I will not buy again. Only buy this if you donu2019t care about either wasting half the container or you have someone to share it with !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A Sephora employee recommended the Tatcha line to me in store.  I tried the Water Cream first, as I thought that would be more appropriate for my combo skin...however, I didn't find it sufficiently moisturizing.  Enter the Dewy Skin Cream.  I wish I didn't love it as much as I do because of the price, but as another reviewer noted, it is the epitome of  luxury self-care.  It effectively moisturizes both the oily and drier areas of my skin, applies and is absorbed like a dream, the light fragrance is pleasant, not overpowering, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.  I apply this at night, and also occasionally before make-up if my skin feels dry.  No issue applying make up on this.  Leaves skin with a naturally radiant finish!  I look forward to using this product daily!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 6 months and my skin has been well hydrated and extremely soft. I also noticed an improvement in my acne after using for the first initial 2 months as my face used to be extremely dry and over produce oil in my t-zone areas. I no longer have this problem since using this product. I use it in the AM/PM and I only use the recommended pearl size amount so it does not leave my skin with a sticky feeling. I have eczema/sensitive skin and have less flare ups on my neck since using the dewy skin moisturizer. I will admit it is a bit pricey for a moisturizer that only lasts about 2.5 months but I will continue to buy this product because it  has personally help/made my skin feel and look better.

Even though the percentage is on the lower side, I do believe its slightly unfair to label consumer products as clean with such a high price tag. Words of advice, research your skincare line if CLEAN takes priority in your daily routine!

I may look at using only at night and using something lighter for daytime, which is a first for me!  Iu2019ve broken out a little, but Iu2019ve changed my whole skin regime, so it may not be the moisturizer. Also cruelty free, which I love. Overall highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: Received a sample and love the scent and how moisturized my skin felt so I purchased the full size.

reviews.review_text: The Dewy Skin Cream is hands down the best skincare product Iu2019ve bought in years. Iu2019m a skincare junkie and was toying over this purchase for months. Finally during the last sale I caved, and itu2019s now my absolute favorite product in my routine. I use it right after Truth Serum as the last step in my morning skincare, and I have never seen my skin so radiant, fresh, and bright. My skin feels bouncy and I honestly sometimes skip makeup all together because it looks so amazing. A little bit goes a long way, definitely a lot further than some of the other moisturizers I was using like GlamGlow.

It does leave a dewy-hydrated look but it looks healthy and radiant. Iu2019m a retinol user and find that this moisturizer along with The Ordinaryu2019s rosehip oil works amazing together. Itu2019s pricy but itu2019s definitely worth it. The smell is not overbearing and a little bit goes a long way, I will definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample with an online order. I have combo skin that tends to lean way more towards dry. My skin also used to be acne prone but Iu2019ll maybe get 1 or 2 pimples every two months now. My skin was feeling particularly dry the day I used this. I love The Water Cream so I figured this could be a better option during the winter months. I used a very small amount and it felt like Iu2019d slathered my face in Vaseline. After only a few hours, I noticed 2 or 3 cystic zits pop up and it clogged my pores. Nothing else was different about my skincare routine that day aside from this. It just felt gross. Iu2019m glad that I tried this before spending my money on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
