While the dewy texture is amazing, I find that even when used sparingly the product doesn't necessarily feel absorbed by my skin which is why I give it a 4 star rating. Undecided if I will purchase again just yet but definitely worth a try if you are on the fence about purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So rich and hydrating/plumping. Itu2019s expensive but itu2019s worth it to me. Makes me skin look like a dream when I wake up in the morning! Wish you got more product though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry, textured skin and this is one of the only moisturizeru2019s Iu2019ve used that actually keeps my skin feeling hydrated and smooth throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I suffer from eczema and dry skin, specifically in the top right side of of my face. When I first tried this, I had already run out of my past holy grail moisturizer (due to the pandemic), so my skin was dry and cracking in some parts and I was relying on hydrocortisone. I have been using a hyaluronic acid serum underneath my moisturizer so I used that first and my skin soaked it up. I used tatcha right street and immediately my son loved it! I was super scared that where my skin was kinda cracked it would burn like crazy, and instead it felt like it calmed it down. My skin did feel dewy and plump, which it super hard to come by, because some moisturizers feel oily out watery, but this one feels thick and it goes on smooth. When I first opened it I was afraid of the fragrance and feared for my skin, but it honestly did not effect me in any way. I put Supergoopu2019s sunscreen unseen on top before going out in the morning and they mixed well! Even when I did sweat a bit (bc of Texas heat) I didnu2019t feel oily or sticky, my skin just felt normal and still very plump. Immediately from the start you could see a difference in my dry patch of eczema. You couldnu2019t see the flakyness (in fact it shedded off painlessly) and where I had small abrasions it did not burn at all!! Do I think you should get this if you have oily skin? Probably not, simply because you might not like there dewy feel on top of that. I have super sensitive skin that breaks out almost immediately after using something that my skin doesnu2019t like and so far I donu2019t see anything wrong. Stuff with a fragrance usually makes me break out, but after seeing all the hype about this product, it got me curious to try it. I will say that the product does kinda sit on your face for a while, which has never happened to me because my skin usually soaks it all up, but I feel like thatu2019s what itu2019s supposed to do in order to provide the right hydration. All in all, I LOVE this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect moisturizer. I have combination skin but towards the dry side. This cream is not thick, greasy or sticky. On the pricey end but worth it. Such a refreshing scent and feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream does feel very nice and even smells nice. I have oil skin and this product doesnu2019t leave my face feeling greasy, however I feel I may need to try the water cream version instead. This one I learned is for dry skin. I didnu2019t see a huge change. I do love Tatcha products still, but this one is not for me.

reviews.review_title: Not just for dry skin users. Great for combo-oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination oily skin, but as Iu2019m getting older (Iu2019m 31) Iu2019ve noticed my skin getting more and more dry. This stuff does a great job of moisturising my skin without making me more oily in my Tzone. A little product goes a long way and it doesnu2019t feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a perfect texture with a great scent that isnu2019t overpowering . It feels very smooth without leaving the skin greasy itu2019s pure luxury. The skin feels hydrated and healthy .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for dry skin I tried too many products this is the one for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have seen the biggest change in my skin after incorporating this into my skincare routine than I have with any other product.  My skin is totally hydrated and glowing.  Worth the price tag.  I have combo/oily skin and I use this at night and use the tatcha water cream in the morning (which I also love!).  I also have very sensitive skin which breaks out from many moisturizers, but this one is very moisturizing without the breakouts.  Canu2019t say enough good things about it, buy it itu2019s totally worth it !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. It is super hydrating and makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. It is a heavier cream, which is exactly what I wanted since my skin is on the drier side. I use this day and night. Would recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went through the mini size of this. It feels gross on the skin, doesn't absorb into it properly. Drugstore moisturizers do a better job.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU HAVE DRY SKIN....HOLY GRAIL IS HERE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING FOR DRY SKIN. If you do not have dry skin, this is not for you, as you'll most likely feel its too heavy for you. It super rich and more on the thicker side. I have really bad dry skin & my skin drinks this up leaving me looking dewy, supple, and hydrated. I've gone through 5 of these already and don't plan on stopping any time soon...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a lot of rave about Tacha so I bought a few of their products, including this Dewy Skin Cream.  Yes it does glow on your skin, but it is very sticky and I did not like it.

reviews.review_title: If you have dry skin- this is your holy grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time, favorite moisturizer ever. Is it pricy? Yes, but to me itu2019s worth it. I have really dry skin, especially since I have a thyroid issue and have dry skin due to my meds. I use the spatula that comes with it and take a small dollop of it, and dot it all over my face and neck, then rub in. I personally only use this at night, as I have another good moisturizer for day time, however Iu2019d you have really dry skin you can use it whenever. I wouldnu2019t suggest this product for anyone that doesnu2019t have dry skin. Itu2019s too moisturizing for them. This product is one of my holy grails though for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creamy, dewy feel. It is very rich, so you just need a little bit on your face. I have seen a huge difference on how my makeup looks over this moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dewy Skin Cream is successful in creating a dewy complexion, but calling it a cream feels almost misleading. It has the thickness of a cream, the weight of a balm, and the drag of a heavy, dry gel. My immediate thought was aerated (non-)petroleum jellyu2014it has its uses, but isn't something I necessarily want on my face. While I can't definitively identify the cream as the cause, I have experienced a mild breakout along the jaw and a looming, mid-face pimple (from someone who may get 2u20133 per year, at best). I planned to use this product in the morning to take advantage of its cosmetic effects (and preferring something more technical for sleep), but I have little desire wear it in any mix of heat or humidity, especially with sunscreen layered on. If used at night product, I'd suggest a generous time allowance for absorption before potentially touching face to pillow. I'll try mixing sparingly with my preferred creams to make the texture palatable and maintain some of the effect, but Dewy Skin Cream is off the repurchase list. Beautifully packaged, unnecessarily fragranced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. Instantly my skin looked fresh and dewy. It's an absolute dream for dry skin. I do wish, however, that it didn't have fragrance. I haven't had a bad reaction to the fragrance but I know for some, that might be a problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face cream Iu2019ve ever used. If you have dry skin itu2019s a must!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely lives up to what it claims to do. It gives you a beautiful dewy look with a flawless complexion. This is perfect for when you want that fresh summer hydrated look. However, if you over do it you can look very greasy so apply lightly then more if you require it! I also find it to be quite thick on the skin but i dont mind it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is great night time before bed moisturizer. It's super creamy and rich. It just plumps your skin making it feel so soft. When i wake up my skin looks so radiant and youthful and still moisturized and glowing. It's too powerful for daytime or under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is quite heavy and intense so I only recommend it for people with dry skin! However, it is such nice quality and it leaves my skin looking and feeling so dewy, and my skin always feels super soft after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

The packaging is also very cute. I think a lot of users might be using too much of the cream which is making them look greasy. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry and sensitive skin so I bought this in hopes that it would be as good as people say it is. It just didnu2019t work for my skin, I felt like it made it dryer than it was before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! This is my 4th time buying it. I also have a few of the tiny travel size cream that I got for 100pts each to take when I travel or to just put in my purse. I have very dry skin and have struggled to find a good moisturizer. i think I've used around 50 diff creams and moisturizers, but this one is def my number 1 choice! An added plus is the little gold spoon :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live for this cream. I love the texture, the smell, and of course, the way it makes my skin look. The whole experience of it just feels so luxurious. I'm 31 and it's brought back that dewy glow that's been missing since I was probably 28. I put it on a few minutes before my makeup, and before going to bed. Keeps my skin feeling moisturized all day. Purchased it recently for the 3rd time. For reference, I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way, I massage this into my skin at bed time. I wake up with a clearer dewy complexion. Hasn't caused any irritation, I have the most sensitive skin alive (my skin rashes to any product with BHA's or plants containing them)   I naturally have small little pimples and redness and this helps calm them by morning

reviews.review_title: whiteheads and clogs pores very deeply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells great and natural so thought it would actually work. but i got whiteheads all over my face and neck and its been a week and wont go away. I'm still trying remedies to get rid of it. i searched up the ingredients and there should be a WARNING to this product that says it deeply clogs pores. and i noticed many people had the same issue with this and also the dewy night cream which i purchased as well. the dewy night is okay but it sticks onto the pillow which obviously causes more bacteria and pimples. please put warnings or cautions on the packaging or directions next time before this effects peoples faces which they maintain regularly. i have tried many face products and never had issues like this at all. terrible

reviews.review_title: it has Myristyl Myristate which will brings ACNE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I go between this cream and Tatchas Water cream, and usually apply this one to any dry patches I may have and it works like a dream!

reviews.review_title: wasnu2019t great for me, but could be for others.

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so bad because the water cream by Tatcha is the only moisturizer I can use without breaking out and skin irritation. I purchase this to use during the winter when I have super dry skin and while it feels nice, when I switched over even after a month+ I was still breaking out from this product which is the only thing that had changed in my skincare routine. If you donu2019t have sensitive sling and you are on the dry side? You may love this product! It does leave a slight u201cfilmu201d but nothing that is irritating, you just know youu2019re wearing a moisturizer unlike the water cream which really settles in. If youu2019re considering this product, I would go for it but just monitor your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worked amazing for my dry skin. I have used it for about two weeks and I can visibly see that it has done wonders for my skin texture along with bringing a healthy glow to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this moisturizer. It has a very thick consistency but my skin dries out easily so I actually prefer that from a moisturizer. Super hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off the packaging is amazing & heavy which Iufe0f like. The smell is decent I donu2019t care for it. BUT THE PRODUCT ON MY DRY CRACKING DEHYDRATED SAD SKIN was transforming okay! Let me tell you. Iufe0f was glowing for hours after Iufe0f put this magic purple cream on. Iufe0f love it and Iufe0f will continue to spend my entire paycheck on jugs of this magic cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much. It smells great and feels so luxurious and expensive, and the packaging is amazing. Doesnu2019t break out my skin, even when I pair it with my prescription acne cream. Definitely an overnight cream for me as itu2019s really thick, but overall love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream does come off as very greasy, although it does make your skin soft the next day if you wear it at night. The greasiness does not bother me given it does the job. It has a classic Tatcha scent, which is not my favorite to be honest. In my opinion, however, I don't think this cream is worth the price and you can find lots of creams that do the same thing much cheaper. I also am not a fan of jar packaging. All in all, I give this 3 stars as a very average moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: obsessed with this cream. Gives you the most healthy glow. Very thick consistency so i like to apply on no make up days or night time.  Only need a small dab in order to cover your whole face. Mainly targeted for for dry skin people but i have oily skin and this has done me wonders, it has almost controlled my oil. One of my favorite moisturizers that I always return back to. Worth the price for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sits on top of the skin. Does not soak in. Feels very greasy. Does not keep skin moisturized for long.

reviews.review_title: Not for combo/oily but works for dryer skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I am a 25 year old woman with combination skin. My face gets slightly oily in my T zone in the warmer months and then leans more towards dry in the cooler months.   TLDR: This cream did not work for my skin but my mother who has dull, dry skin loves it. She says it makes her skin feel nice and natural.   I received a travel size of this in a set, and it didn't really work for my skin. I currently also have the water cream, and my skin seems to like that much better. Compared to the water cream, this cream is much thicker and doesn't spread as well. The water cream spreads more like a light gel moisturizer, which I prefer, while this cream is heavy and doesn't quite absorb or spread easily. I put this on at night after cleansing with the purple gentle rice polish (which I do recommend the rice polishes btw) and it felt sticky on my skin. In the morning, my skin did feel moisturized but my face was shiny, as if it didn't really absorb. And to be honest, it feels really gross on my skin and makes me want to wash my face immediately. I will say this didn't break me out or irritate my skin though.   Before I realized I didn't like this cream, I had ordered a jar for my mom for mother's day. She is over 60 and describes her skin as dull, dry, and sensitive. Also, she is allergic to most fragrances and pretty much everything else on the planet. She loved this cream and said it was really moisturizing. Between this cream and the purple gentle rice polish, she says, a lot of that stuff (even good stuff) leaves my skin feeling unnatural  - sometimes tight and dry from cleansers and moisturizers tend to feel like they're definitely there. These products left my skin feeling nice and natural. So far, my mother has not experienced any irritation etc.   So with that, I will say this cream did not work for me but worked well for my mom. If you have dryer, sensitive skin, it's worth trying the travel size (I project the travel size will last 1+ months).

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing with a Glowy Finish, But Pills
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream definitely leaves you naturally radiant and glowing, as well as moisturized, but it does pill, which is annoying especially for the price. For that reason, I think it would be better used as a night cream than under makeup.

reviews.review_title: best cream i've used for my extra dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have very dry skin, and it is shocking how little product it takes to hydrate my skin for the day.  came in skeptical, using it forever impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never brought an expensive cream like this one so of course going in i was a bit worried that it wouldnu2019t be worth my money. I was so worried that i would regret it. I waited for a sale and ended up getting 20% off. After trying it for 2 months i can honesty say i donu2019t see myself ever living without this again.  This is an amazing cream and works so well for my dry skin. So many foundations would clean to my dry patches and this helps for that not to happen. I am obsessed. I can use this with one without make up which is even better. A little bit goes a really long way so it will last you a good amount of time. The only thing I kind of donu2019t like is the fact that it only has a 6 month shelf life. But i can get passed that because of how amazing it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely cream. It has a beautiful dewy richness. The smell is great too, very unique. It seems to work well and make my skin softer. I plan to order again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SUPER moisturizing, a little goes a long way! Especially for the price lol, I've had the same jar for like a year. This instantly hydrates your skin and is perfect for the moisturizing base under makeup or just for the day. Gives beautiful, intense hydration! I also think the scent is pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This works well on my dry skin. I'm 58 and this is the best. The price is a little steep so I didn't know if I'll buy it again. If not I will surely miss it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works great as both a nighttime cream and a daytime cream.  I have dry aging skin and this seemed to plump and smooth my skin out. It worked great with my sunscreen and makeup.  My face is usually dry be the end of the day, but not with this cream.   It didnu2019t break me out, either, which new lotions and creams will usually do to me in the beginning.  Sad itu2019s so expensive, but I feel itu2019s worth it.  Oh well.

reviews.review_title: Love the cream, but not clean and hate the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best I can describe it is fermented rice smell hidden with fragrance - which also means it isnu2019t a clean beauty product by having added fragrance. The cream itself feels great, gel cushion that absorbs quickly and gives you a slight glow. Great for natural skin days or with a setting powder laid on top. Personally, I wonu2019t be buying it again given the smell is a turnoff and I am looking for clean products, but otherwise itu2019s a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this moisturizer. It makes your skin look dewy and radiant. Iu2019m on my 5th jar and I will probably buy it for the rest of my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love!! So hydrating on my skin and a very quick noticeable difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Heard great things but wasnu2019t for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My skin is very clear with the occasionally white head that appears maybe ever other month however iu2019ve been using this for 3 weeks now and I have had 3 different break outs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love using this after my shower under my eyes and on my knuckles at night. smell is amazing! the mini is worth the try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the sample size as I have very dry skin and some moisturizers actually dry my skin out more. With how pricy this moisturizer is I figured it would be a decent face cream. Iu2019ve used this religiously for the past week, and Iu2019ve really tried to love this. I love how it feels after itu2019s first applied and makes my face feel very dewy and hydrated, although after a few hours I have patches of dry flaky skin which usually doesnu2019t happen to me. I even tried applying 3 times in one day, and by the end of the day my face is raw and dry. Will not be using this again, very disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Tatcha is American, not Japanese. Misleading!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does not work at all, besides give you a temporary sticky glow feeling. I did a little bit of digging with this brand and it seems that Tatcha is American brand inspired by Japanese, talk about misleading the clients!!!  Iu2019ve been a fan of Tatcha for 3-4 years and never really looked into it cause I always thought it was a Japanese brand since they promote it so much. Well there goes that. I do have dry and sensitive skin, it did not make me break out , but also it is NOT anti aging and it does not get rid of fine lines and wrinkles . It does what it says, dewy and glow skin. Which basically I donu2019t need glow if Iu2019m trying to get rid of wrinkles.  I will not be repurchasing this brand anymore. Thereu2019s plenty of other ones that work way better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I've looked everywhere for a moisturizer that's not greasy and yet still give me a dewy look. Love this because my skin is so soft and dewy and doesnt make me break out either.

It would blow u away with the immediate effect on ur skin. But u would feel so because this product is filled with silicone. It does not actually hydrate your skin. I have dry skin and it feels very thick and heavy in a very bad way. And a prices is not with the product. Try any other cream based moisturizer with less silicone and more effective moisturizing ingredients with the same price or even cheaper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this thick, moisturizing cream!  Never irritating, would use at night, can make oilier skin or combo skin a little shiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this as my nighttime moisturizer! I don't know if I would recommend it as a daytime moisturizer because it leaves your skin looking so dewy to the point where it may sometimes look a little bit greasy (especially if you have oily skin); but its feels so luxurious when applied at night! It has a very thick consistency, leaving my skin so smooth and glowy in the morning! It is a little pricey however I think it is very worth it because a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose this as a free sample at checkout forever ago. Finally got around to trying it during the quarantine and was super excited just to be disappointed. I will say, it feels super luxurious putting it on - great feel, wonderful consistency, delightful slight scent and boy is it creamy and just soaks into your skin beautifully. But the next morning I was broken out in pimples all over my forehead (when I have worked hard to have no acne for 2 weeks straight). I have sensitive combo skin, so maybe itu2019s just how it affects my skin type but moisturizers with fragrance tend to do this to me. I loved the feel so much that I kept trying the sample just to always break out across my forehead. I will sadly have to pass on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just stated using this product so perhaps I will come back and give them five stars or reduce the amount of stars. I do love the way this cream goes on. It is so smooth. I was using an Estee Lauder night cream and I would sometimes feel a definite tug while attempting to smooth it on. Not with the Tatcha Dewy cream. It glides on effortlessly and I have found that I don't even need to follow it with my Rosehip Seed Oil as a final step. My skin does look dewy at night and it feels smooth and soft in the morning. I can't wait to keep using it and see how it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much! tatcha is by far my favourite skincare brand so of course I had to try this. Even though itu2019s very expensive, itu2019s definitely worth it. The amount you should use depends on how dry your skin is. I have normal-dry skin so I only used a little bit because this is really hydrating so it can make your skin oily if you use too much. If you have super dry skin, you should use a little more. If you have oily skin, I wouldnu2019t recommend this at all, but I would recommend the tatcha water cream (same size and price).

reviews.review_title: Wish It was cheaper but holy grail.

The first time I used this I used waaay too much. All the other moisturizers I have used because they never felt like they did anything without overuse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I recommend as a night time moisturizer for everyone and a day time moisturizer for dry skin or in the winter months. In the summer months I use this in the evening and the water cream during the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
