reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected. I have very dry sensitive skin and this didnu2019t help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely does what it says! It is my favorite moisturizer hands down. Itu2019s super hydrating without being heavy and leaves a perfectly dewy look. This cream saves me a step because I usually use an oil on top of my moisturizer, but with this I donu2019t have to. All of Tatchau2018a moisturizers are fantastic, but this one is hands down the best Iu2019ve ever used. I tried it when it first launched and have repurchased several times. The BEST!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it but it kinda leaves a sticky oily texture... made my glasses fall off more than usual lol.. would recommend to people with dry skin for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely great for people with dry skin, but I don't like the texture after it sets on my skin. Feels a bit too sticky for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my most favorite lux creams. I have normal skin and Iu2019ve had several friends and family try this and they all have loved it; from dry to oil to acne prone it has worked for everyone. My mother said she has finally found her HG cream, sheu2019s in her 70u2019s. I can use this all year along and live in AZ. Iu2019ve tried several other moisturizers and canu2019t find any that compare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This got a lot of bad reviews saying it wouldnu2019t absorb or made skin too oily...if youu2019re using a fancy cream like this you should be using a toner and serum before to prep the skin to absorb and I see how it could make you feel oily if this was used heavy handed. Just a little - less than a dime size - does my whole face, neck, and du00e9colletu00e9...I do not put around nasal creases just bc thatu2019s the most oily part of the face and doesnu2019t need moisturizer usually. Fragrance isnu2019t my favorite bc Iu2019m not a flowery kind of girl but itu2019s also not overpowering and goes away immediately upon application. Itu2019s not cheap but if I only have to buy every 3-4 months itu2019s 18-23/mo for a years supply. I am in love with skin care and get a nice amount of compliments on my skin and more when I started using this. Iu2019m almost 38 and am frequently told I look 5 years younger.

reviews.review_title: Thick & Greasy! Doesnu2019t absorb into skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so thick. Doesnu2019t absorb into skin. I put it on and hours later it still feels greasy/ tacky. And now Iu2019m breaking out. I have dry to normal skin and this just sat on top of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells SO GOOD and it makes my skin feel really refreshing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tiny applicator, the scent, and how dewy I look post-application. Unfortunately though, this near-perfect cream is too heavy for my skin. Mom, however, is in love with it. Itu2019s hers now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont know who I am anymore. I feel so elegant with this luxurious moisturizer! The packaging is just to die for, heavy glass and expensive feeling. It is definitely a heavy, hydrating cream. I use it sparingly at night as my skin recently decided to switch from dry/normal to oily after getting off birth control. It smells fresh and a bit flowery/herbaly but it's lovely. I use Drunk Elephant Protini or the Tatcha water cream during the day as they're lighter and do better for the oiliness under makeup. The Dewy Skin cream is phenomenal for my dryer skin days or an overnight hydration rescue. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like this moisturizer. I donu2019t love it, though. And the only reason I donu2019t love it is because it doesnu2019t keep my skin actually moisturized. It makes it dewy and feel good, but I wake up and donu2019t feel as if my skin is hydrated. I love a dewy look and this gives that look. I really like it under makeup and on no makeup days when I want to have that great dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS! Not cheap but SO nice. Perfect for before I do my makeup, before bed. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST moisturizer I have ever tried. I have combination/acne prone skin and this is the clearest Iu2019ve seen my skin. Iu2019m actually surprised this didnu2019t break me out. It is a spendy product but you only need a tiny amount for the face and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like products that claim what they are and after testing this cream leaves skin dewy.  I like to use it with tatcha oil.  My skin was dewy all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is okay, but if you have normal or combination skin I wouldnu2019t recommend. Itu2019s super greasy and clogs my pores a bit. I live all the other products from the dewy collection but this one just doesnu2019t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. My sensitive skin with rosacea drinks this up. Will happily continue to purchase!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this product was recommended by a dermatologist blogger I follow. I was hoping to love it but I found that it didn't absorb into my skin and just kind of stuck to the surface.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer Water Cream by Tatcha. This moisturizer felt nice while putting it on but it was too sticky for my taste. I have dry and sensitive skin. I tried using it for 3 days and I just prefer the less sticky Water Cream.
I love this product so much. My skin is smoother and there is absolutely no texture

reviews.review_title: very nice, but not ideal for oily/acne prone skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product is not ideal for oily skin, or people who suffer from breakouts. the product smells very nice, feels rich and thick on the skin, but can make oily skin look very greasy and gave me small break outs.   i would recommend this product for those with dry skin, or for people living in very cold climates that requires intense hydration. this would not be a great summer cream in my opinion due to the face that it is SO heavy on the face.   the packaging and scent are beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay....broke me out.  Not worth the price for sure, I prefer Tatcha water cream more than this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted this to work because of the reviews but it sucks. Made me break out and caused little red bumps under my eyes. Has a TON of fragrance and is pretty thick. Only nice thing is the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely AMAZING cream. And the most stunning expensive looking packaging. I have been using this for less than two weeks and I can say all my dry spots, bumps, and other issues. I will not live without this. If I could give it more stars I would

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my Holy Grail. I started using this stuff after I majorly over exfoliated off my skin's barrier and had rough, bumpy bumpy skin that wouldn't return to normal. I tried everything and no face mask, serum, or moisturizer I tied was working. I bought this on a whim after having sandpaper skin for a week and I was shocked. My skin texture returned to normal in two days. I have a friend who sells high end makeup and skincare at Dillard and even she was shocked.  I literally make all my friends try this stuff. Feels amazing, spreads amazingly, smells amazing, little goes a long way, and most importantly, my skin actually feels hydrated properly.. for the whole day.   If you're reading reviews because you're hesitant, I'm writing this for you because I obsessively read reviews too. Buy it. I tried other mostuizers after this one because it's expensive and only lasts me two months.. but I keep coming back. Love of my life maybe? I think everyone with dry skin should at least try this stuff once.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using only Tatcha products religiously for a little over a month now and I can't recommend this brand as a whole enough. The changes I'm seeing on my skin are just short of miraculous. I've got very dry-sensitive skin and Tatcha (I feel) is made for people like me that really want to see anti-aging results that are gentle, without damaging or irritating your skin. I've been using just the water cream for about a year & love it but I recently switched it up because I felt I needed a little bit more for night time & this was my choice and it's amazing. I do feel it's a bit too thick for daytime (under makeup specifically) so I keep using the water cream in the morning and together they've been the perfect duo. I love how this one soaks into the skin & just keeps the moisture there all night, it's never oily.. just plump & hydrated. I love how my skin feels in the morning and it really does give you a dewy, beautiful glow. It's pricey, sure but a little goes along way & it's worth it. 5+++ stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry-normal skin, this may be too heavy to use as a day cream. Works well as a night cream though.  The cream has a light purple tint and a mild scent that disappear when you apply it to your face. The texture is quite thick, so I recommend taking a pea size amount and rubbing it between your palms to warm up the product before applying to your face. It does make your face look dewy upon application but I havenu2019t noticed any improvement in my skin with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. It makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated. It smells amazing after use. I also love the little applicator that helps me put the right amount onto my skin (and not go overboard!).

reviews.review_title: Lives up to the hype- Great daytime moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this moisturizer. I have dry skin, and this helps keep it hydrated under my makeup all day! It never pills, which is an issue I've had with another light/daytime moisturizers. Plus it's clean, which I really like since I wear it all day, every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my absolute favorite moisturizer iu2019ve ever used! makes my dry skin feel soft and dewy, not oily. i apply morning and night. a little goes a long way. tatcha makes the most amazing products and you definitely get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WORTH THE MONEY!!! I have used so many different brands for moisturizers (lots of natural brands or clean at Sephora) and so far this is the best!! In comparison I have used tones of Indie Lee products for years before Sephora bright them in and didn't like any of their moisturizers. This is light weight yet nourishing and you feel the difference right away. I love this so much but I'm interested in trying there other ones too!!  Hands down will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer ever. This is a big statement for a skincare junkie. I LOVE this. I have combo type skin and thought the water cream would be more fitting for me, but I was underwhelmed by that. A friend of mine had the dewy cream and when we were on vacation together, I used hers everyday. I was obsessed. I bought it immediately and haven't stopped since. This moisturizer feels like luxury on your skin. It is so rich but does not feel too heavy. Even with my oily t zone, I have no issues with this. I use it at night and days when I am home all day (ie not outside in the sun bc i have spf for that) During this quarentine season, I have been using this day and night, and its such a treat. I will cleanse, use my AHA toner, then a serum, then top off with my dewy skin. If I had to pick one moisturizer only for the rest of time, this would be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved all the Tatcha products I have tried and I have tried a lot. I bought this moisturizer for myself to keep my skin hydrated in the winter. I used it regularly for 4 weeks, it smelt amazing and really did a good job at hydrating my skin. I then started to get severe cystic acne on my skin, it was the most painful acne I have ever had. At 29 years old I was beyond embarrassed of my skin since I had worked so hard to maintain clear skin! I immediately stopped using it and my skin started to clear up, however, Tatcha's customer service was literally amazing!! Which is why I am giving the product 3 stars. I was able to return the product and exchange it for the water crem which was 100% better for my skin type. I still love Tatcha, this product was just not made for acne prone skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the water cream & wanted something similar to use as more of a hydrating night cream and I LOVE this! Tatcha has quickly become one of my favorite high end skin care brands!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product did help with my dry skin, but it also felt like wearing sunscreen. I love the fact that it did make my face feel like mochi skin, but there wasn't any other significant improvements to note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this moisturizer.  I  have dry dull skin and this leaves my skin silky smooth and a beautiful dewy finish. This is luxury for sure. I also love the little applicator on top. I would definitely recommend as this is my go to moisturizer

reviews.review_title: The best skincare product Iu2019ve ever purchased
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail product. The best skincare product Iu2019ve ever purchased. It actually does give you dewy skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down one of the best moisturizers I have ever used! I have severely dry skin and this is one of the only moisturizers thatu2019s seems to not only hydrate my skin, but it also lasts throughout the day. Which seems to be a common problem for me with most moisturizers. I love that itu2019s a clean product as well because it doesnu2019t irritate my already problematic skin. Love love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how moisturizing this is and how it gives a slight glow. I can wear it under makeup and it doesnu2019t give a casket look under my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this initially with an in store purchase at Sephora. It was summer time and my skin was extra dry. I bought a full size jar and loved it for hydration but wanted something more for anti-aging and hydration.  Definitely a good product during summer sun months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and this sorta saved my face. Itu2019s very very very moisturizing so very little goes along way! When I first got it I was using a little too much, wouldnu2019t let it soak in so it would kinda clump and I was starting to get disappointed. However once you let it soak in, I add SPF and I use the tatcha primer + foundation and my skin looks flawless.  Please understand that everyoneu2019s skin is different and it can take from a couple seconds to minutes for products to truly soak in. Iu2019m on my second jar, probably wonu2019t ever stop using this.

reviews.review_title: Pills on face. I do not recommend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks beautifully luminous at first. An hour or two Later pieces of this cream start appearing on my skin clumped together. This has never happened to me with any of my moisturizes. Itu2019s embarassing.... Unfortunately cannot Continue to use. I have the tatcha water cream that is less luminous than this but doesnu2019t pill like this at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend you buy the small one first to try it out. Iu2019m glad I did. My face has been really dry and peeling! So you know I need a good moisturizer. I tried this, and unfortunately it made my skin so oily! Although my skin is so dry, it couldnu2019t absorb how oily this cream is. It made me break out which is pretty rare for me. The texture is nice, the smell is pleasant, but for someone with combination skin I would definitely try the smaller version before committing to the large one first. Additionally, if I rubbed it in too much, it starts to u201cpillu201d and clump. I havenu2019t used it under make up yet because of quarantine, but given the pilling I donu2019t think it would work well.

reviews.review_title: Great Pre-Makeup Moisturizer For An All Over Glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using The Dewy Skin Cream as a moisturizer prior to putting on makeup. I apply a small amount (a little goes a long way) and then give 5-10 minutes to soak into my skin. Then I apply my primer followed by my foundation and I find it helps give any foundation a more dewy appearance and the face an overall glow. I bought the mini to try it out and it lasted me a little over two months using it 3-4 times a week. I just purchased another mini during the Spring Sale but will probably order the full size next time since itu2019s a better $ per ml cost. Itu2019s costly but worth it in my opinion and Iu2019d recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have horribly dry face problems. so somehow I found Tasha and I use the whole line from cleanser to rice exfoliator to creams. and let me tell you what this one in particular has really helped me go from lizard skin face to I have a good skin. I could not be happier with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Itu2019s a bit pricey but good skin care is something you canu2019t put a price on. Love how it glides on when applied and the dewy healthy look it gives (Iu2019m all about dewy skin)!  Tatcha is one of my fave beauty lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really really dry, sensitive skin that is prone to flaking and becoming red/irritated. This product is pretty good. It definitely moisturizes well and I can tell I have a glow after putting it on. The only issues I have are that it makes my skin tacky for the rest of the day, and there isn't a lot of slip to it so I have to rub harder than preferred to spread it on my face. I find having to rub it in more because it's a bit viscous causes it to snag on dry patches making skin flake. Totally recommend though if flaking/skin pilling isn't an issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I am in my early 20s and a constantly problem for me is having that smooth, hydrated skin I've always longed for. I also have very sensitive skin so it's hard to find products that don't irritate me. When I first established a skin routine for myself I was having trouble finding a moisturizer that would accomplish those desires I longed for. This product was a game changer! Its so silky smooth and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and clean. I've even tried other creams after using this one and I always come back to it! Highly recommend this product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff SAVED my dry skin!! I tried so many products and they all still left me with patches and flakiness.. I donu2019t get any of that with this moisturizer. Even the stubborn dry skin around my eyes is gone. It is pricey but a little goes a LONG way. I usually just put a little dot on each cheek, my forehead, nose, and neck and it spreads so nicely, I donu2019t need any more than that. Stocking up during the sale because I know I will be using this as my every day moisturizer for a long long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helps with dry skin sooooo much, its absolutely amazing, and doesn't leave skin too oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my ride or die moisturizer! Everyone whou2019s saying itu2019s too u201coilyu201d or u201cgreasyu201d is using too much! A little goes a LONG way! I only have a sample size and Iu2019m not even halfway through after using it morning and night for 2 weeks straight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like it doesn't really moisturize also is thick feeling. I am struggling with dryness and red skin and this does not help. I think the bomb moisturizer helps better with redness and actually moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't understand the hype! I wanted to like this product but it felt heavy and greasy on my skin even hours after I applied it. It has blocked all my pores on my nose and chin. I do not recommend for people with acne prone skin at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite moisturizers that I have ever used! It has the perfect texture for my skin. This product is somehow both rich and lightweight at the same time. It sinks in quickly after application without leaving a heavy, greasy residue but makes me feel hydrated and moisturized through the morning. I use this as a night cream and my skin drinks it up! This helps me wake up with hydrated, even skin and does not irritate my skin whatsoever. It also does not break me out, which is great since I have sensitive, acne prone skin. Completely worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My day cream and I love it! Best cream I've ever used and I've tried a few!!

reviews.review_title: Did not work for my dry, sensitive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this did not work for my dry skin.  It felt like a heavy night cream that I have used in the past and caused cystic acne on my cheeks, which I only get from certain products and do not have regularly. For reference, moisturesurge had a very similar effect on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful glow feels amazing makes makeup gorgeous love this product definitely worth it

reviews.review_title: one of my many guilty pleasures
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love almost everything about this: the ingredients, the color, the way my skin looks after using it, how hydrating it is. The only thing I don't like is the smell; it's not bad, it just kind of smells like my grandma's house.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally purchased this product back in December and just finished using it all up and I already had a back up waiting for me and just bought another one during the sale. This is the only moisturizer that actually moisturizes without being too thick. Gives my skin a beautiful glow after putting it on. I always put it on at night but I like to put it on at least an house before bed so it has enough time to really sink into my skin. Since it is a dewy skin cream, it tends to stick to my pillow at night if I donu2019t give it time to sink in. I will continue to repurchase this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had very dry skin my whole life, and have tried so many different types of face lotions And none have kept my face hydrated like tatcha does. Itu2019s amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bought the mini during quarantine because I can't sample it in store. the hydration and nourishment felt pretty average, however you HAVE to use it as a night cream because the shine it leaves is RIDONKULOUS. my cheek looked like a whole mirror. Like I know it says dewy skin cream, but I thought it meant my skin was gonna have that dewy glow of moisture, not vegetable oil on my countertop. You could probably fix it with a bit of translucent powder, but the price point for me isn't worth it. Great product if you're into the glass skin look, just def not for me and my baby seal bod <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I get it ... I guess. The dewy skin cream title really brought me in, so I bought the smallest size ($20) to try it out. I have dry, dehydrated skin and I don't think this is any better than other moisturizers I have. If this is the only thing you use after washing + toning your face, I could maybe understand buying this. But I use a hydrating toner (laneige), water bank essence and maybe, POSSIBLY a hydrator like the clinique one &  I've found this to be unnecessary and unhelpful. I'm speaking to my fellow brokies so if you have the money try it! Or just buy the ordinary's moisturizer for like $6, cerave or literally anything else cheap because there won't be much difference. It's a pretty color though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never had a moisturizer leave me so in love with my skin! It is magic for that dewy look and does wonders for my dry skin. Iu2019m complemented all the time on my glow. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my #1 moisturizer! I have sensitive skin , and itu2019s so hard to find something that really actually works . (Literally) for the price at first it seems kinda crazy but honestly it lasts you forever . You donu2019t need a lot of product , a little goes a long way and this is a product you donu2019t want to use a lot of at a time ! One jar can last anywhere from 4-7 months depending on how often you use it. I use this before applying makeup during the day and itu2019s amazing. Iu2019ve used it at night too and it works wonders ! 100% recommend. Totally worth it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream is FANTASTIC! A little goes a long way for my combination skin. On a normal day I use less than 2 ice cream sprinkles worth of product to achieve a glassy glowing complexion. The spatula provided is not only hygienic, but an amazing tool for dabbing the moisturizer exactly where I want it. A single 1.7oz jar can last me 4-6 months.   I no longer wear foundation, so I canu2019t speak for how it works under face makeup, but I do use Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen primer and the products work together beautifully (no pilling) for a blurred, dewy, glowing look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff so much! My skin is naturally dry so this has made a big difference. The one thing Iu2019ll mention (positive) is that a little goes a long ways. Itu2019s also nice to use before I put the rest of my make up on.

reviews.review_title: Comes with a side of blinding shine ...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry but acne-prone skin. Finding the perfect moisturizer is a life goal, along with finding the perfect nude lipstick and handbag. I donu2019t think this is it. Itu2019s a lovely, silky cream with a light herby lavender scent. The scoop is a lovely touch(though Iu2019m too lazy to use it) and it all looks very pretty on my vanity. The good news: it hasnu2019t broken me out after a couple weeks of nightly use. The bad news: itu2019s feels greasy and doesnu2019t seem to absorb well into my skin. My face looks like an oil well after use. I would never use this during the day. It doesnu2019t do anything worth the hefty price: skin is moisturized, I guess, but there are no other significant benefits that justify the cost. I will continue to use it, and if things change, Iu2019ll amend my review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST MOISTURIZER! I have extremely dry skin and this makes my face so glowy and smooth. It is pricey but it lasts a long time cause you only need a little! Itu2019s worth it

reviews.review_title: TACHA The Dewy Skin Cream is worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this feels on my skin, its smell and I feel like you can see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You know I dont know what it is about this product but my face has been glowing since I started using her products. its only been 2 days since I started using this specific cream, I have the water cream sample that I used my rewards for to try it out and have used that for 2 weeks and I think from using the water cream or this afterwards my skin has become super dewy, it even glows without the cream. I always wash my face after work and cleanse it well. I dont even apply anything on my face after cleansing and honestly this has made my skin very very dewy, I love it. I do have very dry skin as well as sensitive.

reviews.review_title: This Tatcha Cream Isnu2019t For Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the water cream and the deep cleanse from Tatcha! Got a sample of this and my face started to break out like crazy in areas that I never get pimples/whiteheads. I also applied this before bed and would wake up the next day super greasy in my T-zone like the product didnu2019t soak in at all. I would only recommend this for dry skin or areas of the body. Itu2019s a toss up if it will work for your combo skin. My face did not seem to like it but there are some good reviews for it, try a sample if you can before committing to buying a larger pot of this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. I ordered a tatcha skincare set that came with this along with others and I instantly fell in love. I have extremely dry skin that looks horrible under makeup and this cream OMG. It is pricey but it is also one of the only moisturizers that I actually feel works throughout the entire day. Highly highly recommend for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Made me a Tatcha products believer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream! I noticed how many good reviews it had but the price made me a bit hesitant to try it. I got a small container and am really loving it. It really does your skin dewy and it lasts- which is something I notice other creams lack when applied to my dry skin. I starting using a bit of one of my facial oils with it as the thick consistency stops it from gliding easily and it makes it all the more glowy. It sits nicely under makeup.

reviews.review_title: switched over from the water cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an honest review. So long story short, I tried the water cream when it was all the rage, it worked ok at first, but the smell started to get to me (I was fine before but I started hating the scent for some reason) and I started breaking out when I was halfway through the jar. Iu2019ve used a fair amount of Tatcha products, love the rice polish and the cleansers. So few years later I decided to try Tatcha again and I bought a mini size of this cream. I used it in conjunction with a sample size of tatchas vitamin c serum.. my face was instantly transformed, I was starting to develop premature signs of aging and lines, Iu2019m close to 30 by the way. The lines were smoother out, my face felt much better and hydrated and sunspots were actually brightening up. Iu2019ll rave about the vitamin c serum in another review. Also forgot to mention Iu2019m also using this in conjunction with the Tatcha essence /SKII essence depending on which one I reach for. But no reactions to this cream, my skin loves it compared to the water cream. And I feel a lot more hydrated and happy with this one as well. Recently repurchased a full size since I can see myself using this longer term than I initially thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an every day must have. Wear it under makeup, morning, at night with my serum and eye cream. Canu2019t live without it. Works for cold dry winter months and hotter summer months on my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. I do not feel like this moisturizer has helped my skin in the slightest. Extremely disappointed with this moisturizer. For the price I paid I was expecting a miracle product. When applying the product it feels as though it does not absorb in my skin. It sits on top and has caused my face to be oily throughout the day and develop whiteheads. It leaves grease marks on my phone. Disgusting. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin, give this a try! Iu2019ve always wanted to have that dewy luminous kind of skin you get from doing biweekly facials and this moisturizer made my skin look that way every morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin, I get dry patches on my face. This cream feels like you are just rubbing grease on your face. Not hydrating at all. Would not recommend even for someone who just has dry skin. So many cheaper, better alternatives out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, nobody NEEDS tatcha skincare. There are tons of drug store brands that are much more affordable and work just as well. I bought the small size of this product to give it a try because tatcha is basically the gucci of skin care, weu2019ve all seen Jeffree Star use it. I have to say that this product is absolutely amazing for spoiling yourself. Something that turns me off of tatcha products is the heavy amount of fragrance, however I think itu2019s alright to splurge on this because it really is a relaxing and luxurious experience. The product feels amazing in the skin itu2019s thick and rich it smells like citrus. Overall I have to give it a good rating, not for the price, not for the effectiveness, but for the fun experience I had with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed a difference the next morning after one use. Made my skin softer, more dewy looking, and also cleared up some of my acne. What I love most about this is that it helps clear my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream really lives up to its name u2026my skin looked so dewy and radiant. Also it really moistures without being heavy or greasy.  I just ordered my second tub of it and I highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream. I have dry skin and it truly hydrates but is not oily and doesn't make me break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had been searching for a new moisturizer, when I received a sample of this. Right away my dry skin soaked it up and thanked me. Paired with the face wash my skin has never looked better. Just bought my second full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After trying tons of different moisturizer products over the years at various price points, this (and Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream) are my go-tos. My only wish would be to be able to use it as a primer as well (it's not thick enough, I don't think). I prefer the Dewy Skin Cream on days when I'm on the run or wearing more natural makeup, though it does great under full foundation etc. too with primer.   This product is lightweight with a beautiful color, and most importantly it leaves my skin feeling super hydrated without being oily or heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got the sample size in mid-March, have been using it since a few times a week before bed. The first time I tried it, I was shocked: my normally dry skin had become soft and plump overnight. Over the past month, I've been getting consistent results; however, when I apply my skin sometimes seems bumper, especially around my nose. It appears to clog my pores, and sometimes my face gets a bit heated and pink. When I wake up, though, my skin looks bright and healthy and my skin texture is more even. Not sure what is causing the reaction as it is brief and only happens upon initial application. Overall, would recommend, but maybe not to someone with sensitive or acne-prone skin as the consistency is a bit thick compared to moisturizers I've enjoyed in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Tatcha line and most of my skin care is Tatcha, but this cream is not good for combination or oily skin, is too heavy and oily. I used it twice and my face broke out. I will stick to the water cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry /sensitive skin and this leaves my skin Dewey. I do use it on top of other products (not tatcha) . I am prone to break outs when I try something new  but this did not happen with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews.. but this product oh my god. It is the best moisturizer my skin has ever touched and every time I try a new product my skin is not happy unless I use tatcha again. It's so pricey and lasts about 4 months (or longer depending on how much you want to use) so I wish I could find a dupe but so far this is my holy grail. It leaves my skin supple and glowing, the kind of glow that comes from within. I wore it in the day and at night and never had any problems with being too oily. It is great under make-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this one is not nasally assaulting me like the Water cream is.  I find this one for me works well day and night, a light layer under makeup and it still works well, I find it doesn't make my Kevyn Aucoin concealer and Laura foundation powder cakey on all together.  The packaging is super lovely, reminds me of when you purchase something at a Japanese department store and they do wrap it up all nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the water cream but for the winter I noticed my skin was dry so I purchased the dewy skin cream and it seemed good,and very moisturizing,but after about a month I noticed small breakouts around my chin and jaw I never thought it would be this,but as soon as i stopped using it my skin slowly started to clear. I'm so sad. I gave it 3 stars because it is very hydrating and clears up dry patches,a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: It works! Bye bye dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The 10ml is the size of a tiny cupcake and wonu2019t last you that long if youu2019re applying morning and night! I do recommend purchasing the small one and trying it out, thatu2019s what I did, and then investing in the bigger expensive one! My face is extremely dry, Iu2019ve been told by family u201cwhy donu2019t you put cream onu201d, meanwhile Iu2019m wearing cream, it just never works for me! Iu2019ve tried everything, taken advice from a dermatologist, still nothing, then I came across this product. Iu2019ve been using it morning and night and for the first time I have noticed a difference. My skin is glowing and smooth, the product smells nice and it excites me to use it! I definitely recommend this product, it really works, trust me! Bye bye sand paper cheeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a where have you been all my life type of product! I use the rose toner from fresh and these to produce work wonders for me and my dry skin. Iu2019m left with a beautiful glow and baby soft skin. I used to struggle a lot with dry patches ... not anymore! I can also notice my face looks much more firm. And to boot it smells so amazing and feels so luxurious to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cream for a month now and think itu2019s with every penny. Iu2019m 37 and donu2019t wear make up so I need all the natural glow I can get. This is a must for all skin types

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It smells so great and my face feels so clean and looks bright. I bought it with the set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this with I was really excited to try this product, and wanted it to work so badly, The packaging is beautiful, I love the smell, and it goes on like butter. HOWEVER, it HELLA breaks me out every time I use it. I have dry/combination/sensitive skin. I feel like it doesnu2019t actually soak into your skinu2013 it just sits on the surface and clogs your pores. It remains oily throughout the day, and exacerbates your acne while also creating more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: super hydrating, and leaves my skin dewy and soft to the touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product over a year ago and have used it on and off. On and off because i couldnu2019t figure out when I wanted to use it. Itu2019s way too thick to use as a day cream and it was  very hydrating looking. It was greasy, which I donu2019t usually mind but itu2019s A LOT and it peeled like crazy so no use using it under makeup. I tried it at night with my regular products. Same thing. Greasy and peeled a ton but in the morning my face would feel smooth and look more even. My pillow didnu2019t love the excess product. Iu2019ve tried it without any extra products...same ol peeling. I finally just decided to rub the excess product and peeling off and I got the best results with dewy non-greasy plump skin. It took me about a year to come to that convulsions. It seems a little pointless to put the product on just to rub some of it off to get the results you want. Probably will find another product to give me the dewy, youthful look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer EVER!!! I will never go back to any other moisturizer again. A little goes a long way and will last you a good amount of time. The price is steep but you get what you pay for! It smells great too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a trial size from Sephora, and it would not stop pilling! It sat on my skin caked on and would not absorb. A big NO for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is amazing! The cream is very moisturizing. I have a very dry and sensitive skin and this is the only cream that works. Iu2019m on my 3rd now, and Iu2019m getting another one this spring sale!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream seems to moisturize okay, but leaves my skin feeling and looking very greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. I had an reactio n to an enzyme peel which caused my face to be dry. I had to switch my whole skincare routine. I kept trying to find a moisturizer that was thick enough to moisturize my face. Everything was still leaving my face dry until I came across this product. Itu2019s expensive but itu2019s definitely worth the money if youu2019re suffering from dry or sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There's not much else to say other than you're going to love it if you love a plump, dewy look and want hydrated feeling skin. This is exceptional at creating an I just worked out or just had a perfect facial glow should you want to rock a no MU look. For a year I've been rotating this moisturizer with Kate Somerville's ExfoliKate Glow Moisturizer depending on what my skin feels like and if I had to choose between the two...so tough, but I ran out of this and am missing it (hence re-order jar #3). ExfoliKate's Glow absorbs quicker and is a little lighter. This is a little heavier/denser of a moisturizer BUT I LOVE IT. A little goes a long, long way hence you can be generous with it and let your neck drink it up, too. Still good to wear under MU, just give yourself a few minutes if you can pre MU application. If you have to rush and can't wait the few minutes (brush your teeth), not a big deal. My IT Cosmetics CC cream layers and wears really well on top of this. Also to note, I just got Tatcha's Water Cream using my rouge points not long ago and it's no comparison to this. Too light for my oily yet dry/thirsty skin. The Dewy Skin Cream hasn't clogged my pores (coming from someone who used to have cystic acne at one point) and it's just pure heaven. Packaging is beautiful. Smell is lovely, too. Enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER! Ever since I used accutane 6 years ago I struggled with SUPER dry & sensitive skin so finding the face cream for me was extremely difficult without something burning or over drying. This makes my skin feel so good, it moisturizes without any other bad effect! I use it morning and night & I love it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really really really love this skin cream. My skin looks hydrated and u201cdewyu201d after use. I put this on morning and night and have yet to have any kind of breakouts or irritation. A little goes a long way which is great considering the price of these products for what seems like mini sizes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've only had this for a week now, but I like it so much. I have normal to dry skin, and it evens that all out, and brings some radiance to it. Works great to set my face for makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my all time favorite! I have more of a dry skin type so this face cream works so well it hydrates my face & leaves it glowing. Definitely lives up to the hype & gives a dewy look everytime. Plus it always leaves my face feeling refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I SWEAR by this product. I live in Canada and it gets super dry especially in the winter and NO other moisturizer (even the one recommended by my dermatologist which i love) compares to the moisture and luxury feel this face moisturizer gave my skin. And I always recommend this product to my friends and the ones who bought it are now a fan as well. Especially for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's hydrating, but not for good for sensitive skin. My skin was always pretty red after using this and it seemed to hydrate but my skin was always irritated afterwards. Would not repurchase, but depends on your skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. Doesnu2019t break me out nor does it just sit on top of my skin.

reviews.review_title: if you need hydration this is it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely am obsessed with the dewy skin cream! I love in a cold state and this has been so hydrating, makes my skin so smooth, I have never been happier, my red spots and acne have slowly been going away and clearing up and itu2019s all because of my regimen with TATCHA my skin has appeared brighter and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So lovely my skin is like silk. I tried a small one first then I just got my full size in. I Love the packaging it felt like a real present when I opened it. The little gold spoon takes the cake I am in love!!!!!  Would recommend if you need a treat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good at holding moisture!!! I love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone skin, this product contains a product, myristyl myristate, that has an extremely high comedogenic score (5 out of 5). It caused me to break out so I no longer use it. Ever since I stopped my acne has greatly improved. It really is too bad because otherwise it is such a great product with a lot of benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a thick cream. I have been using this a night cream for the past month, and it has done wonders to my dehydrated skin. The smell is soft and calming.

reviews.review_title: Super moisturizing but pills when dry.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing cream that calmed my super dry, sensitive and tight-feeling skin. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a seriously moisturizing, calming cream. Leaves my skin smooth, toned and supple looking - not greasy and does not break me out either. Calmed my slight rosacea on the cheeks as well. Cons: once it dries and I want to put make up on it just touch my face, it pills slightly. And since I need a decent amount of this cream to fully quench my very dry skin, it does pill a decent amount once I try to apply any makeup or even touch my face. For this reason u use this only at night and will continue to as this product is rare in the way it actually moisturizes my skin. Do not recommend for anyone with oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOOOOOVE... This cream!!! Iu2019m all about rich creams that leave my skin feeling drenched in moisture. Iu2019ve been using this for a while & always get compliments on how my skin has a glow to it like Iu2019ve just gotten a facial. Literally a must have for me in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product because I like a dewy look, however within a few days my skin broke out like it never has before. Stopped using it and my skin has cleared up, so I won't be using this product anymore. So sad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This really does leave your skin super soft and dewy. I have mostly dry skin except for my nose, and this doesnt leave it super oily like other creams do, while keeping the rest of my face hydrated. I bought this as the other one is a bit expensive. So I would go for this if it's your first time using it does last you a good full month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS AWESOME AND LEAVES MY SKIN SO SMOOTH AND SILKY

reviews.review_title: Best face cream for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried about 15 different fave cream. From kiehls to neutrogena and so far tatcha dewy skin is the only one that works for me. I have extremely dry skin with patches everywhere and Ratchasima has made a world of a difference. Itu2019s definitely on the pricey side but since I donu2019t spend a lot of make up or even skin scare, itu2019s so worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is my saviour. I went through a phase of terrible acne that would no go away. My skin was very dry at some points and then so oily. This cream got rid of my oily skin but also made it super hydrated. It feels like heaven being rubbed into your skin it is my favourite product. However because of how often I use it and the size I go through it a lot making it very expensive to keep up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it for my mom, she is in love with it. She uses it at night.

reviews.review_title: would be great for dry skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im an avid fan of the water cream for day, but at night i want something richer, and this cream is my favorite! It is packaged beautifully,the smell to me, is like lavender and to die-for! It moisturises my combo-oily skin well overnight. However, one must be careful not to overdo the amount used as it gets greasy real fast. I havenu2019t noticed any anti-aging effects...but i believe nothing short of surgery really does that!! Definite rebuy..even though the water cream remains my favorite..!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product does exactly what it claims to do.  It will give you a very dewy look and is a great day-time or night-time moisturizer.  I have very dry skin and have been using this as my go-to morning moisturizer.  It gives you a dewy look but does not make you feel oily or sticky.  The packaging feels heavier and luxurious.  I also love the gold spoon they include too, so you don't have to dip your fingers in every time.   I'm going to try a different product this summer for my day time moisturizer because I think this left me a little too dewy especially if I was going to make up over it.  I'll continue buying through because I love the gleam it gives on my cheek/cheek bones after being at the beach/pool all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't leave reviews, but this by far, has been the BEST moisturizing cream I have ever used! I've been dealing with extremely dry skin for a while now since post-pregnancy. And this cream keeps my skin feeling hydrated and moisturized. I love the dewy look it leaves on my skin. So definitely a plus! I just finished my third jar, and will absolutely with no hesitations be buying my fourth one.   I highly recommend this product, especially to those dealing with dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is my holy grail. I put it on and I swear all my problems go away. I normally use this before bed and my skin in the morning always looks so fresh and plump and itu2019s 100% because of this product. The product is creamy and absorbs very nicely into your skin. If Iu2019m doing my makeup I only apply a tiny amount because a little goes a long way with this. Itu2019s pricey but worth it because itu2019s a quality moisturizer. It makes me want to try out all of tatchau2019s products in hopes theyu2019re all like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer! I use it both day and night - at night after my RX retinoid and in the morning after the tatcha rice face plumper. I have typical combination skin...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is the best moisturizing cream Iu2019ve found. I ordered the sample size once and I fell in love with it that I had to purchase this one. It really moistures your skin without leaving the face oily. I havenu2019t seen improved in pores but I just love how hydrate my skin feels throughout the day

reviews.review_title: Beautiful! Not just for normal/dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/oily skin and while lighter moisturizing creams/gels are typically recommended to me, I always find them lacklustre and unsatisfying. Still, some rich creams prove to be too heavy and greasy for daytime use. This is not one of those! I thought it might be following the description of rich cream for normal to dry skin, but it's perfect for me! It's very hydrating and has a silky smooth texture that acts as a lovely primer for makeup. A little goes a long way!  Side note: I don't like a matte face, nor a greasy one - just a healthy glow/radiance. If you're super oily or want to mattify, this is probably not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product, makes my skin feel so smooth and super hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

However, this lotion makes foundation look amazing when applying as a base! I also mix this lotion in with my foundation sometimes to make my makeup look lighter and more skin-like. Favorite ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this product left me looking very greasy! I applied after cleansing and toning, and it looked as though I applied oil to my face. I havenu2019t really noticed an increase in hydration either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cream is a miracle worker. Let's just say from the first use I was addicted. The fluffy lightweight texture is silky smooth on skin, non-greasy and keeps your skin hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: thick, rich, velvety texture. extremely hydrating and repairing. Way better than the Water Cream. The moisture lasts all day and looks great under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh! This cream really surprised me! I have combination/oily skin-with really dry areas. I thought this cream wouldnu2019t work for me-I already used the whole little jar!!  This stuff is amazing! I apply it RIGHT after cleansing and toning-it smells lovely-lightly scented, easily absorbed, non-greasy, and Iu2019ve never had any problems with oiliness or breakouts! Will be repurchasing! My new go-to favorite cream!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and I noticed the redness was less when using this regularly. Super moisturizing. I have combination skin but didnu2019t feel oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite daytime moisturizer!  It feels a little heavy for daytime but it sits so nicely under makeup and SPF.  I have already been through 2 jars.

reviews.review_title: Redness, itching and lots of moisture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin.  I was very surprised to see that when I used this product my face became very itchy and red. I wasn't expecting this reaction from such a pure and quite expensive product.  This product does offer A LOT of moisture, which is great for my dry skin, however the redness and itchiness is not ideal.  It does have a fragrance. Unfortunately, I would recommend this product for people with combination skin and those with no sensitivities.  I am interested in buy more Tatcha products, but am afraid I might have another adverse reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Probably my favorite moisturizer. I have normal to dry skin and this keeps me mosturized but not oily. My skin absorbed it well but not too quickly. I like the smell too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My current favorite moisturizer. Keeps my skin hydrated and gives it a natural glow. Also, this works great to use as a moisturizer before applying make-up. Will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and wanted to love it, but this made my skin feel like an oil slick. I donu2019t even have oily skin, but within a few hours it had felt like I coated my skin in oil. It felt great on any dry patches I had, but I wouldnu2019t recommend for anyone but people with extremely dry skin in a cold climate. Also, itu2019s very scented, and while it smells fresh and spa like, if you donu2019t like scent I wouldnu2019t suggest trying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product SO MUCH! Purple is my favorite color. I love the packaging, the color, the scent even the little spoon on the top...but the actual cream doesnu2019t work for me. I have combination skin and live in a very humid climate, so I need a moisturizer that will be light enough to soak into my skin. This cream has a nice silky feel, and it goes on so smoothly, but the residue it leaves is just not good. It feels sticky, and even when I used it as a night cream, I still woke up in the morning like that. Itu2019s almost as if it made my skin oilier overnight!  Even though it doesnu2019t work for me, I still love the look and feel of the cream - just not on me. The packaging is beautiful, and unboxing it feels magical. I wish SO MUCH that it worked for me, but sadly it just doesnu2019t. I will be exchanging it for the Water Cream...fingers crossed that it is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received the cream with the top part broken where the spatula goes :( not that picky about it though..packaging is nice, the cream its self isnt that special. a little goes a long way, it def makes the skin look dewy but so far ive just been using it as a night cream. its also good for sensitive skin, at least for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Overall I wouldnu2019t recommend this product unless you live in a freezing or arid area, and can handle a greasy product without breaking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have combination and sensitive skin and this work very well! i just apply a little less to my oily patches and more to my dry/normal spots. lives up to the dewy name, makes my skin very soft and smooth and doesnu2019t give me the little white bumps like most heavy creams do. donu2019t let your oily patches scare you away from this product combo skinned boys and girls!!

A little goes a long way so you definitely get a lot of bang for the buck. No SPF so be sure to add some

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this moisturizer, my skin must drinks it up. Iu2019m not sure I will ever use another moisturizer other than this again. Leaves my skin soft and glowy, absolutely love it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Give it a go. You will be pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I not say! This product absolutely delivers rich hydrating, creamy goodness.  I love the feeling it makes my skin feel. I use in the morning and evening and I feel like my skin just drinks it all in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this as a part of my nightly skin care routine and my skin is sooo glowy and soft in the morning. The price is kinda high but its so worth it. A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Use for morning skin just before foundation!

Use the water cream if thatu2019s your skin type. I like that one too and use it just on my nose. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Id give it 10 stars if I could

reviews.review_text: I have unbelievably dry skin and this saves it every time. In the winter my whole face flakes and peels. If you're hesitant about this because of the price, I recommend going into a local Sephora (if you have one) to get a trial size. For the past couple of months I have been on the hunt trying to find a comparable creamd absolutely nothing changes my skin like this (I have tried drunk elephant, Josie Maran, Charlotte tilbury, philosophy, drugstore brands, etc...) If I could only have one skin care item it would be this. I will continue to buy this despite the price. If you're unsure - do it !!! My only negative note about this is that if you are not a fan of heavy creams, this might not be for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer. Iu2019ve tried various moisturizers, BUT this has become my go to. Iu2019m on my 6th container because I love it so much. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is amazing! I loved this product itu2019s good for dry skin, and it left my skin looking glowy for about 6 hours with a natural grow.. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decadent!  I'm in love with this moisturizer!   It left my skin super hydrated and soft. I have super sensitive skin and it wasn't irritating at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!!! Over the summer the tatcha water cream became my go to.  I switched up to the dewy skin cream for the winter and love it!  It has a rich long lasting consistency (which we need when itu2019s 20 degrees outside), but doesnu2019t leave me with that oily feeling midday like most other skin creams.  This cream is excellent for holding that moisturized (dewy) look.  I use the dewy cream underneath the tatcha pore refining SPF.  Sometimes I add a little highlight on top and go foundation less or I can throw on a little primer and add a few drops of foundation on top as well.  I love makeup, but use a dime size amount of foundation.  Not sure how this would work underneath a heavy application of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am getting married in 2 months and have spend the last year of my long engagement trying to prepare my skin for the big day. I spent thousands of dollars on big name, expensive creams in hopes that I would have celebrity skin while walking down the aisle such as La Mer, Dr. Barbara Sturm, etc. They all broke me out, every single one. I was angry. I finally threw in the towel and received a sample for this and the essence from Tatcha. WOW. I kid you not - Within 1 use not only has my skin had this incredible plump, hydrated appearance, but within a week I've noticed a dramatic difference in my skin. More youthfulness, glow, less acne and flare-ups, smaller pores. It looks like I had a hydrafacial for the past 2 weeks straight. When I ran out of the sample I've never been so quick to purchase something in my life. At first I was nervous to use because of the purple/synthetic appearance, but switching to other lotions makes my skin mad. This purple goodness is what my skin craves and needs. I feel so confident for my wedding day skin thanks to this amazing product!!!! I definitely recommend to any bridge looking for a slightly more affordable end of the luxury spectrum face cream. PS - I definitely recommend the essence with it as well.

reviews.review_text: Beware of the dimethicone!! Iu2019m apparently one of this people that dimethicone does NOT help keep my skin moisturized. So instead of having dewy skin, my skin became dry and flaky, especially on my forehead and nose, which then made my foundation start to look like it had cracked. I didnu2019t know I had an issue with dimethicone until I used this moisturizer so for those who arenu2019t sure about the ingredient, definitely do a sample and see how your skin reacts. It took a little less than a month for my skin to show the signs and I havenu2019t been able to get it back to normal yet.

The only caveat is that it makes my skin feel a bit sticky (e.g. REALLY dewy), but that feeling goes away if I use a facial spray or mist after applying the moisturizer.
