reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never stop using this moisturizer. Extremely hydrating, gel like texture, that absorbs into the skin quickly. I love that it doesnu2019t feel sticky or tacky when applied. Gives the skin a nice smooth finish, so I rarely ever use a makeup primer. I have dry sensitive skin and have never had a negative reaction. This is my u201cgo tou201d moisturizer during the winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive loved this cream since my first use, it is everything I need and like. My makeup loves it too which is important to me. It gives me time to give myself a little face massage after applying then a couple minutes later I can do my makeup. It is not greasy nor heavy but my skin stays moisturized ALL day. I buy the travel Size for just that but keep the full size right on my vanity. Lovely... even gave up Clinique Surge after thinking IT was the best. Iu2019m not young by the way!!

reviews.review_title: Save your money. Not worth the hype.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: first off, this product has a strong fragrance and while that's not necessarily a deal breaker for me, i prefer products that dont have one at all and thought that point would be helpful for some of you to be aware of. next, I wanted to love this. I was prepared to become a fan of all things tatcha. but the truth is, after doing a ton of research, the price point cannot be justified and it's just overall an ok product but definitely not worth the money. there are tons of products out there to try so dont settle on this one. yes it felt great going on despite a slightly tacky residue it left behind but the moisturized feeling didn't last nearly as long as several other moisturizers I've tried, such as the Lotus night cream, for instance. or Kiehls ultra. also, I don't have sensitive skin but this caused my skin to fuss a bit- there was definitely an adjustment period that's for sure. the other major detractor for me was how heavy this felt and how greasy it made me look and feel for hours on end. yuck. definitely does NOT play nice under makeup. made everything slide around and also seemed to interact with some of my products causing further irritation and the need to adjust my routine to accommodate it. ugh. more trouble than it's worth in more ways than one. so your research on this product and the tatcha line in general to decide if its money you think will be well spent for you or not, dont just fall into the hype because this could very well be an expensive mistake.

reviews.review_title: Only moisturizer that keeps my dry skin dewy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin In the winter and I have tried many moisturizers from the Keihls and Fresh to Eucerin and Neutrogena. This is the only one that would keep it dewy throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the mini version of this product first to try it out as I am very paranoid when it comes to skincare and I absoloutely love it!! It leaves your skin feeling so soft and it makes your skin look super dewy and glowing. Love it so much and would recommend to literally anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like it so far. Looks like it helps my skin, will know more in a couple more weeks. Right now I would probably buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin.  I've tried so many different products even from this brand.  I find this to be their best moisturizing cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't soak in my skin, just ends up kinda like a film on top

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not smell any scent.  Has a nice, rich, silky feel.  Is not greasy at all.  My skin looks hydrated and plump.  Iu2019ve been using this product for 3 weeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!  Gives a soft and dewy look and feel.  I have now begun trying other Tacha products.  Hope they are just as good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Super hydrating. I only use it as my night time moisturizer but it works wonderfully on my skin. Super smooth and definitely feels dewy. It can be too much so a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: dumpling skin attained at a cost
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic moisturizer that improves skin texture and locks in moisture. I had to subtract two stars because I found I needed to use a lot of it to achieve results and that was painful because this is not a cheap product. Using the optimal amount saw me clearing through a jar a month so this is a pretty steep expense to take on but it could be worth it depending on your needs and skin proclivities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 10mL size before buying the full size product and even after just a week of use I have noticed a drastic improvement in my skins appearance. I have noticed a lot less blemishes and improvement in my pores and overall softness of my skin. I would recommend anyone try this product out. I actually had a sample size of the water cream as well but found that I reacted badly to it but this product has done wonders for my skin. This cream also has the best scent of any skincare product I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream,  itu2019s thick and gives a skin a dewy glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been magic on my skin. I have switched moisturizers every few months for the last year or so looking for something that was not too fragrant and moisturizing enough, and this is IT. Feels so rich on. I got a sample and loved it - immediately bought the full size. I do wonder if it will be too heavy for summer but for winter I am in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t break out hardly ever but have small pimples from this and my skin looks dull after it soaks in. Drink Elephant, Fresh Rose Cream or La Mer work better for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall if you have dry skin this product is for you but not for me I have dry SENSITIVE skin and this product will make you turn beet red all over your face would recommend if you donu2019t have sensitive skin but if you do you better RUN for the hills

reviews.review_title: Did absolutely nothing for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a huge disappointment. Despite its high price tag, this product did not moisturize my skin in the least. I found it was significantly less effectively than my usual cerave. This product is scented, contains unnecessary dyes and additives despite being marketed as u201cclean.u201d This is absolutely a waste of money and doesnu2019t seem like it is actually for people with dry skin. Perhaps this product would help those with oily skin, but I doubt it. My skin seemed dryer than a desert just minutes after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: good moisturizer especially for winter and for normal to dry skin. thank you tatcha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do notice quite the difference in my skin after a week with my pores being smaller and my skin just seeming smoother. However Iu2019m doing this for the long run so the real results will be in a few years. Also I scooped out an imbedded hair like fiber from the cream and it grossed me out; I donu2019t think it was a hair because it stretched a little bit but I have no idea cause it was in the moisturizer for a while Iu2019m guessing. I tried to take a picture of it but it was thin (on the end of my finger).

reviews.review_title: Not for Sensitive Skin. Will break you out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace my kate somerville glowy moisturizer to get more hydration, but the dewy skin cream started to give me breakouts in places Iu2019ve never had them. Also, I donu2019t usually have acne so I know itu2019s because of this product because itu2019s the only thing thatu2019s changed in my routine. It gave me under the skin pimples that hurt so much and it created redness on my cheeks and my nose. I wanted to really like it because it looks like I just received a facial but itu2019s too oily and not meant for my sensitive skin. Now, Iu2019ve reverted back to my kate somerville and hoping it can undo the damage this one has done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cream. I bought the mini so I could test it out while I was overseas in Saudi Arabia. This is perfect for that dry desert heat. It also smells really good. I used it to hydrate my skin as well as put makeup on top and it looked great to me. I'm continuing using it after coming back 3 and a half weeks later. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used.  It really makes your skin look and feel healthy.  It can be a little heavy for everyday use but itu2019s my nighttime go to.  I love Tatcha products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love love love!! This cream makes my skin feel so soft.  &also my skin has never looked better, I was breaking out a lot and I haven't broken out since using this. Super hydrating but doesnt feel too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my canu2019t live without moisturizer. I live in dry Colorado and have dry skin already, this totally handles it. Makes a perfect primer for makeup, I especially love it under Glossier products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only use this for under and around my eyes to keep them hydrated. love it and will continue to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For my dry skin this has transformed my skin in just a few uses. WOW. Amazing texture and so soft. Worth the price , very satisfying !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most amazing facial cream I have ever tried. I have very dry skin, year round but around the winter it is especially lacking in hydration. With the Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream, my skin gets the punch of hydration it needs and it stays that way! There is a slight fragrance that I personally do not mind, but others may be bothered by. Honestly great for anyone with really dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing yet very light.  I bought it to combat severely dry skin from a burn left by medicated acne cream and it helped almost immediately!  Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this stuff and will keep using it! It makes my skin plump and very moisturized, though it might be a little too much glowy side for my combo oily skin. This stuff really does give a beautiful dewy texture to the skin, the only one slightly bad thing I could even say is that I do think it's made me break out a little bit, however, I do have sensitive acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product and I tried to work with it but it made me break out BAD. My cheeks and neck/chin area had so many breakouts and i donu2019t have particularly sensitive or acne prone skin. It also doesnu2019t work well under makeup. It kept making my makeup pill by the end of the day and made my dry skin look very oily. Overall very disappointed and hoping my face clears up soon. If you want to try this: GET A SAMPLE FIRST. Donu2019t spend your money before you know if itu2019ll work for you. You will know almost instantly if itu2019ll cause a reaction. I was red and bumpy within the hour of putting it on.

reviews.review_title: beautiful face cream - price point justified
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves your skin thoroughly hydrated. I applied this on at night, and can still see its effects on my face in the morning. The dewy look even lasted me through a flight full of dry recycled air! Creates a beautiful base for makeup as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Found my new go to moisturizer!! Love this stuff. I have dry skin and this leaves me feeling so hydrated. Just what I need in this winter weather! A little goes a long way. And the smell is fabulous. I love how gentle it feels on my skin. My face always feels soft after using this. I use it after my toner and the combo works really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting moisture for my dry skin!! I work in the airline industry which leaves me high and dry Plus I live in the desert. This moisturizer was up to the challenge. I even got compliments on the glowiness of my skin. I also love the way it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely love this ! Wear it alone and still looks good ,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. I have very dry skin. I have tried tons of different moisturizers from the lowest low end to the highest high end and this stuff beats them all. immediately when I wash my face with the Tatcha cleanser (oil based one) and I out this on right after and my skin feels so soft and looks moisturized and healthy. I love it. you get a glow!

reviews.review_title: a more intense tatcha water cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like the water cream you will like this - it is a LOT heavier though. Thicker, a little goes a long way and I mean a really long way. It was too much moisture for me, but someone with extremely dry skin should try. I stick with the water cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I so wanted to love this product.  Using clean products is important to me.  For years (literally 10 ) I used Caudalie's Vinosource Intense Mositure, which I still love.  But I wanted something that came in a larger size because I would use up the Caudalie tube too quickly -- using it on face, neck, decolletage and back (all very sensitive, dry, break out prone etc areas for me).  I used this for over a month hoping that my skin would get through the adjustment period and love it.  Unfortunately that just didn't happen for me.  Pros are that it is very rich and moisturizing.  Cons are the risk of breaking out for the acne prone/sensitive skin women out there, and the scent (too perfumy/floral for me).  BTW, I now use YTP moisturizers (Glow @ night and Adaptogen during day -- love!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tatcha products and this right here is the best. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Great for hydration/glow, terrible under makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this to be my forever daytime lotion, but it has a major flaw that docks a whole two stars for me.   Pros: Super-hydrating... My skin gets dry in the winter, and I introduced retinol, but since using the Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream, I have no dry feeling all day long. Scent, color, texture on application are amazing.   Con: This product does not play nice underneath others. At first, I though the problem was the Tatcha Pearl, which has an interesting texture and takes some work to blend correctly, but it is the Dewy Cream that is a problem. No matter what goes atop this cream, it pills. It is not a good base for foundation or even a sunscreen bb team. Even a spray sunscreen pills over this. I tried applying less, and giving it more time to soak in, but it kind of sits atop my skin too much.  I'm using it now as a night cream and for my neck and decollete. So, while it is still useful, it doesn't help with a dewy skin look if make-up is a part of your day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of moisturizers and this one is my favourite. I have very dry skin and this moisturizer keeps my skin hydrated and glowy all day, especially in dry weather. I've gotten lots of compliments on how healthy my skin looks. It also smells AMAZING!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I got a sample size last year and ended up buying the full size, which is almost gone :-(. I have combination skin, but I find this to be great for the winter. I have also used this product in the summer/fall, but only when I wanted to have a clean fresh face. Since Sephora now sales the mini size, I definitely suggest you purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a staple for me. It is a thicker cream, especially in comparison to the water cream. So I use the water cream in the morning and dewy cream at night. Itu2019s been great to use over the winter. Too much can leave your skin greasy, so find the right amount for your skin. I only need a pea size and I wake up with fresh moisturized skin. I should note I also layer with the tatcha  essence, vitamin C serum and DE glycolic acid serum underneath. I really lay the dewy cream on when Iu2019m using retinols and harsher treatments. I recently ordered the white silk cream as well, and Iu2019m excited to see how that compares to the water cream and dewy cream which I both love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a good moisturizer as my face is always dry and tends to flake. This was not it. It honestly made my face drier and flakier. $20 for a small bottle is not worth it to me. Not sure if I really love the smell either. Will be returning and trying something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has saved my life!  Iu2019ve been struggling with dry skin all winter and NOTHING has helped the way this cream has.  I mean, Iu2019ve used high quality oils, serums and creams mask and exfoliate regularly and THIS is what made a difference.  I highly recommend this. Iu2019m so happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the price if you want something that gives you that dewy look and/or just looking for a great moisturizer. The smell is heavenly! It is a rich cream, so a little goes a long way and it shockingly doesn't have that icky residue. I have combo skin and it helps w/ my dry patches, which means this product really moisturizes deep into the skin and not just on the outer surface. It might be bc of my combo skin, but it does give you that dewy look. I know how I look like when I'm just oily, but this product gives me the dewy look. It doesn't say anything in the description about controlling oiliness, but I feel like it does anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has really dry skin, I still prefer to wear the Belif moisture bomb at night (I think it's the most hydrating moisturizer Sephora offers). But for wearing under makeup, Tatcha's dewy skin cream is about the best you're going to do. It's like a moisturizer and primer in one. I was actually PRAYING I wouldn't like this when I got a sample size to try, because after all it IS pricey. But sadly it IS worth the money... at least the mini size. I say that because I only plan on using this under makeup when I want to look my best. So I can justify spending the $20 on that (even though it's still pricey for how little you get). But I already have been using Tatcha's tinted eye cream for over a year, so I HAD to try this too and I'm glad I did! Also, I've tried their water cream and while it's not good for dry skin most of the year, it works really well under makeup on a super hot day!! So yeah, Tatcha is worth the hype.

reviews.review_title: Great product but not for someone with combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the water cream by Tatcha. However if you have combination skin I do not recommend this cream. It smells amazing and is very hydrating but it made me breakout because it is so hydrating. Iu2019ll be returning to get the water one.

reviews.review_title: Made my skin irritated and red.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Felt nice on my hand. But made my face red with irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has extra dry skin and an addiction to dewy makeup looks, this product is a dream come true. I am a recent Tatcha convert and this is my favorite product. This dewy cream leaves my skin feels so soft and supple. It settles into my skin nicely, making it a perfect canvas for my makeup. Iu2019ve been recommending it like crazy to my friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer for dry/acne prone skin!! I have dry to very dry skin, depending on the season and this is the moisturizer!! A little goes a long way and hydrate my skin throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer for dryer skin.  I use this in the winter time under my primer and my face stays moisturized all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: dry spots became drier, woke up with my full face flaked off. but also over time my face broke out horribly. yikes, yikes, dry and breakouts. ended up returning it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try cream- I got a sample size with some of my Sephora points. When first applied it feels great-- but then it never gets absorbed into my skill- it just sits there feeling wet and sticky. Sadly, I did not like this product :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels great on, silky and moisturizing but it makes my face look greasy so I canu2019t wear it as a daily moisturizer if Iu2019m going to work.

reviews.review_title: A fan but not my favorite.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was too heavy for me. I prefer Shiseido, i like multi-use products and this is a bit limiting for my taste. Itu2019s a beneficial product though just not for me, Iu2019d still recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this face cream! I have been struggling with highly sensitive and dry skin for years, and this is by far the most effective cream i've ever tried! Fabulous for serious dry skin-especially in winter months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this when I started on Accutane, and I absolutely loved it, but never planned on buying a full because of the price. I tried other creams though, and my skin looked terrible - flaky, dull, textured - I couldn't even enjoy my face clearing up because it looked and felt so dry. So I caved and bought this and looking at my face now you wouldn't even be able to tell I was on a drug that sucks all the moisture out of you. I apply it at night because it doesn't absorb fully, but my skin looks so beautiful the next day. I get so many compliments now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic moisturizer for dry skin. It's thick enough to keep my skin moisturized all night long, but isn't too thick where it feels like it is clogging my pores. I've also noticed that it has a slight smoothing effect to my skin. Love this! I'm going to repurchase when I run out.

reviews.review_title: You never want to stop putting this on!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is absolutely amazing. I have purchased it three times and I have never spent this much on a moisturizer. It is worth every penny. It feels like silk when you are putting it on. You can physically feel it plumping your skin. Makeup goes on so nicely on top, the smell is perfect and then way my skin feels is incredible! A staple in my routine :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: lately my skin has been so dry...no matter what I put on it, within a few hours, my face feels tight..almost as if I let water dry on my face..that tight feeling. I layer alot of products, from serums, HA, moisturizer, and heavy oils but even with all that, my skin still feels dry. I got a sample of this and lo and behold, my face actually feels hydrated.  theres no tight feeling. I didnt even have to put a heavy oil on top. its a thicker moisturizer which is perfect but it doesn't feel like its just sitting on top of my face. it does sink in...feels wonderful. theres a slight scent..nothing overwhelming..I really do love this..and when Im done with my sample, I will definitely pick up the full size but man oh man is it expensive!

reviews.review_title: Take the leap, buy this cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product.  Everything is perfect about this cream - the hydration it promises and delivers, the texture, the smell, and that it makes my skin look amazing.  I was using this as a night cream (because I thought it would be too heavy during the day based on other reviews) and the Indigo Cream during the day, but the Indigo Cream was just not enough moisture. I started using the Dewy Skin Cream during the day and what a difference it has made on my over 50 year old skin - it is soft and glowing. And it has helped with the redness in my face better than the Indigo Cream.  If you are on the fence about purchasing this product, take the leap, you won't be sorry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is a little oily T zone and dry around my mouth. I can feel tightness and tearing around my mouth after whole night heat. I use this along with LUMINOUS DEEP HYDRATION FIRMING SERUM. After one week I did NOT feel any relief to my dry part. I have to apply oil to area around my mouth like I used to do. I kept using these two products, now half way. I donu2019t blame it for not helping my dry part as other products donu2019t help either. But I donu2019t see any difference on my other part of skin. These two products are heavy and sticky especially serum. I can only use it night time because it will make me oily shine if I used daytime. My sister in law in her 20s cannot even use it at night time which will make her oily shine next day. It doesnu2019t make me breakout nor allergy. I donu2019t feel the firm power claimed by serum. It doesnu2019t help any of my skin issues nor exacerbate them. So to me, these two products are totally waste of time and money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s okay, It makes my skin look and feel oily. It also doesnu2019t really dry, it stays tacky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. It is perfect for any type of skin type. I love the price for all the product that you get. I highly recommend this product to anyone who is wanting a good facial product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing for dry skin. I have severely dry skin esp in the winter time and this works soo well. Also the little spatula is a nice touch and is more sanitary than taking it with your finger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for my dry skin, I have tried numerous products but this cream was the solution to my dry skin.  It leaves it soft and moisturized the whole day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sampled this in stores on my hand and was amazed at how it felt. A few days later I decided to splurge by purchasing it online. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice moisturizer though definitely be careful when adding foundation or bb/cc cream and try to pat your makeup on if you can. It's simultaneously light and thick so make sure you pat on an even layer all over the face instead of rubbing from one spot so it doesn't mostly stick to one area. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been waiting until Iu2019ve used this product for a bit of time before giving an honest review; it was worth the wait. I have terribly dry skin during the winter months and along with sensitive but semi-oily skin, itu2019s difficult to find a moisturizer that works for me. This is it! It keeps my skin plump and moisturized all day long without causing breakouts. Over the past four months Iu2019ve noticed a significant difference in the visible health of my skin too. Less is more with this product for those of us with oily skin. I do have to dab at my T zone to remove shine throughout the day but thatu2019s personally no big deal for me as I wear minimal makeup. I also tried Tatchau2019s Water Cream moisturizer; itu2019s recommended for oily skin and I found that it does not moisturize as well as this one (I had to double the amount of product) but it greatly reduces shine. All in all Iu2019d say give this product a try!  (FYI: All my other skincare products are dermalogica)

Also, the packaging is just gorgeous and feels luxe, which is what I expect at this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a trial size and I can not stress how incredible this cream is! I discovered tatcha about a year ago starting with the water cream which I love but as the colder months approached I needed something more moisturizing. This cream made my face look amazing even without makeup which is saying a lot coming from someone whou2019s always had hormonal acne/scarring. It helped diminish a lot of my acne scars along with improving my overall complexion. These days I feel so much more confident in my bare skin thanks to a combination of tatcha skin care. I generally do not leave reviews, but as someone who has struggled with skin issues and knowing there are many people out there with the same condition I feel it is my duty to spread the word. This line of skin care is amazing and I just recently place an order for tatchau2019s indigo version that way I can compare the 3 moisturizers.

As soon as I applied DE's Umbra Sheer, it started to pill. When I applied makeup (eye shadow, eyebrows and bronzer) it pilled some more. A good alternative to this may be DE's Lala Retro, but this moisturizer can make you look more oily than dewy if you have combination or oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had first gotten this cream as a sample with my points, and let me tell you... ITu2019S SO AMAZING! It is the first item Iu2019ve gotten as a sample that I HAD to come back and buy. I got the biggest size you can get, I love it that much. The best part, a little bit goes a very long way. I love how thereu2019s a tiny spoon on the top of the lid to scoop out about a pea size amount. That whole amount covers my face and neck. I have combo skin that is very sensitive and acne prone and this cream does wonders for penetrating moisture into my skin without causing me any issues. Which is close to impossible to find for me. Iu2019ve tried SO many products that just never work. My sensitivity either reacts, causes my acne to flair up, or it just doesnu2019t moisturizer enough. The Tatcha Dewey skin cream will forever be my go to from now on!!! I use it every night after my acne regimen, and it leaves my skin still moisturizer and Dewey for the next day. If I could give this 10 stars, I would!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does everything it claims to do. It is very hydrating plumping, and does indeed impart a dewy finish. It gives the skin a beautiful finish. I like how fancy I feel using the gold spatula. I like the natural scent and the colour. A little goes a long way. HOWEVER, I have noticed the occasional whitehead which is rare for me because I have very dry and eczema-prone skin, not oily or acne-prone skin. They don't bother me too much because I can just pop them and the don't leave a mark, but at this price point I shouldn't have to deal with this issue at all. I do really like it but I will probably not repurchase once I get through the  jar.

reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and it did make my skin look nice, but felt very cakey when i applied it. it isn't the worst, but i don't recommend you waste your money

reviews.review_text: My sister has combination skin and she loved this product. A much better buy, economically, than purchasing the Le Mer cream, which she said wasn't worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So impressed with this cream! Itu2019s super hydrating and goes great under my makeup! A little goes a long way! This has helped me as weather has changed and got super dry this winter. I also have sensitive skin and this works great for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample. I applied to a clean face, but the texture of the cream didn't spread well. The smell was like Vaseline. It hydrates well, but there are similar products at better prices that will accomplish the same result. It was good, but not great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While this product is rather pricy, I have noticed a huge difference in my skin upon multiple uses. The Japanese purple rice definitely helped maintain moisture levels in my skin in ways I could not imagine. Pairing this with super matte foundations not only put my skin to the test, prevented it from drying out! This truly is a game changer when it comes to combo/dry skincare. I cannot love this enough! I have to use the smallest amount and it plumps and hydrates all day long. Tatcha, youu2019ve done it again!

reviews.review_title: Effective night time moisturizer. Smells lovely.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this exculsively as a night time moisturizer. I follow a 7 step Korean skin care regime. I wakeup to dewy naturally glowing within skin. I wear no makeup during the day. This is an essential part of my skincare routine. You don't need much. if you apply to much it can become sticky. I don't recommend as a daytime moisturizer for under makeup. It has a lovely light scent. A shame to cover it up with other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted to love this SO MUCH- I keep trying to like it but it never fails to break me out. The texture is wonderful but once itu2019s on it doesnu2019t really leave me skin feeling softer right away. It could just be me, but if you break out easily, try something else :/

reviews.review_title: Use this as a night cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my opinion, this formula is way too thick for use as a day-cream. The formula is more similar to a night mask actually. Even a tiny amount applied to my face made me excessively greasy by the end of the day. The cream smells really good and is richly hydrating which made this great for use as a night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. The metals (aka tin oxide) in this product made me break out. I should have read the ingredients so this was my mistake, but if youu2019re not allergic to any form of metal youu2019ll love this. Very moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a better and cheaper alternative compared to La Mer. I have dry skin during winter time so the Sephora lady recommended La Mer, unfortunately I started breaking out. I first bought the Tatcha gift set, and I was impressed by the results. Thatu2019s when I decided to buy the full size. A little goes on a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So Iu2019ve used many moisturizers before! I have combination skin but have a tough time with the dry parts. This moisturizer has worked so far. The price is a bit more than others Iu2019ve used but as long as it works Iu2019m happy. I scoop is a super cute detail and itu2019s something I love because I have long nails and would always get the cream under my nails with the other moisturizers. The packaging is very nice as well. Itu2019s kept my face moisturized and glowing so Iu2019ll definitely keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know how anyone can like this cream. It made my skin feel super sticky and oily. I prefer the water cream over this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love, this is the night cream Iu2019ve been searching for!  Itu2019s super moisturizing and my skin is seriously bright and glowy!  Will definitely purchase over and over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll start with the positive.This does provide some hydration and smoothing to the skin. It doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. Price per oz is ok. I use lamer For everything from wash to lotion /essence serums to creams but find Tatcha is a good pre makeup step. Meaning I do my usually skin care routine (am /pm)but before I apply makeup I put a small of this cream on and then prime my skin, i find the makeup is more radiant, applied smoother , and skin is softer looking. It doesnu2019t hydrate as well as the lamer oil but I have dry skin so if your skin is normal you may really like this. (I also tried their water cream one but thatu2019s even lighter of a moisturizer so oily skinned ppl would love it ). Packaging is pretty. If you donu2019t have a go to cream and want moderate to light hydration you will like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this moisturiser, especially in the winter months. It sinks into the skin beautifully and does exactly what it promises. It has a beautiful texture and pleasant smell, and the spatula is a game changer for using the correct amount of product--which is so key if you're spending good money on a product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Dewy Skin Cream! It is so amazing when it comes to hydrating my skin for hours on end and doesnu2019t require me to use a lot of product. Plus, the applicator spoon helps me from overusing the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cold Canadian winter has been taking its toll on my skin creating non stop flaking and horrible makeup days, I tried anything & everything from exfoliating,serums,moisturizers,oils, foundations... finally bit the bullet and splurged on this in a last ditch effort. WOW! From the moment I put it on I knew it was a game changer! My skin loves this formula. I use the tiniest bit and I find it settles in nicely and Iu2019m not wasting the product. Completely recommend trying this out

reviews.review_title: Feels great made me break out.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the creamu2019s feeling on my skin but unfortunately it made me break out pretty bad on my chin and forehead. Probably the fragrance. Wish they would come out with something better suited for actual sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything I ever wanted in a cream: very rich, creamy consistency; super hydrating for dry skin; can be used day or night; anti-aging; clean; and best of all great for sensitive skin. I love the way it smells too. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: skin care staple for people with dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s the only thing that saved my skin from the Canadau2019s harsh weather. Iu2019ve tried every moisturizers in sephora but this is the only one that made a difference after 1 use! I also use it under makeup and it makes my skin look more glowing and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last week after being recommend by a beauty consultant. She advises me to use Dewy Skin Cream over Magic Cream (CT) as it contained more anti-aging benefits while giving the much needed hydration during winter time.  After first application my skin looks indeed very dewy and feels smooth. Second day I woke up with small bumps on my right cheek; third day I noticed tender bumps on the forehead; fourth day on my upper lips and just today on the left cheek. Iu2019m quite disappointed with the result given the relatively high price. I gave this product three-star ratings because it indeed deliver the ultra hydrating promise. BUT  I didnu2019t expect to get cystic acne from it which is a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t find it exactly u201cDewyu201d it sinks into the skin disappearing. My skin is oily and acne prone, I canu2019t say this cream made me feel comfortably hydrated but rather like something just say on my skin while oils collected underneath? I find other creams like DE protini and SR Tidal make me more glow-y than this cream and truly feel skin-quenching Iu2019ll pass for now..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product, though too much for daytime wear. It doesnu2019t absorb in my skin. Works nicely though as a nighttime cream. By morning my skin so so soft and hydrated. Cream smells lovely and has a silky texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have awful dry skin in the winter. I used this once and my skin is literally silky smooth. I am so pleased!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer that I have ever had. Iu2019ve tried so many and this is the only one that has actually TRANSFORMED my skin and I can actually see a DIFFERENCE with. 10/10 recommendation to everyone! Love this stuff. Will never use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really great cream! But I will say it does work best for dry skin. I have combo skin so I thought this might be good for my dry sections on my face but throughout the day it did make me a little oily in because I have some oily skin to begin with. In my personal opinion if you have combo skin Iu2019d go with the water cream compared to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bravo, Tatcha!  Thank you for making a product that has help my sensitive, extremely dry and aging skin.  I have been using for over a month and I have now repeated compliments on the improvement of my skin.  You might even say it glows!  Amazing product!

reviews.review_title: want hydrated, supple skin? look no further
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best. Moisturizer. Ever.  Do yourself a favor and buy this. It feels so silky on my skin and leaves it incredibly hydrated and supple.

reviews.review_title: Nvr break out ..but I did BAD
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard so much good about Tatcha from a You-tuber that I knew was esthetician and she went on and on so I grabbed a deluxe sample w my points. I havenu2019t had a breakout in many years and broke out horrible from a few days trying a tiny amount as moisturizer before my makeup. I am in my 40u2019s w normal to dry skin and hoped this would help w Wisconsin winter skin. I know it was free but the rehabbing of my skin wasnu2019t and it just makes you wonder how many these companies test these products on bc my skin never breaks out. I  am turned off by Tatcha completely now. We all are difft it is true, but I would steer clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is a god send! I got this as a sample on my birthday last year and had to buy it! Totally worth the price point. You barely need any so it goes a long way. I also have sensitive skin and redness and this has helped tone down the redness so much that my skin tone is almost even all over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i just  canu2019t tell if i like this or not. kind of felt heavy and a bit greasy but after it sits for a while itu2019s okay. i donu2019t think itu2019s worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail moisturizer! One of my favorites and always leaves my skin feeling clean!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing and light textured, leaves skin dewy and fresh.   Clean and fresh scent. Perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The is the BEST moisturizer EVER!! The consistency is Perfect and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is fabulous my skin is super soft & supple. I don't break out at all with this stuff. I have sensitive skin & I'm acne prone. I definitely notice a difference when I don't use this. I mainly use it at night & day's I don't wear any makeup. Absolute favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t know it was possible for my skin to feel this amazing! I have normal/dry skin, and loved the water cream. I tried this cream as winter makes skin so dry, and WOW. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Recently began using Tatcha products and so far each one is amazing . I love the Primer , Dewy Skin Cream , Water Cream . Highly recommend Tatcha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Tatcha brand and this product is one of the best creams. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to look like a glowing, hydrated, youthful goddess then THIS is the cream for you. So beautiful under makeup, or lovely on its own! I seriously cannot day enough good about this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and was in Sephora looking for a moisturizer that was non-comedogenic. I bought this and the Tatcha oil cleanser not knowing anything about the brand. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m conflicted because I have pretty dry sensitive skin and upon reading this, it sounds like the moisturizer of my dreams! I find this doesnu2019t really sink well into the skin but feels like itu2019s just on top of my skin. Itu2019s best as a night cream for me and after I exfoliated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing but caking, very bad experience if use before foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will never buy another moisturizer again! Absolutely love Tatcha. I have pretty sensitive/dry skin, and this has been the only product that has truly made a difference to my skin. Canu2019t recommend enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this when I ran out of my go-to nighttime moisturizer. All of the highly rated reviews had me hyped. And as someone with normal to dry skin, I knew that had to be the product.

reviews.review_title: If you have dry skin look no further
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin and this stuff as saved me. It is so expensive but it goes a long way. I just finished my first full jar and Iu2019m am getting another now. The hype is real. Donu2019t sit on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a moisturizer that leaves my face so soft and smooth. I live in a really harsh winter climate that causes extremely dry skin and permanent redness on my cheeks. Anyone who lives in an area with harsh winters, I suggest you give this a shot. Your skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so bad but it made my chin/jawline get small bumps and break out in a rash and I typically never break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. The first time I used this is broke me out bad.  I thought it was a coincidence.   I discontinued it for a while and every time I go back to it, the very next day I am broke out.  If you have super dry skin maybe it would work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While it smells great and has great packaging, I feel like for me it just sits on top of my skin- it doesn't sink in. For it to just sit on my skin and be $70, it is definitely not worth it. I do like the makeup primer, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m on me third jar of this break and have one as a back up. My favorite moisturizer. I have combo ( dryer and oily in the tzone) skin. My skin just reacts wonderfully to this cream.

reviews.review_title: Not good for super dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara thinking it would be the perfect solution for my dry flaky skin. It definitely feels nice and does its job, and I havenu2019t used this for long, but it doesnu2019t seem any different than any other moisturizer, except itu2019s more money for less quality. Itu2019s a nice moisturizer, but it is way overpriced and definitely not better than my Cetaphil night moisturizer (for extra dry skin). It certainly makes you feel luxurious with the fancy bottle and the cute little (unnecessary) spoon at the top. If thatu2019s what you like and you donu2019t mind spending the extra money, go for it. If youu2019re looking for a good moisturizer, go get yourself some Cetaphil or any other moisturizer that is better for super dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: :/ I like Tatcha products and wanted to like this one. Iu2019m in my 30s and have combination skin. The cream is smooth and thick enough to feel luxurious, and itu2019s a very pretty lavender color, but the floral scent is too much for me. Itu2019s not *heavily* scented, but it is scented and I hate floral scents. Iu2019m glad I got this as a sample and didnu2019t buy the full size.  I love they eye cream, thoughu2014excellent product.  I do think the dewy skin cream moisturizes well and eventually absorbs into the skin, but the scent is not it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im s h o o k. Ive been desperately trying to find a daily moisturizer for my face that would go well with my dry/oily combination skin that is ALSO severely eczema prone. Ive tried every cream Avene, a line for intolerant skin, had to offer and NONE of them gave me the results this cream did in ONE night. The itchy bumps and uneven, dry texture almost completely disappeared after one use. I literally have to stop myself from touching my face because i cant even BELIEVE how smooth and supple it feels.  The cream is expensive but its SO rich that the tiniest amount goes a loong way so it will definitely last you a good amount of time.  My new holy grail. Please never ever stop making this!!!  (Also totally safe under makeup and creates a beautiful canvas for foundation application especially when I combine it with the hourglass primer! Doesnt cause oily build up or creasing which is a HUGE plus for me)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a tatcha set that included this, the violet mask, the face mist and the primer and wow I have to say as a skincare junkie with literally a closet full of skincare (no joke I spend 800$ every vib sale) and shop once a month itu2019s ridiculous but I have a passion for skincare.. this moisturizer blew me away. Definition of PLUMP glowing from within skin. My face has never looked so amazing! This has replaced my drunk elephant moisturizer I came back to buy the full size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never felt so soft!!!!! I started using only products in this brand for my skincare routine and I canu2019t believe how much my acne as cleared up, how much softer and smoother my skin is, and how much better it looks overall!!!!!!! I use this cream at night and itu2019s wonderful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful and luxurious! Hydrated my skin wonderfully. This is the first time I ever spent so much money on a moisturizer but boy was it worth it. My skin immediately loved this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin. Iu2019ve tried all sorts of oils and creams and serums and though they may moisturize my skin, Iu2019m still left with dry patches. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has finally saved my dry skin. I've been trying for years so many products and nothing was working. I was amazed and (scared cause I would have to buy the big one and its expensive LOL) but it's totally worth it! this is the best product for dry skin I've ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been life changing. I thought I was doing well on the Indigo cream, and I was, but I didn't really need something for such sensitive skin so I tried the Dewy Skin Cream and it's been incredible. Someone literally told me yesterday my skin looked like glass (compliment I think...).   No but seriously this is incredible, gentle, doesn't irritate and is so hydrating for the dry winter. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: About two years ago, my skin became really dry--maybe it was the weather or just my skin aging, but the patches of dry flakey skin around my nose in particular were really annoying. I probably tried 5 different drug-store moisturizers before I thought to try a higher end product like Tatcha. I learned about The Dewy Skin Cream from RawBeautyKristi (my fave youtuber) and decided to order it right away. It came beautifully packaged and smelt so lovely. And let me tell y'all: IT SAVED MY SKIN. Almost immediately, the dryness went away and my skin felt like my own again. I have purchased this product a few times since then and thought I'd share the news that this stuff WORKS (at least it did for me). Hope you love it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream initially felt heavy and sticky but that feeling wore off a few minutes after applying. This is how I have so far survived Canadian winter 2019/2020.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s pricey but worth the money. Makes your skin look like itu2019s glowing from inside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have legit crocodile skin and I cannot tell you how much money I spent on all othe brand shoes until I came to this lifesaver !

reviews.review_title: WORKS WELL FOR OILY SKIN TOO

reviews.review_text: I always have oily skin, but I got sick this week blowing my nose like crazy... gave me super dry skin on my nose. This keeps me completely moisturized throughout the day and you immediately feel the wealth when you apply this product to your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product alittle goes a long way lasts along time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a die hard DE face cream for awhile, but thought I would try the tatcha one when DE changed their formula. The packaging is beautiful, the cream looks great and feels good going on. But about one hour after I put it on, I felt my make up start to pill off my face because of this cream. You literally canu2019t wear make up on top of it because it will come off your face in little balls. Itu2019s so weird. Iu2019ve kept it just to wear at night a few times a week, but itu2019s incredibly expensive to only be able to use at night a few times a week. I ended up having to order the DE one again for the day time, and by the way the formula feels almost identical. If youu2019re deciding between the two, or even this one and another one, go with the alternative. Sadly this is just not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure how this works for other people, but if it does, lucky you!  Been holding on to a deluxe sample of the Dewy Cream for a while, maybe I spent Sephora points on it? Anyways, thought itu2019d be amazing, but it did not play nice with my other products, all of which are clean/organic.  After a process of elimination, research, and reapplying my entire skincare regimen multiple times, I believe the pilling issue is due to the Dimethicone in the Dewy Creme, which is high up on the ingredients list and widely considered a not u201ccleanu201d ingredient. This does not absorb into skin, sits on top to give a smoothing effect.  Will never purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer. Definitely worth the price. It helps achieve the glass skin look I was looking for. It also helps me manage my eczema without making my t zone oily. Perfect for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Has changed my day to day makeup look!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cream like a month or so ago, and ever since then I can not live without it. I use it before I go to bed and when I wake up. During the winter my skin typically gets dry and cracks, but with this cream, it keeps my skin feeling and looking moisturized and soft all day long!! I strongly recommend this as a day to day moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Works for combo skin too, in cooler weather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is very nice. And though the Sephora directions say it's for normal and dry skin, I like it on my combination skin, in cooler weather. (It would be too heavy for me on hot summer days.) I'd rather it not have fragrance, but in this product, it doesn't seem to bother me. And of course, it comes in an attractive Tatcha jar. I got a deluxe sample, using my Sephora points (thank you, Sephora). I wish that size could be available for purchase, for travel. Am glad I got it with points, and I can scoop some out of the full-size jar (once I get it) with the spatula, into the mini-size. Oh, and this moisturizer feels heavy on my skin for a little while, and then absorbs to feel smooth but not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin, this is worth a try. Iu2019m not a fan of the heavy bottle though.

reviews.review_title: Don't see what the hype is about.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin feel really suffocated and tacky-- like, it would never fully absorb into my skin; so then when I went to lay down after applying at night, my pillow case literally stuck to my face! I've never had a moisturizer do that before. I gave it 2 stars because the smell wasn't too overpowering, and I DID try it with makeup since it was sticky enough to act as a primer- but my face was oily quicker by the end of the day than with my normal face primers.  I just don't see what the big deal and big price tag is with Tatcha products!

reviews.review_title: You gonna feel difference right away
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All Tatcha products are high end and it delivers whats its promise.This cream has a light, natural smell and consistency.It gives you glow right away and makes pores invisible.Its more on rich side, but not too heavy.I use Dewy cream in winter when my skin needs more nutrients and Water cream in summer cause of its lighter texture.Needless to say all ingredients are top notch, no artificial smell add to that gorgeous packing and excellent customer service( if you purchase online) you will get one of the best brands out in the market!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The consisitency is pretty thick. My skin didnt absorb this too well. It just sat on top. I will say my skin felt more supple but i wasnt getting hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and ended up buying the full size because I donu2019t think I can live without it. It has an awesome texture thatu2019s not heavy or sticky and the smell is so clean and fresh. I love using this in the morning as the last thing I apply before my foundation. It keeps my skin feeling moisturized and glowing all day!
absolutely obsessed with this cream! It leaves my skin moisturized,  glowing,  and soft. I recommend this cream hands down. oh and it smells amazing and it provides a calming effect

reviews.review_title: SO GOOD THE MOST MOISTURIZING EVER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this is the absolute BEST cream ever!!!! Iu2019ve had the absolute driest skin and dehydrated. I live in New England as were approaching winter itu2019s getting a lot drier here- also  I started a new round of birth control for my acne & have hyperthyroidism which causes dry skin. Iu2019ve been trying every freakin cream possible and this is the only one I found I love Iu2019ve bought it twice now. I wonu2019t go back to anything else... if you have extremely dry skin this is it!!! I will say though it does work well under makeup but if you like to leather yourself in cream this wonu2019t work under makeup. But that shouldnu2019t matter if you just want a good cream. buy it! You wonu2019t regret it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To say Iu2019m obsessed with this cream is an understatement. I have never felt a moisturizer that feels as luxurious and nourishing as this one. If you have dry skin and want some luminosity back, you will LOVE this. I personally like to use this product as a night cream but looks beautiful under makeup as well. A little goes a long way, just be sure to not overuse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: during the winter season, my skin is super dehydrated & is dull! tried this one out over the water cream because of the thicker consistency! it doesnt leave an oily film after applying it, but your skin will definitely look dewy, brighter, & more moisturized! smells like a dream too! love the tiny applicator that is on the lid of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m only 22 years old. I have sensitive/oil skin type. However, this is the best moisturizer i ever used. I used sooo many other expensive products; i also tried indigo and water cream of tatcha. But this dewy skin is the best. I immediately see the result of texture improvement, and brighter skin tone. I use it for nighttime, water cream is better to use for morning and under makeup. I completely understand why other people cant have good result while using this cream with makeup because this moisturizer has many rich ingredients that would nurture the skinu2019s needs. Of course itu2019s too good to be under the layer of foundation and all those makeup ingredients that have potentials to ruin the skinu2019s textures even more. Makeup skin can only work well with light hydration such as water cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I would not recommend this for oily/combination skin. I have dry to normal skin, and let me tell you. My skins eats this stuff up like me drinking water and feeling dehydrated. My skins always look and feel so soft when I put on this. I love highlighter, and combining my two favorite things literally has gotten me so many compliments. Definitely worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency and hydration it delivers but, for me, it isnu2019t great under makeup bc it doesnu2019t seem to fully absorb, ive tried using less (you donu2019t need much to begin with), but itu2019s thickness makes it better for a night cream in my Opinion. The smell is pleasant. Other than hydration, Iu2019m not sure how it lives up in anti aging performance. Iu2019m looking for an alternative to lancer but still feel that one is better. However, for the price, this is a great cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally gold for upcoming parched winter and harsh winds. I have dry combination (T zone) sensitive skin and this is amazing stuff! I am a skincare junkie and have tried everything from high to low end and this is worth every dime! You don't need much product for your entire face, so the jar should last for quite some time. I use this as the last layer to my skincare regiment. Prefer to use this only at night, too heavy for daytime use. Try it out, you won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in a set first, but I loved it so much I went and bought the full size. Even my teenager noticed how beautiful and soft my skin looked without makeup and if a teenager noticed, you know itu2019s good stuff!  Itu2019s very thick and luxurious. I kicked my La Mer to the curb. I donu2019t have dry skin, so I was worried about breakouts, but there wasnu2019t a blemish in sight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderfully hydrating cream! I use it as a night cream. It is too heavy and thick for day use (for me). You do not need alot of product! Did wonders for my skin while I was traveling. Smells nice and isn't over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never in my life, used such a hydrating cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before this, I was peeling like Father Time in the dry & cold weather in Colorado! Purchased with the Tatcha Minis Skincare for Makeup Lovers Kit ~ & itu2019s amazing. The very small 10ml bottle from the kit will last 3 weeks applying  2xDaily. Helped clear the few blemishes I had, makes my skin actually look and feel soft. Also keeps my skin fresh when Iu2019ve been struggling with Pacifica Moisturizers (that I also love). Will invest in the larger bottle because this lasts long and works very very well. If it was more affordable, Iu2019d gift it to friends & family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this cream does wonders for my face!!

reviews.review_title: Breakout in bumps all over my face!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really fine and smooth skin but after using this i broke out in these small bumps all over my face but mainly on my forehead. I kept using it because it was so expensive but finally gave up after 5 months and my face is slowly going back to normal. I am now using this as a neck cream instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I heard Jeffry Star talking about this product and I had to try it. I am absolutely in love. I could see results with the first application. Iu2019m getting compliments on my skin and I see the difference. I will be using this product from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I've ever tried. Holy grail for dry skin. I'm pretty sure this product along with Juno Oil cured my cystic acne better than any prescription. It's all about the hydration!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i will survive this winter. can not belive it. after 19 years trying to find the cream, that works for my extremly dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice rich moisturizer thatu2019s safe for sensitive skin. It provides lasting moisture and is good as a basic daily face moisturizer. I prefer heavier moisturizers for my dry skin, but I would consider buying this in the future. I got a 1oz free container as a reward and I used it up in less than a week. If you buy it, Itu2019s a little pricey in my opinion and because itu2019s not heavy, it doesnu2019t seem to stretch as long as LaMer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and was super excited!  Within 2 days of using it, I have breakouts on my chin, cheek, and nose. I have very sensitive skin, so I thought that might be it. But after reading some other reviews of this breaking some people out, I also agree that my skin doesnu2019t absorb it. It just sits on top and breaks me out!
